2.84: PHR ZRA IAD KRW، HM NE TM SE MZBWT عHD LIA THA KH AaPS MIN AIK DWSRE KA KhWN NH BHANA AWR NH AIK DWSRE KW GHR SE BE GHR KRNA TM NE AS KA AQRAR KIA THA، TM KhWD AS PR GWAH HW
2.85: MGR AaJ WHI TM HW KH APNE BHAEI BNDWN KW QTL KRTE HW، APNI BRADRI KE KChH LWGWN KW BE KhANMAN KR DITE HW، ZLM W ZIADTI KE SATH AN KE KhLAF JTHE BNDIAN KRTE HW، AWR JB WH LRAEI MIN PKRE HWEE TMHARE PAS AaTE HIN، TW AN KI RHAEI KE LIE FDIH KA LIN DIN KRTE HW، HALANKH ANHIN AN KE GHRWN SE NKALNA HI SRE SE TM PR HRAM THA TW KIA TM KTAB KE AIK HSE PR AIMAN LATE HW AWR DWSRE HSE KE SATH KFR KRTE HW PHR TM MIN SE JW LWG AISA KRIN، AN KI SZA AS KE SWA AWR KIA HE KH DNIA KI ZNDGI MIN ZLIL W KhWAR HW KR RHIN AWR AaKhRT MIN ShDID TRIN عZAB KI TRF PHIR DIE JAEIN? ALLH AN HRKAT SE BE KhBR NHIN HE، JW TM KR RHE HW
2.86: IH WH LWG HIN JNHWN NE AaKhRT BICh KR DNIA KI ZNDGI KhRID LI HE، LHAZA NH AIN KI SZA MIN KWEI TKhFIF HWGI AWR NH ANHIN KWEI MDD PHNCh SKE GI
2.87: HM NE MWSIAؑ KW KTAB DI، AS KE BعD PE DR PE RSWL BHIJE، AaKhR KAR عISIAؑ ABN MRIMؑ KW RWShN NShANIAN DE KR BHIJA AWR RWH PAK SE AS KI MDD KI PHR IH TMHARA KIA DHNG HE KH JB BHI KWEI RSWL TMHARI KhWAHShAT NFS KE KhLAF KWEI ChIZ LE KR TMHARE PAS AaIA، TW TM NE AS KE MQABLE MIN SRKShI HI KI، KSI KW JHTLAIA AWR KSI KW QTL KR DALA
2.88: WH KHTE HIN، HMARE DL MHFWZ HIN NHIN، ASL BAT IH HE KH AN KE KFR KI WJH SE AN PR ALLH KI PHTKAR PRI HE، AS LIE WH KM HI AIMAN LATE HIN
2.89: AWR AB JW AIK KTAB ALLH KI TRF SE AN KE PAS AaEI HE، AS KE SATH AN KA KIA BRTAؤ HE? BAWJWD IH KH WH AS KTAB KI TSDIQ KRTI HE JW AN KE PAS PHLE SE MWJW D THI، BAWJWD IH KH AS KI AaMD SE PHLE WH KhWD KFAR KE MQABLE MIN FTH W NSRT KI DعAEIN MANGA KRTE THE، MGR JB WH ChIZ Aa GEI، JSE WH PHChAN BHI GEE TW، ANHWN NE ASE MANNE SE ANKAR KR DIA KhDA KI LعNT AIN MNKRIN PR
2.90: KISA BRA ZRIعH HE JS SE IH APNE NFS KI TSLI HASL KRTE HIN KH JW HDAIT ALLH NE NAZL KI HE، AS KW QBWL KRNE SE SRF AIS ZD KI BNA PR ANKAR KR RHE HIN KH ALLH NE APNE FZL (WHI W RSALT) SE APNE JS BNDE KW KhWD ChAHA، NWAZ DIA! LHAZA AB IH GhZB BALAEE GhZB KE MSTHQ HWGEE HIN AWR AISE KAFRWN KE LIE SKhT AaMIZ SZA MQRR HE
2.91: JB AUN SE KHA JATA HE KH JW KChH ALLH NE NAZL KIA HE AS PR AIMAN LAؤ، TW WH KHTE HIN "HM TW SRF AUS ChIZ PR AIMAN LATE HIN، JW HMARE HAN (IعNI NSL ASRAEIL) MIN ATRI HE" AS DAERE KE BAHR JW KChH AaIA HE، ASE MANNE SE WH ANKAR KRTE HIN، HALANKH WH HQ HE AWR AUS TعLIM KI TSDIQ W TAEID KR RHA HE JW AN KE HAN PHLE SE MWJWD THI AChHA، AN SE KHW: AGR TM AS TعLIM HI PR AIMAN RKHNE WALE HW JW TMHARE HAN AaEI THI، TW AS SE PHLE ALLH KE AUN PIGhMBRWN KW (JW KhWD BNI ASRAEIL MIN PIDA HWEE THE) KIWN QTL KRTE RHE?
2.92: TMHARE PAS MWSIؑA KISI KISI RWShN NShANIWN KE SATH AaIA PHR BHI TM AISE ZALM THE KH AS KE PITH MWRTE HI BChHRE KW MعBWD BNA BITHE
2.93: PHR ZRA AUS MISAQ KW IAD KRW، JW TUWR KW TMHARE AWPR ATHA KR HM NE TM SE LIA THA HM NE TAKID KI THI KH JW HDAIAT HM DE RHE HIN، AN KI SKhTI KE SATH PABNDI KRW AWR KAN LGA KR SNW TMHARE ASLAF NE KHA KH HM NE SN LIA، MGR MANIN GE NHIN AWR AN KI BATL PRSTI KA IH HAL THA KH DLWN MIN AN KE BChHRA HI BSA HWA THA KHW: AGR TM MWMN HW، TW عJIB AIMAN HE، JW AISI BRI HRKAT KA TMHIN HKM DITA HE
2.94: AIN SE KHW KH AGR WAQعI ALLH KE NZDIK AaKhRT KA GHR TMAM ANSANWN KW ChHWR KR SRF TMHARE HI LIE MKhSWS HE، TB TW TMHIN ChAHIE KH MWT KI TMNA KRW، AGR TM APNE AS KhIAL MIN SChE HW
2.95: IQIN JANW KH IH KBHI AS KI TMNA NH KRIN GE، AS LIE KH APNE HATHWN JW KChH KMA KR ANHWN NE WHAN BHIJA HE، AS KA AQTZA IHI HE (KH IH WHAN JANE KI TMNA NH KRIN) ALLH AN ZALMWN KE HAL SE KhWB WAQF HE
2.96: TM ANHIN SB SE BRH KR JINE KA HRIS PAؤ GE HTIA KH IH AS MعAMLE MIN MShRKWN SE BHI BRHE HWEE HIN AN MIN SE AIK AIK ShKhS IH ChAHTA HE KH KSI TRH HZAR BRS JIE، HALANKH LMBI عMR BHRHAL AUSE عZAB SE TW DWR NHIN PHINK SKTI JISE KChH AعMAL IH KR RHE HIN، ALLH TW ANHIN DIKH HI RHA HE
2.97: AIN SE KHW KH JW KWEI JBRIL SE عDAWT RKHTA HW، ASE MعLWM HWNA ChAHIE KH JBRIL NE ALLH KE AIZN SE IH QRAaN TMHARE QLB PR NAZL KIA HE، JW PHLE AaEI HWEI KTABWN KI TSDIQ W TAEID KRTA HE AWR AIMAN LANE WALWN KE LIE HDAIT AWR KAMIABI KI BShART BN KR AaIA HE
2.98: (AGR JBRIL SE AN KI عDAWT KA SBB IHI HE، TW KHH DW KH) JW ALLH AWR AS KE FRShTWN AWR AS KE RSWLWN AWR JBRIL AWR MIKAEIL KE DShMN HIN، ALLH AN KAFRWN KA DShMN HE
2.99: HM NE TMHARI TRF AISI AaIAT NAZL KI HIN JW SAF SAF HQ KA AZHAR KR NE WALI HIN AWR AN KI PIRWI SE SRF WHI LWG ANKAR KRTE HIN، JW FASQ HIN
2.100: KIA HMIShH AISA HI NHIN HWTA RHA HE KH JB ANHWN NE KWEI عHD KIA، TW AN MIN SE AIK NH AIK GRWH NE ASE ZRWR HI BALA EE TAQ RKH DIA? BLKH AN MIN SE AKSR AISE HI HIN، JW SChE DL SE AIMAN NHIN LATE
2.101: AWR JB AN KE PAS ALLH KI TRF SE KWEI RSWL AS KTAB KI TSDIQ W TAEID KRTA HWA AaIA JW AN KE HAN PHLE SE MWJWD THI، TW AIN AHL KTAB MIN SE AIK GRWH NE KTAB ALLH KW AS TRH PS PShT DALA، GWIA KH WH KChH JANTE HI NHIN
2.102: AWR LGE AUN ChIZWN KI PIRWI KRNE، JW ShIA TIN، SLIMANؑ KI SLTNT KA NAM LE KR PISh KIA KRTE THE، HALANKH SLIMANؑ NE KBHI KFR NHIN KIA، KFR KE MRTKB TW WH ShIATIN THE JW LWGWN KW JADW GRI KI TعLIM DITE THE WH PIChHE PRE AUS ChIZ KE JW BABL MIN DW FRShTWN، HARWT W MARWT PR NAZL KI GEI THI، HALANKH WH (FRShTE) JB BHI KSI KW AS KI TعLIM DITE THE، TW PHLE SAF TWR PR MTNBH KR DIA KRTE THE KH "DIKH، HM MHZ AIK AaZMAESh HIN، TW KFR MIN MBTLA NH HW" PHR BHI IH LWG AUN SE WH ChIZ SIKHTE THE، JS SE ShWHR AWR BIWI MIN JDAEI DAL DIN ZAHR THA KH AZNI ALAHI KE BGhIR WH AS ZRIعE SE KSI KW BHI ZRR NH PHNChA SKTE THE، MGRAS KE BAWJWD WH AISI ChIZ SIKHTE THE JW KhWD AN KE LIE NFع BKhSh NHIN، BLKH NQSAN D H THI AWR ANHIN KhWB MعLWM THA KH JW AS ChIZ KA KhRIDAR BNA، AS KE LIE AaKhRT MIN KWEI HSH NHIN KTNI BRI MTAع THI JS KE BDLE ANHWN NE APNI JANWN KW BICh DALA، KASh ANHIN MعLWM HWTA!
2.103: AGR WH AIMAN AWR TQWIA AKhTIAR KRTE، TW ALLH KE HAN AS KA JW BDLH MLTA، WH AN KE LIE ZIADH BHTR THA، KASh AUNHIN KhBR HWTI
2.104: AE LWGW JW AIMAN LAEE HW: RAAعINAA NH KHA KRW، BLKH AUNZRNAA KHW AWR TWJH SE BAT KW SNW، IH KAFR TW عZAB ALIM KE MSTHQ HIN
2.105: IH LWG JNHWN NE DعWT HQ KW QBWL KRNE SE ANKAR KR DIA HE، KhWAH AHL KTAB MIN SE HWN IA MShRK HWN، HRGZ IH PSND NHIN KRTE KH TMHARE RB KI TRF SE TM PR KWEI BHLAEI NAZL HW، MGR ALLH JS KW ChAHTA HE، APNI RHMT KE LIE ChN LITA HE AWR WH BRA FZL FRMANE WALA HE
2.106: HM APNI JS AaIT KW MNSWKh KR DITE HIN IA BUHLA DITE HIN، AS KI JGH AS SE BHTR LE AaTE HIN IA KM AZ KM WISI HI KIA TM JANTE NHIN HW KH ALLH HR ChIZ PR QDRT RKHTA HE?
2.107: KIA TMHIN KhBR NHIN HE KH ZMIN AWR AaSMAN KI FRMANRWAEI ALLH HI KE LIE HE AWR AS KE SWA KWEI TMHARI KhBR GIRI KRNE AWR TMHARI MDD KRNE WALA NHIN HE?
2.108: PHR KIA TM APNE RSWL SE AS QSM KE SWALAT AWR MTALBH KRNA ChAHTE HW، JISE AS SE PHLE MWSIAؑ SE KIE JA ChKE HIN? HALANKH JS ShKhS NE AIMAN KI RWSh KW KFR KI RWSh SE BDL LIA WH RAH RAST SE BHTK GIA
2.109: AHL KTAB MIN SE AKSR LWG IH ChAHTE HIN KH KSI TRH TMHIN AIMAN SE PHIR KR PHR KFR KI TRF PLTA LE JAEIN AGRChH HQ AN PR ZAHR HW ChKA HE، MGR APNE NFS KE HSD KI BNA PR TMHARE LIE AN KI IH KhWAHSh HE AS KE JWAB MIN TM عFW W DR GZR SE KAM LW IHAN TK KH ALLH KhWD HI APNA FISLH NAFZ KR DE MTMEN RHW KH ALLH TعALIA HR ChIZ PR QDRT RKHTA HE
2.110: NMAZ QAEM KRW AWR ZKWAۃ DW TM APNI عAQBT KE LIE JW BHLAEI KMA KR AaGE BHIJW GE، ALLH KE HAN ASE MWJWD PAؤ GE JW KChH TM KRTE HW، WH SB ALLH KI NZR MIN HE
2.111: AN KA KHNA HE KH KWEI ShKhS JNT MIN NH JAEE GA JB TK KH WH IHWDI NH HW (IA عISAEIWN KE KhIAL KE MTABQ) عISAEI NH HW IH AN KI TMNAEIN HIN AN SE KHW، APNI DLIL PISh KRW، AGR TM APNE DعWE MIN SChE HW
2.112: DRASL NH TMHARI KChH KhSWSIT HE، NH KSI AWR KI HQ IH HE KH JW BHI APNI HSTI KW ALLH KI ATAعT MIN SWNP DE AWR عMLAAn NIK RWSh PR ChLE، AS KE LIE AS KE RB KE PAS AUS KA AJR HE AWR AISE LWGWN KE LIE KSI KhWF IA RNJ KA KWEI MWQع NHIN
2.113: IHWDI KHTE HIN: عISAEIWN KE PAS KChH NHIN عISAEI KHTE HIN: IHWDIWN KE PAS KChH NHIN HALANKH DWNWN HI KTAB PRHTE HIN AWR ASI QSM KE DعWE AN LWGWN KE BHI HIN، JN KE PAS KTAB KA عLM NHIN HE IH AKhTLAFAT JN MIN IH LWG MBTLA HIN، AN KA FISLH ALLH QIAMT KE RWZ KR DE GA
2.114: AWRAS ShKhS SE BRH KR ZALM KWN HWGA JW ALLH KE MعBDWN MIN AS KE NAM KI IAD SE RWKE AWR AN KI WIRANI KE DRPE HW? AISE LWG AS QABL HIN KH AN KI عBADT GAHWN MIN QDM NH RKHIN AWR AGR WHAN JAEIN BHI، TW DRTE HWEE JAEIN AN KE LIE TW DNIA MIN RSWAEI HE AWR AaKhRT MIN عZAB عZIM
2.115: MShRQ AWR MGhRB SB ALLH KE HIN JS TRF BHI TM RKh KRW GE، ASI TRF ALLH KA RKh HE ALLH BRI WSعT WALA AWR SB KChH JANNE WALA HE
2.116: AN KA QWL HE KH ALLH NE KSI KW BITA BNAIA HE ALLH PAK HE AN BATWN SE ASL HQIQT IH HE KH ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN KI TMAM MWJWDAT AS KI MLK HIN، SB KE SB AS KE MTIع FRMAN HIN
2.117: WH AaSMANWN AWR ZMIN KA MWJD HE AWR JS BAT KA WH FISLH KRTA HE، AS KE LIE BS IH HKM DITA HE KH "HW JA" AWR WH HW JATI HE
2.118: NADAN KHTE HIN KH ALLH KhWD HM SE BAT KIWN NHIN KRTA IA KWEI NShANI HMARE PAS KIWN NHIN AaTI? AISI HI BATIN AIN SE PHLE LWG BHI KIA KRTE THE AIN SB (AGLE PChHLE GMRAHWN) KI ZHNITIN AIK JISI HIN IQIN LANE WALWN KE LIE TW HM NShANIAN SAF SAF NMAIAN KR ChKE HIN
2.119: (AS SE BRH KR NShANI KIA HWGI KH) HM NE TM KW عLM HQ KE SATH KhWSh KhBRI DINE WALA WR DRANE WALA BNA KR BHIJA AB JW LWG JHNM SE RShTH JWR ChKE HIN، AN KI TRF SE TM ZMH DAR W JWAB DH NHIN HW
2.120: IHWDI AWR عISAEI TM SE HRGZ RAZI NH HWN GE، JB TK TM AN KE TRIQE PR NH ChLNE LGW SAF KHH DWKH RASTH BS WHI HE، JW ALLH NE BTAIA HE WRNH AGRAUS عLM KE BعD، JW TMHARE PAS Aa ChKA HE، TM NE AUN KI KhWAHShAT KI PIRWI KI، TW ALLH KI PKR SE BChANE WALA KWEI DWST AWR MDD GAR TMHARE LIE NHIN HE
2.121: JN LWGWN KW HM NE KTAB DI HE، WH AUSE AS TRH PRHTE HIN JISA KH PRHNE KA HQ HE WH AS PR SChE DL SE AIMAN LATE HIN AWR JWAS KE SATH KFR KA RWIH AKhTIAR KRIN، WHI ASL MIN NQSAN ATHANE WALE HIN
2.122: AE BNI ASRAEIL! IAD KRW MIRI WH NعMT، JS SE MIN NE TMHIN NWAZ A THA، AWR IH KH MIN NE TMHIN DNIA KI TMAM QWMWN PR FZILT DI THI
2.123: AWR DRW AUS DN SE، JB KWEI KSI KE ZRA KAM NH AaEE GA، NH KSI SE FDIH QBWL KIA JAEE GA، NH KWEI SFARSh HI AaDMI KW FAEDH DE GI، AWR NH MJRMWN KW KHIN SE KWEI MDD PHNCh SKE GI
2.124: IAD KRW KH JB ABRAHIMؑ KW AS KE RB NE ChND BATWN MIN AaZMA IA AWR WH AUN SB MIN PWRA ATR GIA، TW AS NE KHA: "MIN TJHE SB LWGWN KA PIShWA BNANE WALA HWN" ABRAHIMؑ NE عRZ KIA: "AWR KIA MIRI AWLAD SE BHI IHI WعDH HE?" AS NE JWAB DIA: "MIRA WعDH ZALMWN SE MTعLQ NHIN HE"
2.125: AWR IH KH HM NE AS GHR (KعBE) KW LWGWN KE LIE MRKZ AWR AMN KI JGH QRAR DIA THA AWR LWGWN KW HKM DIA THA KH ABRAHIMؑ JHAN عBADT KE LIE KHRA HWTA HE AS MQAM KW MSTQL JAEE NMAZ BNA LW AWR ABRAHIMؑ AWR A SMAعIL KW TAKID KI THI KH MIRE GHR KW TWAF AWR AعTKAF AWR RKWع AWR SJDH KRNE WALWN KE LIE PAK RKHW
2.126: AWR IH KH ABRAHIMؑ NE DعA KI: "AE MIRE RB، AS ShHR KW AMN KA ShHR BNA DE، AWR AS KE BAShNDWN MIN JW ALLH AWR AaKhRT KW MANIN، ANHIN HR QSM KE PHLW N KA RZQ DE" JWAB MIN AS KE RB NE FRMAIA: "AWR JW NH MANE GA، DNIA KI ChND RWZH ZNDGI KA SAMAN TWMIN AUSE BHI DWN GA MGR AaKhRKAR AUSE عZAB JHNM KI TRF GHSITWN GA، AWR WH BD TRIN THKANA HE"
2.127: AWR IAD KRW ABRAHIMؑ AWR ASMAعILؑ JB AS GHR KI DIWARIN ATHA RHE THE، TW DعA KRTE JATE THE: "AE HMARE RB، HM SE IH KhDMT QBWL FRMA LE، TW SB KI SNNE AWR SB KChH JANNE WALA HE
2.128: AE RB، HM DWNWN KW APNA MSLM (MUTIع FRMAN) BNA، HMARI NSL SE AIK AISI QWM ATHA، JW TIRI MSLM HW، HMIN APNI عBADT KE TRIQE BTA، AWR HMARI KWTAHIWN SE DR GZR FRMA، TW BRA MعAF KRNE WALA AWR RHM FRMANE WALA HE
2.129: AWR AE RB، AN LWGWN MIN KhWD ANHIN KI QWM SE AIK AISA RSWL ATHA EIW، JW ANHIN TIRI AaIAT SNAEE، AN KW KTAB AWR HKMT KI TعLIM DE AWR AN KI ZNDGIAN SNWARE TW BRA MQTDR AWR HKIM HE"
2.130: AB KWN HE، JW ABRAHIMؑ KE TRIQE SE NFRT KRE? JS NE KhWD APNE AaP KW HMAQT W JHALT MIN MBTLA KR LIA HW، AS KE SW A KWN IH HRKT KRSKTA HE? ABRAHIMؑ TW WH ShKhS HE، JS KW HM NE DNIA MIN APNE KAM KE LIE ChUN LIA THA AWR AaKhRT MIN AS KA ShMAR SALHIN MIN HWGA
2.131: AS KA HAL IH THA KH JB AS KE RB NE AS SE KHA: "MSLM HW JA"، TW AS NE FWRAAn KHA: "MIN MALK KAENAT KA "MSLM" HW GIA"
2.132: ASI TRIQE PR ChLNE KI HDAIT AS NE APNI AWLAD KW KI THI AWR ASI KI WSIT IعQWBؑ APNI AWLAD KW KR GIA AS NE KHA THA KH: "MIRE BChW! ALLH NE TMHARE LIE IHI DIN PSND KIA HE LHAZA MRTE DM TK MSLM HI RHNA"
2.133: PHR KIA TM AS WQT MWJWD THE، JB IعQWBؑ AS DNIA SE RKhST HW RHA THA?AS NE MRTE WQT APNE BChWN SE PWChHA: "BChW! MIRE BعD TM KS KI BNDGI KRW GE?" AN SB NE JWAB DIA: "HM ASI AIK KhDA KI BNDGI KRIN GE JSE AaP NE AWR AaP KE BZRGWN ABRAHIMؑ، ASMAعILؑ AWR ASHAQؑ NE KhDA MANA HE AWR HM AUSI KE MSLM HIN"
2.134: WH KChH LWG THE، JW GZR GEE JW KChH ANHWN NE KMAIA، WH AUN KE LIE HE AWR JW KChH TM KMAؤ GE، WH TMHARE LIE HE TM SE IH NH PWChHA JAEE GA KH WH KIA KRTE THE
2.135: IHWDI KHTE HIN: IHWDI HW TW RAH RAST PAؤ GE عISAEI KHTE HIN: عISAEI HW، TW HDAIT MLE GI AIN SE KHW: "NHIN، BLKH SB KW ChHWR KR ABRAHIMؑ KA TRIQH AWR ABRAHIMؑ MShR KW N MIN SE NH THA"
2.136: MSLMANW! KHW KH: "HM AIMAN LAEE ALLH PR AWR AS HDAIT PR JW HMARI TRF NAZL HWEI HE AWR JW ABRAHIMؑ، ASMAعILؑ، ASHAQؑ، IعQWBؑ AWR AWLAD IعQWBؑ KI TRF NAZL HWEI THI AWR JW MWSIAؑ AWR عISIAؑ AWR DWSRE TMAM PIGhMBRWN KW AUN KE RB KI TRF SE DI GEI THI HM AN KE DRMIAN KWEI TFRIQ NHIN KRTE AWR HM ALLH KE MSLM HIN"
2.137: PHR AGR WH AUSI TRH AIMAN LAEIN، JS TRH TM LAEE HW، TW HDAIT PR HIN، AWR AGRAS SE MNH PHIRIN، TW KHLI BAT HE KH WH HT DHRMI MIN PR GEE HIN LHAZA ATMINAN RKHW KH AUN KE MQABLE MIN ALLH TMHARI HMAIT KE LIE KAFI HE WH SB KChH SNTA AWR JANTA HE

2.139: AE NBIؐ! AIN SE KHW: "KIA TM ALLH KE BARE MIN HM SE JHGRTE HW?HALANKH WHI HMARA RB BHI HE AWR TMHARA RB BHI HMARE AعMAL HMARE LIE HIN، TMHARE AعMAL TMHARE LIE، AWR HM ALLH HI KE LIE APNI BNDGI KW KhALS KR ChKE HIN
2.140: IA PHR KIA TMA RA KHNA IH HE KH ABRAHIMؑ، ASMAعILؑ، ASHAQؑ، IعQWBؑ AWR AWLAD IعQWBؑ SB KE SB IHWDI THE IA NSRANI THE? KHW: "TM ZIADH JANTE HW IA ALLH? AUS ShKhS SE BRA ZALM AWR KWN HWGA JS KE ZME ALLH KI TRF SE AIK GWAHI HW AWR WH AUSE ChHPAEE? TMHARI HRKAT SE ALLH GhAFL TW NHIN HE
2.141: WH KChH LWG THE، JW GZR ChKE AUN KI KMAEI AUN KE LIE THI AWR TMHARI KMAEI TMHARE LIE TM SE AUN KE AعMAL KE MTعLQ SWAL NHIN HWGA"
2.142: NADAN LWG ZRWR KHIN GE : AINHIN KIA HWA KH PHLE IH JS QBLE KI TRF RKh KR KE NMAZ PRHTE THE، AS SE IKAIK PHR GEE? AE NBI، AN SE KHW: "MShRQ AWR MGhRB SB ALLH KE HIN ALLH JSE ChAHTA HE، SIDHI RAH DKHA DITA HE
2.143: AWR AISI TRH TW HM NE TMHIN AIK "AMT WST" BNAIA HE TAKH TM DNIA KE LWGWN PR GWAH HW AWR RSWL TM PR GWAH HW PHLE JS TRF TM RKh KRTE THE، AS KW TW HM NE SRF IH DIKHNE KE LIE QBLH MQRR KIA THA KH KWN RSWL KI PIRWI KRTA HE AWR KWN ALTA PHR JATA HE IH MعAMLH THA TW BRA SKhT، MGR AUN LWGWN KE LIE KChH BHI SKhT NH SABT HWA، JW ALLH KI HDAIT SE FIZ IAB THE ALLH TMHARE AS AIMAN KW HRGZ ZAEع NH KRE GA، IQIN JANW KH WH LWGWN KE HQ MIN NHAIT ShFIQ W RHIM HE
2.144: IH TMHARE MNH KA BAR BAR AaSMAN KI TRF ATHNA HM DIKH RHE HIN LW، HM AUSI QBLE KI TRF TMHIN PHIRE DITE HIN، JSE TM PSND KRTE HW MSJD HRAM KI TRF RUKh PHIR DW AB JHAN KHIN TM HW، AUSI KI TRF MNH KR KE NMAZ PRHA KRW IH LWG JNHIN KTAB DI GEI THI، KhW B JANTE HIN KH (THWIL QBLH KA) IH HKM AN KE RB HI KI TRF SE HE AWR BR HQ HE، MGRA S KE BAWJWD JW KChH IH KR RHE HIN، ALLH AS SE GhAFL NHIN HE
2.145: TM AN AHL KTAB KE PAS KhWAH KWEI NShANI LE Aaؤ، MMKN NHIN KH IH TMHARE QBLE KI PIRWI KRNE LGIN، AWR NH TMHARE LIE IH MMKN HE KH AN KE QBLE KI PIRWI KRW، AWR AN MIN SE KWEI GRWH BHI DWSRE KE QBLE KI PIRWI KE LIE TIAR NHIN HE، AW R AGR TM NE AS عLM KE BعD JW TMHARE PAS Aa ChKA HE، AN KI KhWAHShAT KI PIRWI KI، TW IQINAAn TMHARA ShMAR ZALMWN MIN HWGA
2.146: JN LWGWN KW HM NE KTAB DI HE، WH AIS MQAM KW (JSE QBLH BNAIA GIA HE) AISA PHChANTE HIN، JISA APNI AWLAD KW PHChANTE HIN MGR AN MIN SE AIK GRWH JANTE BWJHTE HQ KW ChHPA RHA HE
2.147: IH QTعI AIK AMR HQ HE TMHARE RB KI TRF SE، LHAZA AS KE MTعLQ TM HRGZ KSI ShK MIN NH PRW

7.69: KIA TMHIN AS BAT PR TعJB HWA KH TMHARE PAS KhWD TMHARI APNI QWM KE AIK AaDMI KE ZRIعH SE TMHARE RB KI IAD DHANI AaEI TAKH WH TMHIN KhBRDAR KRE? 7.75: AUS KI QWM KE SRDARWN NE JW BRE BNE HWEE THE، KMZWR TBQH KE AUN LWGWN SE JW AIMAN LE AaEE THE KHA "KIA TM WAQعI IH JANTE HW KH SALHؑ APNE RB KA PIGhMBR HE?" ANHWN NE JWAB DIA "BE ShK JS PIGhAM KE SATH WH BHIJA GIA HE AUSE HM MANTE HIN"
7.76: AUN BRAEI KE MDعIWN NE KHA JS ChIZ KW TM NE MANA HE HM AS KE MNKR HIN"
7.77: PHR ANHWN NE AS AWNTNI KW MAR DALA AWR PWRE TMRD KE SATH APNE RB KE HKM KI KhLAF WRZI KR GZRE، AWR SALHؑ SE KHH DIA KH LE Aa WH عZAB JS KI TW HMIN DHMKI DITA HE AGR TW WAQعI PIGhMBRWN MIN SE HE
7.78: AaKhR KA R AIK DHLA DINE WALI AaFT NE AUNHIN Aa LIA AWR WH APNE GHRWN MIN AWNDHE PRE KE PRE RH GEE
7.79: AWR SALHؑ IH KHTA HWA AN KI BSTIWN SE NKL GIA KH "AE MIRI QWM، MIN NE APNE RB KA PIGhAM TJHE PHNChA DIA AWR MIN NE TIRI BHT KhIR KhWAHI KI، MGR MIN KIA KRWN KH TJHE APNE KhIR KhWAH PSND HI NHIN HIN"
7.80: AWR LWTؑ KW HM NE PIGhMBR BNA KR BHIJA، PHR IAD KRW JB AUS NE APNI QWM SE KHA "KIA TM AISE BE HIA HW GEE HW، KH WH FHSh KAM KRTE HW JW TM SE PHLE DNIA MIN KSI NE NHIN KIA?

7.84: BChA KR NKAL DIA AWR AS QWM PR BRSAEI AIK BARSh، PHR DIKHW KH AUN MJRMWN KA KIA ANJAM HWA
7.85: AWR MDIN WALWN KI TRF HM NE AN KE BHAEI ShعIBؑ KW BHIJA AS NE KHA "AE BRADRAN QWM، ALLH KI BNDGI KRW، AUS KE SWA TMHARA KWEI KhDA NHIN HE TMHARE PAS TMHARE RB KI SAF RHNMAEI Aa GEI HE، LHAZA WZN AWR PIMANE PWRE KRW، LWGWN KW AUN KI ChIZWN MIN GHATA NH DW، AWR ZMIN MIN FSAD BRPA NH KRW JB KH AS KI ASLAH HW ChKI HE، ASI MIN TMHARI BHLAEI HE AGR TM WAQعI MWMN HW

7.88: AS KI QWM KE SRDARWN NE، JW APNI BRAEI KE GHMND MIN MBTLA THE، A S SE KHA KH "AE ShعIBؑ، HM TJHE AWR AUN LWGWN KW JW TIRE SATH AIMAN LAEE HIN APNI BSTI SE NKAL DIN GE WRNH TM LWGWN KW HMARI MLT MIN WAPS AaNA HWGA" ShعIBؑ NE JWAB DIA "KIA ZBRDSTI HMIN PHIRA JAEE GA KhWAH HM RAZI NH HWN?
7.89: HM ALLH PR JHWT GHRNE WALE HWN GE AGR TMHARI MLT MIN PLT AaEIN JBKH ALLH HMIN AS SE NJAT DE ChKA HE HMARE LIE TW AS KI TRF PLTNA AB KSI TRH MMKN NHIN ALA IH KH KhDA HMARA RB HI AISA ChAHE HMARE RB KA عLM HR ChIZ PR HAWI HE، AUSI PR HM NE AعTMAD KR LIA AE RB، HMARE AWR HMARI QWM KE DRMIAN THIK THIK FISLH KR DE AWR TW BHTRIN FISLH KRNE WALA HE"
7.90: AS KI QWM KE SRDARWN NE، JW AS KI BAT MANNE SE ANKAR KR ChKE THE، AaPS MIN KHA "AGR TM NE ShعIBؑ KI PIRWI QBWL KR LI TW BRBAD HW JAؤ GE"
7.91: MGR HWA IH KH AIK DHLA DINE WALI AaFT NE AUN KW Aa LIA AWR WH APNE GHRWN MIN AWNDHE PRE KE PRE RH GEE

7.93: AWR ShعIBؑ IH KHH KR AN KI BSTIWN SE NKL GIA KH "AE BRADRAN QWM، MIN NE APNE RB KE PIGhAMAT TMHIN PHNChA DIE AWR TMHARI KhIR KhWAHI KA HQ ADA KR DIA AB MIN AUS QWM PR KISE AFSWS KRWN JW QBWL HQ SE ANKAR KRTI HE"

7.95: PHR HM NE AN KI BDHALI KW KhWSh HALI SE BDL DIA IHAN TK KH WH KhWB PHLE PHWLE AWR KHNE LGE KH "HMARE ASLAF PR BHI AChHE AWR BRE DN AaTE HI RHE HIN" AaKhR KAR HM NE ANHIN AChANK PKR LIA AWR ANHIN KhBR TK NH HWEI
7.96: AGR BSTIWN KE LWG AIMAN LATE AWR TQWIA KI RWSh AKhTIAR KRTE TW HM AN PR AaSMAN AWR ZMIN SE BRKTWN KE DRWAZE KHW L DITE، MGR AUNHWN NE TW JHTLAIA، LHAZA HM NE AUS BRI KMAEI KE HSAB MIN ANHIN PKR LIA JW WH SMIT RHE THE
7.97: PHR KIA BSTIWN KE LWG AB AS SE BE KhWF HW GEE HIN KH HMARI GRFT KBHI AChANK AUN PR RAT KE WQT NH Aa JAEE GI JB KH WH SWTE PRE HWN?
7.98: IA ANHIN ATMINAN HW GIA HE KH HMARA MZBWT HATH KBHI IKAIK AN PR DN KE WQT NH PRE GA JB KH WH KHIL RHE HWN?
7.99: KIA IH LWG ALLH KI ChAL SE BE KhWF HIN? HALANKH ALLH KI ChAL SE WHI QWM BE KhWF HWTI HE JW TBAH HWNE WALI HW
7.100: AWR KIA AUN LWGWN KW JW SABQ AHL ZMIN KE BعD ZMIN KE WARS HWTE HIN، AIS AMR WAQعI NE KChH SBQ NHIN DIA KH AGR HM ChAHIN TW AN KE QSWRWN PR ANHIN PKR SKTE HIN? (MGR WH SBQ AaMWZ HQAEQ SE TGhAFL BRTTE HIN) AWR HM AN KE DLWN PR MHR LGA DITE HIN، PHR WH KChH NHIN SNTE
7.101: IH QWMIN JN KE QSE HM TMHIN SNA RHE HIN (TMHARE SAMNE MSAL MIN MWJWD HIN) AN KE RSWL AN KE PA S KHLI KHLI NShANIAN LE KR AaEE، MGR JS ChIZ KW WH AIK DFعH JHTLA ChKE THE PHR AUSE WH MANNE WALE NH THE DIKHW AS TRH HM MNKRIN HQ KE DLWN PR MHR LGA DITE HIN
7.102: HM NE AN MIN SE AKSR MIN KWEI PAS عHD NH PAIA BLKH AKSR KW FASQ HI PAIA

7.104: MWSIAؑ NE KHA "AE FRعWN، MIN KAENAT KE MALK KI TRF SE BHIJA HWA AaIA HW N
7.105: MIRA MNSB IHI HE KH ALLH KA NAM LE KR KWEI BAT HQ KE SWA NH KHWN، MIN TM LWGWN KE PAS TMHARE RB KI TRF SE SRIH DLIL MAMWRIT LE KR AaIA HWN، LHAZA TW BNI ASRAEIL KW MIRE SATH BHIJ DE"
7.106: FRعWN NE KHA "AGR TW KWEI NShANI LAIA HE AWR APNE DعWE MIN SChA HE TW ASE PISh KR"

7.120: AWR JADWGRWN KA HAL IH HWA KH GWIA KSI ChIZ NE ANDR SE ANHIN SJDE MIN GRA DIA
7.121: KHNE LGE "HM NE MAN LIA RB ALعALMIN KW
7.122: AUS RB KW JSE MWSIAؑ AWR HARWNؑ MANTE HIN"

7.130: HM NE FRعWN KE LWGWN KW KEI SAL TK QHT AWR PIDAWAR KI KMI MIN MBTLA RKHA KH ShAID AN KW HWSh AaEE

7.133: AaKhR KAR HM NE AN PR TWFAN BHIJA، TDI DL ChHWRE، SRSRIAN PHILAEIN، MINDK NKALE، AWR KhW N BRSAIA IH SB NShANIAN ALG ALG KR KE DKHAEIN، MGR WH SR KShI KIE ChLE GEE AWR WH BRE HI MJRM LWG THE

7.135: MGR JB HM AN PR SE APNA عZAB AIK WQT MQRR TK KE LIE، JS KW WH BHRHAL PHNChNE WALE THE، HTA LITE TW WH IKLKhT APNE عHD SE PHR JATE
7.136: TB HM NE AUN SE ANTQAM LIA AWR ANHIN SMNDR MIN GhRQ KR DIA KIWNKH ANHWN NE HMARI NShANIWN KW JHTLAIA THA AWR AUN SE BE PRWA HW GEE THE
7.137: AWR AUN KI JGH HM NE AUN LWGWN KW JW KMZWR BNA KR RKHE GEE THE، AUS SRZMIN KE MShRQ W MGhRB KA WARS BNA DIA JSE HM NE BRKTWN SE MALA MAL KIA THA AS TRH BNI ASRAEIL KE HQ MIN TIRE RB KA WعDH KhIR PWRA HWA KIWNKH AUNHWN NE SBR SE KAM LIA THA AWR FRعWN AWR AS KI QWM KA WH SB KChH BRBAD KR DIA GIA JW WH BNATE AWR ChRHATE THE
7.138: BNI ASRAEIL KW HM NE SMNDR SE GZAR DIA، PHR WH ChLE AWR RASTE MIN AIK AISI QWM PR AUN KA GZR HWA JW APNE ChND BTWN KI GRWIDH BNI HWEI THI KHNE LGE، "AE MWSIAؑ، HMARE LIE BHI KWEI AISA MعBWD BNA DE JISE AIN LWGWN KE MعBWD HIN" MWSIAؑ NE KHA "TM LWG BRI NADANI KI BATIN KRTE HW
7.139: IH LWG JS TRIQH KI PIRWI KR RHE HIN WH TW BRBAD HWNE WALA HE AWR JW عML WH KR RHE HIN WH SRASR BATL HE"
7.140: PHR MWSIAؑ NE KHA "KIA MIN ALLH KE SWA KWEI AWR MعBWD TMHARE LIE TLASh KRWN? HALANKH WH ALLH HI HE JS NE TMHIN DNIA BHR KI QWMWN PR FZILT BKhShI HE
7.141: AWR (ALLH FRMATA HE) WH WQT IAD KRW JB HM NE FRعWN WALWN SE TMHIN NJAT DI JN KA HAL IH THA KH TMHIN SKhT عZAB MIN MBTLA RKHTE THE، TMHARE BITWN KW QTL KRTE AWR TMHARI عWRTWN KW ZNDH RHNE DITE THE AWR AS MIN TMHARE RB KI TRF SE TMHARI BRI AaZMAESh THI
7.142: HM NE MWSIAؑ KW TIS ShB W RWZ KE LIE (KWH SINA PR) TLB KIA AWR BعD MIN DS DN KA AWR AZAFH KR DIA، AIS TRH AUS KE RB KI MQRR KRDH MDT PWRE ChALIS DN HW GEI MWSIAؑ NE ChLTE HWEE APNE BHAEI HARWNؑ SE KHA KH "MIRE PIChHE TM MIRI QWM MIN MIRI JANShINI KRNA AWR THIK KAM KRTE RHNA AWR BGAR PIDA KRNE WALWN KE TRIQE PR NH ChLNA"
7.143: JB WH HMARE MQRR KIE HWEE WQT PR PHNChA AWR AS KE RB NE AS SE KLAM KIA TW AS NE ALTJA KI KH "AE RB، MJHE IARAEE NZR DE KH MIN TJHE DIKHWN" FRMAIA "TW MJHE NHIN DIKH SKTA HAN ZRA SAMNE KE PHAR KI TRF DIKH، AGR WH APNI JGH QAEM RH JAEE TW ALBTH TW MJHE DIKH SKE GA" ChNANChH AS KE RB NE JB PHAR PR TJLI KI TW ASE RIZH RIZH KR DIA AWR MWSIAؑ GhSh KHA KR GR PRA JB HWSh AaIA TW BWLA "PAK HE TIRI ZAT، MIN TIRE HZWR TWBH KRTA HWN AWR SB SE PHLA AIMAN LANE WALA MIN HWN"
7.144: FRMAIA "AE MWSIAؑ، MIN NE TMAM LWGWN PR TRJIH DE KR TJHE MNTKhB KIA KH MIR I PIGhMBRI KRE AWR MJH SE HM KLAM HW PS JW KChH MIN TJHE DWN ASE LE AWR ShKR BJALA"
7.145: AS KE BعD HM NE MWSIAؑ KW HR ShعBH ZNDGI KE MTعLQ NSIHT AWR HR PHLW KE MTعLQ WAZH HDAIT TKhTIWN PR LKH KR DE DI AWR AS SE KHA: "AIN HDAIAT KW MZBWT HATHWN SE SNBHAL AWR APNI QWM KW HKM DE KH AN KE BHTR MFHWM KI PIRWI KRIN عNQRIB MIN TMHIN FASQWN KE GHR DKHAؤN GA
7.146: MIN APNI NShANIWN SE AUN LWGWN KI NGAHIN PHIR DWN GA JW BGhIR KSI HQ KE ZMIN MIN BRE BNTE HIN، WH KhWAH KWEI NShANI DIKH LIN KBHI AS PR AIMAN NH LAEIN GE، AGR SIDHA RASTH AUN KE SAMNE AaEE TW ASE AKhTIAR NH KRIN GE AWR AGR TITRHA RASTH NZR AaEE TW AS PR ChL PRIN GE، AS LIE KH ANHWN NE HMARI NShANIWN KW JHTLAIA AWR AN SE BE PRWAEI KRTE RHE
7.147: HMARI NShANIWN KW JS KSI NE JHTLAIA AWR AaKhRT KI PIShI KA ANKAR KIA AUS KE SARE AعMAL ZAEع HW GEE KIA LWG AIS KE SWA KChH AWR JZA PA SKTE HIN KH JISA KRIN WISA BHRIN?"
7.148: MWSIAؑ KE PIChHE AS KI QWM KE LWGWN NE APNE ZIWRWN SE AIK BChHRE KA PTLA BNA LIA JS MIN SE BIL KI SI AaWAZ NKLTI THI KIA AUNHIN NZR NH AaTA THA KH WH NH AN SE BWLTA HE NH KSI MعAMLH MIN AN KI RHNMAEI KRTA HE? MGR PHR BHI AUNHWN NE ASE MعBWD BNA LIA AWR WH SKhT ZALM THE
7.149: PHR JB AN KI FRIB KhWRDGI KA TLSM TWT GIA AW R AUNHWN NE DIKH LIA KH DR HQIQT WH GMRAH HW GEE HIN TW KHNE LGE KH "AGR HMARE RB NE HM PR RHM NH FRMAIA AWR HM SE DRGZR NH KIA TW HM BRBAD HW JAEIN GE"
7.150: ADHR SE MWSIAؑ GhSE AWR RNJ MIN BHRA HWA APNI QWM KI TRF PLTA AaTE HI AS NE KHA "BHT BRI JANShINI KI TM LWGWN NE MIRE BعD! KIA TM SE ATNA SBR NH HWA KH APNE RB KE HKM KA ANTZAR KR LITE?" AWR TKhTIAN PHINK DIN AWR APNE BHA EI (HARWNؑ) KE SR KE BAL PKR KR ASE KHINChA HARWNؑ NE KHA "AE MIRI MAN KE BITE، AIN LWGWN NE MJHE DBA LIA AWR QRIB THA KH MJHE MAR DALTE PS TW DShMNWN KW MJH PR HNSNE KA MWQع NH DE AWR AS ZALM GRWH KE SATH MJHE NH ShAML KR"

7.152: (JWAB MIN ARShAD HWA KH) "JN LWGWN NE BChHRE KW MعBWD BNAIA WH ZRWR APNE RB KE GhZB MIN GRFTAR HW KR RHIN GE AWR DNIA KI ZNDGI MIN ZLIL HWN GE JHWT GHRNE WALWN KW HM AISI HI SZA DITE HIN
7.153: AWR JW LWG BRE عML KRIN PHR TWBH KR LIN AWR AIMAN LE AaEIN TW IQINAAn AIS TWBH W AIMAN KE BعD TIRA RB DRGZR AWR RHM FRMANE WALA HE"

11.105: JB WH AaEE GA TW KSI KW BAT KRNE KI MJAL NH HWGI، ALA IH KH KhDA KI AJAZT SE KChH عRZ KRE PHR KChH LWG AS RWZ BD BKhT HWN GE AWR KChH NIK BKhT
11.106: JW BD BKhT HWN GE WH DWZKh MIN JAEIN GE (JHAN GRMI AWR PIAS KI ShDT SE) WH HANPIN GE AWR PHNKARE MARIN GE

11.108: RHE WH LWG JW NIK BKhT NKLIN GE، TW WH JNT MIN JAEIN GE AWR WHAN HMIShH RHIN GE JB TK ZMIN W AaSMAN QAEM HIN، ALA IH KH TIRA RB KChH AWR ChAHE AISI BKhShSh AN KW MLE GI JS KA SLSLH KBHI MNQTع NH HWGA
11.109: PS AE NBIؐ، TW AN MعBWDWN KI TRF SE KSI ShK MIN NH RH JN KI IH LWG عBADT KR RHE HIN IH TW (BS LKIR KE FQIR BNE HWEE) AUSI TRH PWJA PAT KIE JA RHE HIN JS TRH PHLE AN KE BAP DADA KRTE THE، AWR HM AIN KA HSH AINHIN BHRPWR DIN GE BGhIR AS KE KH AS MIN KChH KAT KSR HW
11.110: HM AS SE PHLE MWSIAؑ KW BHI KTAB DE ChKE HIN AWR AS KE BARE MIN BHI AKhTLAF KIA GIA THA (JS TRH AaJ AIS KTAB KE BARE MIN KIA JA RHA HE JW TMHIN DI GEI HE) AGR TIRE RB KI TRF SE AIK BAT PHLE HI TE NH KR DI GEI HWTI TW AIN AKhTLAF KRNE WALWN KE DRMIAN KBHI KA FISLH ChKA DIA GIA HWTA IH WAQعH HE KH IH LWG AS KI TRF SE ShK AWR KhLJAN MIN PRE HWEE HIN

11.112: PS AE MHMDؐ، TM، AWR TMHARE WH SATHI JW (KFR W BGhAWT SE AIMAN W TAعT KI TRF) PLT AaEE HIN، THIK THIK RAH RAST PR SABT QDM RHW JISA KH TMHIN HKM DIA GIA HE AWR BNDGI KI HD SE TJAWZ NH KRW JW KChH TM KR RHE HW AS PR TMHARA RB NGAH RKHTA HE
11.113: AIN ZALMWN KI TRF ZRA NH JHKNA WRNH JHNM KI LPIT MIN Aa JAؤ GE AWR TMHIN KWEI AISA WLI W SRPRST NH MLE GA JW KhDA SE TMHIN BChA SKE AWR KHIN SE TM KW MDD NH PHNChE GI
11.114: AWR DIKHW، NMAZ QAEM KRW DN KE DWNWN SRWN PR AWR KChH RAT GZRNE PR DRHQIQT NIKIAN BRAEIWN KW DWR KR DITI HIN، IH AIK IAD DHANI HE AN LWGWN KE LIE JW KhDA KW IAD RKHNE WALE HIN
11.115: AWR SBR KR، ALLH NIKI KRNE WALWN KA AJR KBHI ZAEع NHIN KRTA
11.116: PHR KIWN NH AUN QWMWN MIN JW TM SE PHLE GZR ChKI HIN AISE AHL KhIR MWJWD RHE JW LWGWN KW ZMIN MIN FSAD BRPA KRNE SE RWKTE? 11.117: TIRA RB AISA NHIN HE KH BSTIWN KW NAHQ TBAH KR DE HALANKH AN KE BAShNDE ASLAH KRNE WALE HWN
11.118: BE ShK TIRA RB AGR ChAHTA TW TMAM ANSANWN KW AIK GRWH BNA SKTA THA، MGR AB TW WH MKhTLF TRIQWN HI PR ChLTE RHIN GE
11.119: AWR BE RAH RWIWN SE SRF WH LWG BChIN GE JN PR TIRE RB KI RHMT HE AISI (AaZADI ANTKhAB W AKhTIAR) KE LIE HI TW AS NE ANHIN PIDA KIA THA AWR TIRE RB KI WH BAT PWRI HW GEI JW AS NE KHI THI KH MIN JHNM KW JN AWR ANSAN، SB SE BHR DWN GA
11.120: AWR AE MHMDؐ، IH PIGhMBRWN KE QSE JW HM TMHIN SNATE HIN، WH ChIZIN HIN JN KE ZRIعE SE HM TMHARE DL KW MZBWT KRTE HIN AN KE ANDR TM KW HQIQT KA عLM MLA AWR AIMAN LANE WALWN KW NSIHT AWR BIDARI NSIB HWEI
11.121: RHE WH LWG JW AIMAN NHIN LATE، TW AN SE KHH DW KH TM APNE TRIQE PR KAM KRTE RHW AWR HM APNE TRIQE PR KIE JATE HIN

12.1: A، L، R IH AUS KTAB KI AaIAT HIN JW APNA MDعA SAF SAF BIAN KRTI HE
12.2: HM NE ASE NAZL KIA HE QRAaN BNA KR عRBI ZBAN MIN TAKH TM (AHL عRB) AS KW AChHI TRH SMJH SKW

12.4: IH AUS WQT KA ZKR HE JB IWSFؑ NE APNE BAP SE KHA "ABA JAN، MIN NE KhWAB DIKHA HE KH GIARH STARE HIN AWR SWRJ AWR ChAND HIN AWR WH MJHE SJDH KR RHE HIN"

12.6: AWR AISA HI HWGA (JISA TW NE KhWAB MIN DIKHA HE KH) TIRA RB TJHE (APNE KAM KE LIE) MNTKhB KRE GA AWR TJHE BATWN KI TH TK PHNChNA SKHAEE GA AWR TIRE AWPR AWR AaL IعQWBؑ PR APNI NعMT ASI TRH PWRI KRE GA JS TRH AS SE PHLE WH TIRE BZRGWN، ABRAHIMؑ AWR ASHAQؑ PR KR ChKA HE، IQINAAn TIRA RB عLIM AWR HKIM HE"
12.7: HQIQT IH HE KH IWSFؑ AWR AS KE BHAEIWN KE QSH MIN AIN PWChHNE WALWN KE LIE BRI NShANIAN HIN
12.8: IH QSH IWN ShRWع HWTA HE KH AS KE BHAEIWN NE AaPS MIN KHA "IH IWSFؑ AWR AS KA BHAEI، DWNWN HMARE WALD KW HM SB SE ZIADH MHBWB HIN HALANKH HM AIK PWRA JTHA HIN SChI BAT IH HE KH HMARE ABA JAN BA LKL HI BHK GEE HIN
12.9: ChLW IWSFؑ KW QTL KR DW IA ASE KHIN PHINK DW TAKH TMHARE WALD KI TWJH SRF TMHARI HI TRF HW JAEE IH KAM KR LINE KE BعD PHR NIK BN RHNA"
12.10: AS PR AN MIN SE AIK BWLA "IWSFؑ KW QTL NH KRW، AGR KChH KRNA HI HE TW ASE KSI ANDHE KNWIN MIN DAL DW KWEI AaTA JATA QAFLH ASE NKAL LE JAEE GA"

12.12: KL ASE HMARE SATH BHIJ D IJIE، KChH ChR ChG LE GA AWR KHIL KWD SE BHI DL BHLAEE GA HM AS KI HFAZT KW MWJWD HIN"
12.13: BAP NE KHA "TMHARA ASE LE JANA MJHE ShAQ GZRTA HE AWR MJH KW ANDIShH HE KH KHIN ASE BHIRIA NH PHAR KHA EE JBKH TM AS SE GhAFL HW"
12.14: ANHWN NE JWAB DIA "AGR HMARE HWTE ASE BHR IE NE KHA LIA، JBKH HM AIK JTHA HIN، TB TW HM BRE HI NKME HWN GE"
12.15: AIS TRH ASRAR KR KE JB WH AUSE LE GEE AWR ANHWN NE TE KR LIA KH ASE AIK ANDHE KNWIN MIN ChHWR DIN، TW HM NE IWSFؑ KW WHI KI KH "AIK WQT AaEE GA JB TW AN LWGWN KW AN KI IH HRKT JTAEE GA، IH APNE FعL KE NTAEJ SE BE KhBR HIN"
12.16: ShAM KW WH RWTE PITTE APNE BAP KE PAS AaEE
12.17: AWR KHA "ABA JAN، HM DWR KA MQABLH KRNE MIN LG GEE THE AWR IWSFؑ KW HM NE APNE SAMAN KE PAS ChHWR DIA THA KH ATNE MIN BHIRIA Aa KR AUSE KHA GIA AaP HMARI BAT KA IQIN NH KRIN GE ChAHE HM SChE HI HWN"
12.18: AWR WH IWSFؑ KE QMIS PR JHWT MWT KA KhWN LGA KR AaEE THE IH SN KR AN KE BAP NE KHA "BLKH TMHARE NFS NE TMHARE LIE AIK BRE KAM KW AaSAN BNA DIA AChHA، SBR KRWN GA AWR BKhWBI KRWN GA، JW BAT TM BNA RHE HW AS PR ALLH HI SE MDD MANGI JA SKTI HE"
12.19: ADHR AIK QAFLH AaIA AWR AUS NE APNE SQE KW PANI LANE KE LIE BHIJA SQE NE JW KNWIN MIN DWL DALA TW (IWSFؑ KW DIKH KR) PKAR ATHA "MBARK HW، IHAN TW AIK LRKA HE" AN LWGWN NE AS KW MAL TJART SMJH KR ChHPA LIA، HALANKH JW KChH WH KR RHE THE KhDA AS SE BAKhBR THA
12.20: AaKhR KAR ANHWN NE AS KW THWRI SI QIMT PR ChND DRHMWN KE عWZ BICh DALA AWR WH AS KI QIMT KE MعAMLH MIN KChH ZIADH KE AMIDWAR NH THE
12.21: MSR KE JS ShKhS NE ASE KhRIDA AS NE APNI BIWI SE KHA "AIS KW AChHI TRH RKHNA، BعID NHIN KH IH HMARE LIE MFID SABT HW IA HM ASE BITA BNA LIN" AS TRH HM NE IWSFؑ KE LIE AUS SRZMIN MIN QDM JMANE KI SWRT NKALI AWR ASE MعAMLH FHMI KI TعLIM DINE KA ANTZAM KIA ALLH APNA KAM KR KE RHTA HE، MGR AKSR LWG JANTE NHIN HIN

12.23: JS عWRT KE GHR MIN WH THA WH AUS PR DWRE DALNE LGI AWR AIK RWZ DRWAZE BND KR KE BWLI "Aa JA" IWSFؑ NE KHA "KhDA KI PNAH، MIRE RB NE TW MJHE AChHI MNZLT BKhShI (AWR MIN IH KAM KRWN!) AISE ZALM KBHI FLAH NHIN PAIA KRTE"
12.24: WH AUS KI TRF BRHI AWR IWSFؑ BHI AS KI TRF BRHTA AGR APNE RB KI BRHAN NH DIKH LITA AISA HWA، TAKH HM AS SE BDI AWR BE HIAEI KW DWR KR DIN، DR HQIQT WH HMARE ChNE HWEE BNDWN MIN SE THA
12.25: AaKhR KAR IWSFؑ AWR WH AaGE PIChHE DRWAZE KI TRF BHAGE AWR AS NE PIChHE SE IWSFؑ KA QMIS (KHINCh KR) PHAR DIA DRWAZE PR DWNWN NE AS KE ShWHR KW MWJWD PAIA ASE DIKHTE HI عWRT KHNE LGI، "KIA SZA HE AS ShKhS KI JW TIRI GHR WALI PR NIT KhRAB KRE? AIS KE SWA AWR KIA SZA HWSKTI HE KH WH QID KIA JAEE IA ASE SKhT عZAB DIA JAEE"

12.27: AWR AGR AS KA QMIS PIChHE SE PHTA HW TW عWRT JHWTI HE AWR IH SChA"
12.28: JB ShWHR NE DIKHA KH IWSFؑ KA QMIS PIChHE SE PHTA HE TW AS NE KHA "IH TM عWRTWN KI ChALAKIAN HIN، WAQعI BR E GhZB KI HWTI HIN TMHARI ChALIN
12.29: IWSFؑ، AS MعAMLE SE DRGZR KR AWR AE عWRT، TW APNE QSWR KI MعAFI MANG، TW HI ASL MIN KhTA KAR THI"
12.30: ShHR KI عWRTIN AaPS MIN ChRChA KRNE LGIN KH "عZIZ KI BIWI APNE NWJWAN GhLAM KE PIChHE PRI HWEI HE، MHBT NE AS KW BE QABW KR RKHA HE، HMARE NZDIK TW WH SRIH GhLTI KR RHI HE"
12.31: AS NE JW AUN KI IH MKARANH BATIN SNIN TW AUN KW BLAWA BHIJ DIA AWR AN KE LIE TKIH DAR MJLS AaRASTH KI AWR ZIAFT MIN HR AIK KE AaGE AIK ChHRI RKH DI (PHR عIN AS WQT JBKH WH PHL KAT KAT KR KHA RHI THIN) AS NE IWSFؑ KW AShARH KIA KH AN KE SAMNE NKL Aa JB AN عWRTWN KI NGAH AS PR PRI TW WH DNG RH GEIN AWR APNE HATH KAT BITHIN AWR BE SAKhTH PKA R ATHIN "HAShALLّAH، IH ShKhS ANSAN NHIN HE، IH TW KWEI BZRG FRShTH HE"

12.33: IWSFؑ NE KHA "AE MIRE RB، QID MJHE MNZWR HE BH NSBT AS KE KH MIN WH KAM KRWN JW IH LWG MJH SE ChAHTE HIN AWR AGR TW NE AN KI ChALWN KW MJH SE DFع NH KIA TW MIN AN KE DAM MIN PHNS JAؤN GA AWR JAHLWN MIN ShAML HW RHWN GA

12.35: PHR AN LWGWN KW IH SWJHI KH AIK MDT KE LIE ASE QID KR DIN HALANKH WH (AS KI PAKDAMNI AWR KhWD APNI عWRTWN KE BRE ATWAR KI) SRIH NShANIAN DIKH ChKE THE

12.40: AUS KW ChHWR KR TM JN KI BNDGI KR RHE HW WH AS KE SWA KChH NHIN HIN KH BS ChND NAM HIN JW TM NE AWR TMHARE AaBAؤ AJDAD NE RKH LIE HIN، ALLH NE AN KE LIE KWEI SND NAZL NHIN KI FRMAN RWAEI KA AQTDAR ALLH KE SWA KSI KE LIE NHIN HE AS KA HKM HE KH KhWD AS KE SWA TM KSI KI BNDGI NH KRW IHI THITH SIDHA TRIQ ZNDGI HE، MGR AKSR LWG JANTE NHIN HIN
12.41: AE ZNDAN KE SATHIW، TMHARE KhWAB KI TعBIR IH HE KH TM MIN SE AIK TW APNE RB (ShAH MSR) KW ShRAB PLAEE GA، RHA DWSRA TW ASE SWLI PR ChRHAIA JAEE GA AWR PRNDE AS KA SR NWCh NWCh KR KHAEIN GE FISLH HW GIA AUS BAT KA JW TM PWChH RHE THE"
12.42: PHR AUN MIN SE JS KE MTعLQ KhIAL THA KH WH RHA HW JAEE GA AS SE IWSFؑ NE KHA KH "APNE RB (ShAH MSR) SE MIRA ZKR KRNA" MGR ShITAN NE ASE AISA GhFLT MIN DALA KH WH APNE RB (ShAH MSR) SE AS KA ZKR KRNA BHWL GIA AWR IWSFؑ KEI SAL QID KhANE MIN PRA RHA
12.43: AIK RWZ BADShAH NE KHA "MIN NE KhWAB MIN DIKHA HE KH SAT MWTI GAEIN HIN JN KW SAT DBLI GAEIN KHA RHI HIN، AWR ANAJ KI SAT BALIN HRI HIN AWR DWSRI SAT SWKHI AE AHL DRBAR، MJHE AS KhWAB KI TعBIR BTAؤ AGR TM KhWABWN KA MTLB SMJHTE HW"

12.49: AS KE BعD PHR AIK SAL AISA AaEE GA JS MIN BARAN RHMT SE LWGWN KI FRIAD RSI KI JAEE GI AWR WH RS NChWRIN GE"
12.50: BADShAH NE KHA ASE MIRE PAS LAؤ MGR JB ShAHI FRSTADH IWSFؑ KE PAS PHNChA TW AS NE KHA "APNE RB KE PAS WAPS JA AWR AS SE PWChH KH AUN عWRTWN KA KIA MعAMLH HE JNHWN NE APNE HATH KAT LIE THE? MIRA RB TW AN KI MKARI SE WAQF HI HE"
12.51: AS PR BADShAH NE AN عWRTWN SE DRIAFT KIA "TMHARA KIA TJRBH HE AUS WQT KA JB TM NE IWSFؑ KW RJHANE KI KWShSh KI THI?" SB NE IK ZBAN HW KR KHA "HAShALLH، HM NE TW AUS MIN BDI KA ShAEBH TK NH PAIA" عZIZ KI BIWI BWL ATHI "AB HQ KHL ChKA HE، WH MIN HI THI JS NE AUS KW PHSLANE KI KWShSh KI THI، BE ShK WH BALKL SChA HE"
12.52: (IWSFؑ NE KHA) "AIS SE MIRI GhRZ IH THI KH (عZIZ) IH JAN LE KH MIN NE DRPRDH AS KI KhIANT NHIN KI THI، AWR IH KH JW KhIANT KRTE HIN AN KI ChALWN KW ALLH KAMIABI KI RAH PR NHIN LGATA
12.53: MIN KChH APNE NFS KI BRAءAT NHIN KR RHA HWN، NFS TW BDI PR AKSATA HI HE ALA IH KH KSI PR MIRE RB KI RHMT HW، BE ShK MIRA RB BRA GhFWR W RHIM HE"
12.54: BADShAH NE KHA "AUNHIN MIRE PAS LAؤ TAKH MIN AN KW APNE LIE MKhSWS KR LWN" JB IWSFؑ NE AS SE GFTGW KI TW AS NE KHA "AB AaP HMARE HAN QDR W MNZLT RKHTE HIN AWR AaP KI AMANT PR PWRA BHRWSA HE"
12.55: IWSFؑ NE KHA، "MLK KE KhZANE MIRE SPRD KIJIE، MIN HFAZT KRNE WALA BHI HWN AWR عLM BHI RKHTA HWN"
12.56: AIS TRH HM NE AUS SRZMIN MIN IWSFؑ KE LIE AQTDAR KI RAH HMWAR KI WH MKhTAR THA KH AS MIN JHAN ChAHE APNI JGH BNAEE HM APNI RHMT SE JS KW ChAHTE HIN NWAZTE HIN، NIK LWGWN KA AJR HMARE HAN MARA NHIN JATA
12.57: AWR AaKhRT KA AJR AUN LWGW N KE LIE ZIADH BHTR HE JW AIMAN LE AaEE AWR KhDA TRSI KE SATH KAM KRTE RHE
12.58: IWSFؑ KE BHAEI MSR AaEE AWR AS KE HAN HAZR HWEE AS NE ANHIN PHChAN LIA MGR WH AS SE NA AaShNA THE
12.59: PHR JB AS NE AN KA SAMAN TIAR KRWA DIA TW ChLTE WQT AN SE KHA، "APNE SWTILE BHAEI KW MIRE PAS LANA DIKHTE NHIN HW KH MIN KS TRH PIMANH BHR KR DITA HWN AWR KISA AChHA MHMAN NWAZ HWN
12.60: AGR TM ASE NH LAؤ GE TW MIRE PAS TMHARE LIE KWEI GhLH NHIN HE BLKH TM MIRE QRIB BHI NH PHTKNA"
12.61: ANHWN NE KHA، "HM KWShSh KRIN GE KH WALD SAHB ASE BHIJNE PR R AZI HW JAEIN، AWR HM AISA ZRWR KRIN GE"
12.62: IWSFؑ NE APNE GhLAMWN KW AShARH KIA KH "AIN LWGWN NE GhLE KE عWZ JW MAL DIA HE WH ChPKE SE AN KE SAMAN HI MIN RKH DW" IH IWSFؑ NE AIS AMID PR KIA KH GHR PHNCh KR WH APNA WAPS PAIA HWA MAL PHChAN JAEIN GE (IA AIS FIAZI PR AHSAN MND HWN GE) AWR عJB NHIN KH PHR PLTIN
12.63: JB WH APNE BAP KE PAS GEE TW KHA "ABA JAN، AaENDH HM KW GhLH DINE SE ANKAR KR DIA GIA HE، LHAZA AaP HMARE BHAEI KW HMARE SATH BHIJ DIJIE TAKH HM GhLH LE KR AaEIN AWR AS KI HFAZT KE HM ZMH DAR HIN"
12.64: BAP NE JWAB DIA "KIA MIN AUS KE MعAMLH MIN TM PR WISA HI BHRWSH KRWN JISA AIS SE PHLE AUS KE BHAEI KE MعAMLH MIN KR ChKA HWN? ALLH HI BHTR MHAFZ HE AWR WH SB SE BRH KR RHM FRMANE WALA HE"
12.65: PHR JB ANHWN NE APNA SAMAN KHWLA TW DIKHA KH AN KA MAL BHI ANHIN WAPS KR DIA GIA HE IH DIKH KR WH PKAR ATHE "ABA JAN، AWR HMIN KIA ChAHIE، DIKHIE IH HMARA MAL BHI HMIN WAPS DE DIA GIA HE BS AB HM JAEIN GE AWR APNE AHL W عIAL KE LIE RSD LE AaEIN GE، APNE BHAEI KI HFAZT BHI KRIN GE AWR AIK BARShTR AWR ZIADH BHI LE AaEIN GE، ATNE GhLH KA AZAFH AaSANI KE SATH HW JAEE GA"
12.66: AN KE BAP NE KHA "MIN AS KW HRGZ TMHARE SATH NH BHIJWN GA JB TK KH TM ALLH KE NAM SE MJH KW PIMAN NH DE DW KH AISE MIRE PA S ZRWR WAPS LE KR Aaؤ GE ALA IH KH KHIN TM GHIR HI LIE JAؤ" JB ANHWN NE AS KW APNE APNE PIMAN DE DIE TW AS NE KHA "DIKHW، HMARE AS QWL PR ALLH NGHBAN HE"
12.67: PHR AS NE KHA "MIRE BChW، MSR KE DARALSTNT MIN AIK DRWAZE SE DAKhL NH HWNA BLKH MKhTLF DRWAZWN SE JANA MGR MIN ALLH KI MShIT SE TM KW NHIN BChA SKTA، HKM AUS KE SWA KSI KA BHI NHIN ChLTA، ASI PR MIN NE BHRWSH KIA، AWR JS KW BHI BHRWSH KRNA HW ASI PR KRE"
12.68: AWR WAQعH BHI IHI HWA KH JB WH APNE BAP KI HDAIT KE MTABQ ShHR MIN (MTFRQ DRWAZWN SE) DAKhL HWEE TW AS KI IH AHTIATI TDBIR ALLH KI MShIT KE MQABLE MIN KChH BHI KAM NH AaSKI HAN BS IعQWBؑ KE DL MIN JW AIK KHTK THI ASE DWR KRNE KE LIE AS NE APNI SI KWShSh KR LI BE ShK WH HMARI DI HWEI TعLIM SE SAHB عLM THA MGR AKSR LWG MعAMLH KI HQIQT KW JANTE NHIN HIN
12.69: IH LWG IWSFؑ KE HZWR PHNChE TW AS NE APNE BHAEI KW APNE PAS ALG BLA LIA AWR ASE BTA DIA KH "MIN TIRA WHI BHAEI HWN (JW KHWIA GIA THA) AB TW AUN BATWN KA GhM NH KR JW IH LWG KRTE RHE HIN"
12.70: JB IWSFؑ AN BHAEIWN KA SAMAN LDWANE LGA TW AS NE APNE BHAEI KE SAMAN MIN APNA PIALH RKH DIA PHR AIK PKARNE WALE NE PKAR KR KHA "AE QAFLE WALW، TM LW G ChWR HW"
12.71: ANHWN NE PLT KR PWChHA "TMHARI KIA ChIZ KHWEI GEI? "
12.72: SRKARI MLAZMWN NE KHA "BADShAH KA PIMANH HM KW NHIN MLTA" (AWR AN KE JMعDAR NE KHA) "JW ShKhS LA KR DE GA AUS KE LIE AIK BARShTR ANعAM HE، AS KA MIN ZMH LITA HWN"
12.73: AN BHAEIWN NE KHA "KhDA KI QSM، TW LWG KhWB JANTE HW KH HM AS MLK MIN FSAD KRNE NHIN AaEE HIN AWR HM ChWRIAN KRNE WALE LWG NHIN HIN"
12.74: AUNHWN NE KHA "AChHA، AGR TMHARI BAT JHWTI NKLI TW ChWR KI KIA SZA HE?"
12.75: AUNHWN NE KHA "AUS KI SZA? JS KE SAMAN MIN SE ChIZ NKLE WH AaP HI APNI SZA MIN RKH LIA JAEE، HMARE HAN TW AISE ZALMWN KW SZA DINE KA IHI TRIQH HE"
12.76: TB IWSFؑ NE APNE BHAEI SE PHLE AUN KI KhRJIWN KI TLAShI LINI ShRWع KI، PHR APNE BHAEI KI KhRJI SE GM ShDH ChIZ BRAaMD KR LI AIS TRH HM NE IWSFؑ KI TAEID APNI TDBIR SE KI AUS KA IH KAM NH THA KH BADShAH KE DIN (IعNI MSR KE ShAHI QANWN) MIN APNE BHAEI KW PKRTA ALA IH KH ALLH HI AISA ChAHE HM JS KE DRJE ChAHTE HIN BLND KR DITE HIN، AWR AIK عLM RKHNE WALA AISA HE JW HR SAHB عLM SE BALA TR HE
12.77: AN BHAEIWN NE KHA "IH ChWRI KRE TW KChH TعJB KI BAT BHI NHIN، AS SE PHLE AS KA BHAEI (IWSFؑ) BHI ChWRI KR ChKA HE" IWSFؑ AN KI IH BAT SN KR PI GIA، HQIQT AN PR NH KHWLI BS (ZIR LB) ATNA KHH KR RH GIA KH "BRE HI BRE HW TM LWG، (MIRE MNH DR MNH MJH PR) JW ALZAM TM LGA RHE HW AS KI HQIQT KhDA KhWB JANTA HE"
12.78: ANHWN NE KHA "AE SRDAR ZI AQTDAR (عZIZ)، AS KA BAP BHT BWRHA AaDMI HE، AS KI JGH AaP HM MIN SE KSI KW RKH LIJIE، HM AaP KW BRA HI NIK NFS ANSAN PATE HIN"
12.79: IWSFؑ NE KHA "PNAH BKhDA، DWSRE KSI ShKhS KW HM KISE RKH SKTE HIN JS KE PAS HM NE APNA MAL PAIA HE AS KW ChHWR KR DWSRE KW RKHIN GE TW HM ZALM HWN GE"
12.80: JB WH IWSFؑ SE MAIWS HW GEE TW AIK GWShE MIN JA KR AaPS MIN MShWRH KRNE LGE AN MIN JW SB SE BRA THA WH BWLA "TM JANTE NHIN HW KH TMHARE WALD TM SE KhDA KE NAM PR KIA عHD W PIMAN LE ChKE HIN AWR AS SE PHLE IWSFؑ KE MعAMLH MIN JW ZIADTI TM KR ChKE HW WH BHI TM KW MعLWM HE AB MIN TW IHAN SE HRGZ NH JAؤN GA JB TK KH MIRE WALD MJHE AJAZT NH DIN، IA PHR ALLH HI MIRE HQ MIN KWEI FISLH FRMA DE KH WH SB SE BHTR FISLH KRNE WALA HE
12.81: TM JA KR APNE WALD SE KHW KH "ABA JAN، AaP KE SAHBZADE NE ChWRI KI HE HM NE ASE ChWRI KRTE HWEE NHIN DIKHA، JW KChH HMIN MعLWM HWA HE BS WHI HM BIAN KR RHE HIN، AWR GhIB KI NGHBANI TW HM NH KR SKTE THE
12.82: AaP AUS BSTI KE LWGWN SE PWChH LIJIE JHAN HM THE AUS QAFLE SE DRIAFT KR LIJIE JS KE SATH HM AaEE HIN HM APNE BIAN MIN BALKL SChE HIN"
12.83: BAP NE IH DASTAN SN KR KHA "DRASL TMHARE NFS NE TMHARE LIE AIK AWR BRI BAT KW SHL BNA DIA AChHA AS PR BHI SBR KRWN GA AWR BKhWBI KRWN GA KIA BعID HE KH ALLH AN SB KW MJH SE LA MLA EE، WH SB KChH JANTA HE AWR AS KE SB KAM HKMT PR MBNI HIN"
12.84: PHR WH AN KI TRF SE MNH PHIR KR BITH GIA AWR KHNE LGA KH "HA EE IWSF!" WH DL HI DL MIN GhM SE GHTA JA RHA THA AWR AS KI AaNKHIN SFID PR GEI THIN
12.85: BITWN NE KHA "KhDARA! AaP TW BS IWSF HI KW IAD KIE JATE HIN NWBT IH Aa GEI HE KH AS KE GhM MIN APNE AaP KW GHLA DIN GE IA APNI JAN HLAK KR DALIN GE"
12.86: AUS NE KHA "MIN APNI PRIShANI AWR APNE GhM KI FRIAD ALLH KE SWA KSI SE NHIN KRTA، AWR ALLH SE JISA MIN WAQF HWN TM NHIN HW
12.87: MIRE BChW، JA KR IWSFؑ AWR AS KE BHAEI KI KChH TWH LGAؤ، ALLH KI RHMT SE MAIWS NH HW، AS KI RHMT SE TW BS KAFR HI MAIWS HWA KRTE HIN"
12.88: JB IH LWG MSR JA KR IWSFؑ KI PIShI MIN DAKhL HWEE TW ANHWN NE عRZ KIA KH "AE SRDAR BA AQTDAR، HM AWR HMARE AHL W عIAL SKhT MSIBT MIN MBTLA HIN AWR HM KChH HQIR SI PWNJI LE KR AaEE HIN، AaP HMIN BHR PWR GhLH عNAIT FRMAEIN AWR HM KW KhIRAT DIN، ALLH KhIRAT KRNE WALWN KW JZA DITA HE"
12.89: (IH SN KRIWSFؑ SE NH RHA GIA) AUS NE KHA "TMHIN KChH IH BHI MعLWM HE KH TM NE IWSFؑ AWR AUS KE BHAEI KE SATH KIA KIA THA JBKH TM NADAN THE"
12.90: WH ChWNK KR BWLE "KIA TM IWSFؑ HW?" AUS NE KHA، "HAN، MIN IWSFؑ HWN AWR IH MIRA BHAEI HE ALLH NE HM PR AHSAN FRMAIA HQIQT IH HE KH AGR KWEI TQWIA AWR SBR SE KAM LE TW ALLH KE HAN AISE NIK LWGWN KA AJR MARA NHIN JATA"
12.91: ANHWN NE KHA "BKhDA KH TM KW ALLH NE HM PR FZILT BKhShI AWR WAQعI HM KhTA KAR THE"
12.92: AS NE JWAB DIA، "AaJ TM PR KWEI GRFT NHIN، ALLH TMHIN MعAF KRE، WH SB SE BRH KR RHM FRMANE WALA HE
12.93: JAؤ، MIRA IH QMIS LE JAؤ AWR MIRE WALD KE MNH PR DAL DW، AUN KI BINAEI PLT AaEE GI، AWR APNE SB AHL W عIAL KW MIRE PAS LE Aaؤ"
12.94: JB IH QAFLH (MSR SE) RWANH HWA TW AN KE BAP NE (KNعAN MIN) KHA "MIN IWSFؑ KI KhWShBW MHSWS KR RHA HWN، TM LWG KHIN IH NH KHNE LGW KH MIN BRHAPE MIN STHIA GIA HWN"
12.95: GHR KE LWG BWLE "KhDA KI QSM AaP ABHI TK APNE ASI PRANE KhBT MIN PRE HWEE HIN"
12.96: PHR JB KhW Sh KhBRI LANE WALA AaIA TW AS NE IWSFؑ KA QMIS IعQWBؑ KE MNH PR DAL DIA AWR IKA IK AS KI BINAEI عWD KR AaEI TB AS NE KHA "MIN TM SE KHTA NH THA? MIN ALLH KI TRF SE WH KChH JANTA HWN JW TM NHIN JANTE"
12.97: SB BWL ATHE "ABA JAN، AaP HMARE GNAHWN KI BKhShSh KE LIE DعA KRIN، WAQعI HM KhTA KAR THE"
12.98: AUS NE KHA "MIN APNE RB SE TMHARE LIE MعAFI KI DRKhWAST KRWN GA، WH BRA MعAF KRNE WALA AWR RHIM HE"
12.99: PHR JB IH LWG IWSFؑ KE PAS PHNChE TW AUS NE APNE WALDIN KW APNE SATH BTHA LIA AWR (APNE SB KNBE WALWN SE) KHA "ChLW، AB ShHR MIN ChLW، ALLH NE ChAHA TW AMN ChIN SE RHW GE"
12.100: (ShHR MIN DAKhL HWNE KE BعD) AS NE APNE WALDIN KW ATHA KR APNE PAS TKhT PR BTHAIA AWR SB AS KE AaGE BE AKhTIAR SJDE MIN JHK GEE IWSFؑ NE KHA "ABA JAN، IH TعBIR HE MIRE AUS KhWAB KI JW MIN NE PHLE DIKHA THA، MIRE RB NE ASE HQIQT BNA DIA AS KA AHSAN HE KH AUS NE MJHE QID KhANE SE NKALA، AWR AaP LWGWN KW SHRA SE LA KR MJH SE MLAIA HALANKH ShITAN MIRE AWR MIRE BHAEIWN KE DRMIAN FSAD DAL ChKA THA WAQعH IH HE KH MIRA RB GhIR MHSWS TDBIRWN SE APNI MShIT PWRI KRTA HE، BE ShK W H عLIM AWR HKIM HE
12.101: AE MIRE RB، TW NE MJHE HKWMT BKhShI AWR MJH KW BATWN KI TH TK PHNChNA SKHAIA ZMIN W AaSMAN KE BNANE WALE، TW HI DNIA AWR AaKhRT MIN MIRA SRPRST HE، MIRA KhATMH ASLAM PR KR AWR ANJAM KAR MJHE SALHIN KE SATH MLA"
12.102: AE MHMDؐ، IH QSH GhIB KI KhBRWN MIN SE HE JW HM TM PR WHI KR RHE HIN WRNH TM AUS WQT MWJWD NH THE JB IWSFؑ KE BHAEIWN NE AaPS MIN ATFAQ KR KE SAZSh KI THI
12.103: MGR TM KhWAH KTNA HI ChAHW AIN MIN SE AKSR LWG MAN KR DINE WALE NHIN HIN
12.104: HALANKH TM AS KhDMT PR AN SE KWEI AJRT BHI NHIN MANGTE HW IH TW AIK NSIHT HE JW DNIA WALWN KE LIE عAM HE
12.105: ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN MIN KTNI HI NShANIAN HIN JN PR SE IH LWG GZRTE RHTE HIN AWR ZRA TWJH NHIN KRTE
12.106: AN MIN SE AKSR ALLH KW MANTE HIN MGR AS TRH KH AUS KE SATH DWSRWN KW ShR IK THIRATE HIN
12.107: KIA IH MTMEN HIN KH KhDA KE عZAB KI KWEI BLA ANHIN DBWCh NH LE GI IA BE KhBRI MIN QIAMT KI GHRI AChANK AN PR NH Aa JAEE GI?
12.108: TM AN SE SAF KHH DW KH "MIRA RASTH TW IH HE، MIN ALLH KI TRF BLATA HWN، MIN KhWD BHI PWRI RWShNI MIN APNA RASTH DIKH RHA HWN AWR MIRE SATHI BHI، AWR ALLH PAK HE AWR ShRK KRNE WALWN SE MIRA KWEI WASTH NHIN"
12.109: AE MHMDؐ، TM SE PHLE HM NE JW PIGhMBR BHIJE THE WH SB BHI ANSAN HI THE، AWR ANHI BSTIWN KE RHNE WALWN MIN SE THE، AWR AUNHI KI TRF HM WHI BHIJTE RHE HIN PHR KIA IH LWG ZMIN MIN ChLE PHRE NHIN HIN KH AUN QWMWN KA ANJAM ANHIN NZR NH AaIA JW AN SE PHLE GZR ChKI HIN? IQINAAn AaKhRT KA GHR AUN LWGWN KE LIE AWR ZIADH BHTR HE JNHWN NE (PIGhMBRWN KI BAT MAN KR) TQWIA KI RWSh AKhTIAR KI KIA AB BHI TM LWG NH SMJHW GE?
12.110: (PHLE PIGhMBRWN KE SATH BHI IHI HWTA RHA HE KH WH MDTWN NSIHT KRTE RHE AWR LWGWN NE SN KR NH DIA) IHAN TK KH JB PIGhMBR LWGWN SE MAIWS HW GEE AWR LWGWN NE BHI SMJH LIA KH AUN SE JHWT BWLA GIA THA، TW IKA IK HMARI MDD PIGhMBRWN KW PHNCh GEI PHR JB AISA MWQع Aa JATA HE TW HMARA QAعDH IH HE KH JSE HM ChAHTE HIN BChA LITE HIN AWR MJRMWN PR SE TW HMARA عZAB TALA HI NHIN JA SKTA
12.111: AGLE LWGWN KE AN QSWN MIN عQL W HWSh RKHNE WALWN KE LIE عBRT HE IH JW KChH QRAaN MIN BIAN KIA JA RHA HE IH BNAWTI BATIN NHIN HIN BLKH JW KTABIN AS SE PHLE AaEI HWEI HIN ANHI KI TSDIQ HE AWR HR ChIZ KI TFSIL AWR AIMAN LANE WALWN KE LIE HDAIT AWR RHMT

13.1: A L M R IH KTAB ALAHI KI AaIAT HIN، AWR JW KChH TMHARE RB KI TRF SE TM PR NAZL KIA GIA HE WH عIN HQ HE، MGR (TMHARI QWM KE) AKSR LWG MAN NHIN RHE HIN
13.2: WH ALLH HI HE JS NE AaSMANWN KW AISE SHARWN KE BGhIR QAEM KIA JW TM KW NZR AaTE HW N، PHR WH APNE TKhT SLTNT PR JLWH FRMA HWA، AWR AUS NE AaFTAB W MAHTAB KW AIK QANWN KA PABND BNAIA AIS SARE NZAM KI HR ChIZ AIK WQT MQRR TK KE LIE ChL RHI HE AWR ALLH HI AIS SARE KAM KI TDBIR FRMA RHA HE WH NShANIAN KHWL KHWL KR BIAN KRTA HE، ShAID KH TM APNE RB KI MLAQAT KA IQIN KRW
13.3: AWR WHI HE JS NE IH ZMIN PHILA RKHI HE، AS MIN PHARWN KE KHW NTE GAR RKHE HIN AWR DRIA BHA DIE HIN AUSI NE HR TRH KE PHLWN KE JWRE PIDA KIE HIN، AWR WHI DN PR RAT TARI KRTA HE AN SARI ChIZWN MIN BRI NShANIAN HIN AUN LWGWN KE LIE JW GhWR W FKR SE KAM LITE HIN
13.4: AWR DIKHW، ZMIN MIN ALG ALG KhTE PAEE JATE HIN JW AIK DWSRE SE MTSL WAQع HIN ANGWR KE BAGh HIN، KHITIAN HIN، KHJWR KE DRKhT HIN JN MIN SE KChH AKHRE HIN AWR KChH DWHRE SB KW AIK HI PANI SIRAB KRTA HE MGR MZE MIN HM KSI KW BHTR BNA DITE HIN AWR KSI KW KMTR AN SB ChIZWN MIN BHT SI NShANIAN HIN AUN LWGWN KE LIE JW عQL SE KAM LITE HIN
13.5: AB AGR TMHIN TعJB KRNA HE TW TعJB KE QABL LWGWN KA IH QWL HE KH "JB HM MR KR MTI HW JAEIN GE TW KIA HM NEE SRE SE PIDA KIE JAEIN GE?" IH WH LWG HIN JNHWN NE APNE RB SE KFR KIA HE IH WH LWG HIN JN KI GRDNWN MIN TWQ PRE HWEE HIN IH JHNMI HIN AWR JHNM MIN HMIShH RHIN GE
13.6: IH LWG BHLAEI SE PHLE BRAEI KE LIE JLDI MChA RHE HIN HALANKH AN SE PHLE (JW LWG AS RWSh PR ChLE HIN AN PR KhDA KE عZAB KI) عBRT NAK MSALIN GZR ChKI HIN HQIQT IH HE KH TIRA RB LWGWN KI ZIADTIWN KE BAWJWD AN KE SATH ChShM PWShI SE KAM LITA HE AWR IH BHI HQIQT HE KH TIRA RB SKhT SZA DINE WALA HE
13.7: IH LWG JNHWN NE TMHARI BA T MANNE SE ANKAR KR DIA HE، KHTE HIN KH "AIS ShKhS PR AS KE RB KI TRF SE KWEI NShANI KIWN NH ATRI? TM TW MHZ KhBRDAR KR DINE WALE HW، AWR HR QWM KE LIE AIK RHNMA HE
13.8: ALLH AIK AIK HAMLH KE PIT SE WAQF HE JW KChH AS MIN BNTA HE ASE BHI WH JANTA HE AWR JW KChH AS MIN KMI IA BIShI HWTI HE AS SE BHI WH BAKhBR RHTA HE HR ChIZ KE LIE AUS KE HAN AIK MQDAR MQR RHE
13.9: WH PWShIDH AWR ZAHR، HR ChIZ KA عALM HE WH BZRG HE AWR HR HAL MIN BALA TR RHNE WALA HE
13.10: TM MIN SE KWEI ShKhS KhWAH ZWR SE BA T KRE IA AaHSTH، AWR KWEI RAT KI TARIKI MIN ChHPA HWA HW IA DN KI RWShNI MIN ChL RHA HW، AS KE LIE SB IKSAN HIN
13.11: HR ShKhS KE AaGE AWR PIChHE AS KE MQRR KIE HWEE NGRAN LGE HWEE HIN JW ALLH KE HKM SE AS KI DIKH BHAL KR RHE HIN HQIQT IH HE KH ALLH KSI QWM KE HAL KW NHIN BDLTA JB TK WH KhWD APNE AWSAF KW NHIN BDL DITI AWR JB ALLH KSI QWM KI ShAMT LANE KA FISLH KR LE TW PHR WH KSI KE TALE NHIN TL SKTI، NH ALLH KE MQABLE MIN AISI QWM KA KWEI HAMI W MDD GAR HW SKTA HE
13.12: WHI HE JW TMHARE SAMNE BJLIAN ChMKATA HE JNHIN DIKH KR TMHIN ANDIShE BHI LAHQ HWTE HIN AWR AMIDIN BHI BNDHTI HIN WHI HE JW PANI SE LDE HWEE BADL ATHATA HE
13.13: BADLWN KI GRJ AS KI HMD KE SATH AS KI PAKI BIAN KRTI HE AWR FRShTE AS KI HIBT SE LRZTE HWEE AUS KI TSBIH KRTE HIN WH KRKTI HWEI BJLIWN KW BHIJTA HE AWR (BSA AWQAT) AUNHIN JS PR ChAHTA HE عIN AS HALT MIN GRA DITA HE JBKH LWG ALLH KE BARE MIN JHGR RHE HWTE HIN FI ALWAQع AS KI ChAL BRI ZBRDST HE
13.14: ASI KW PKARNA BRHQ HE RHIN WH DWSRI HSTIAN JNHIN AS KW ChHWR KR IH LWG PKARTE HIN، WH AUN KI DعAؤN KA KWEI JWAB NHIN DE SKTIN AUNHIN PKARNA TW AISA HE JISE KWEI ShKhS PANI KI TRF HATH PHILA KR AUS SE DRKhWAST KRE KH TW MIRE MNH TK PHNCh JA، HALANKH PANI AUS TK PHNChNE WALA NHIN BS AISI TRH KAFRWN KI DعAEIN BHI KChH NHIN HIN MGR AIK TIR BE HDF!
13.15: WH TW ALLH HI HE JS KW ZMIN W AaSMAN KI HR ChIZ TWعAAn W KRHAAn SJDH KR RHI HE AWR SB ChIZWN KE SAEE SBH W ShAM AUS KE AaGE JHKTE HIN
13.16: AIN SE PWChHW، AaSMAN W ZMIN KA RB KWN HE? KHW، ALLH PHR AN SE KHW KH JB HQIQT IH HE TW KIA TM NE AUSE ChHWR KR AISE MعBWDWN KW APNA KARSAZ THIRA LIA JW KhWD APNE LIE BHI KSI NFع W NQSAN KA AKhTIAR NHIN RKHTE? KHW، KIA ANDHA AWR AaNKHWN WALA BRABR HWA KRTA HE? KIA RWShNI AWR TARIKIAN IKSAN HWTI HIN? AWR AGR AISA NHIN TW KIA AIN THIRAEE HWEE ShRIKWN NE BHI ALLH KI TRH KChH PIDA KIA HE KH AUS KI WJH SE AIN PR TKhLIQ KA MعAMLH MShTBH HW GIA? KHW، HR ChIZ KA KhALQ SRF ALLH HE AWR WH IKTA HE، SB PR GhALB!
13.17: ALLH NE AaSMAN SE PANI BRSAIA AWR HR NDI NALH APNE ZRF KE MTABQ ASE LE KR ChL NKLA PHR JB SILAB ATHA TW STH PR JHAG BHI Aa GEE AWR WISE HI JHAG AUN DHATWN PR BHI ATHTE HIN JNHIN ZIWR AWR BRTN WGhIRH BNANE KE LIE LWG PGHLAIA KRTE HIN AISI MSAL SE ALLH HQ AWR BATL KE MعAMLE KW WAZH KRTA HE JW JHAG HE WH AR JAIA KRTA HE AWR JW ChIZ ANSANWN KE LIE NAFع HE WH ZMIN MIN THIR JATI HE AS TRH ALLH MSALWN SE APNI BAT SMJHATA HE
13.18: JN LWGWN NE APNE RB KI DعWT QBWL KR LI HE AUN KE LIE BHLAEI HE AWR JNHWN NE ASE QBWL NH KIA WH AGR ZMIN KI SARI DWLT KE BHI MALK HWN AWR ATNI HI AWR FRAHM KR LIN TW WH KhDA KI PKR SE BChNE KE LIE AS SB KW FDIH MIN DE DALNE PR TIA R HW JAEIN GE IH WH LWG HIN JN SE BRI TRH HSAB LIA JAEE GA AWR AUN KA THKANH JHNM HE، BHT HI BRA THKANA
13.19: BHLA IH KS TRH MMKN HE KH WH ShKhS JW TMHARE RB KI AIS KTAB KW JW AS NE TM PR NAZL KI HE HQ JANTA HE، AWR WH ShKhS JW AS HQIQT KI TRF SE ANDHA HE، DWNWN IKSAN HW JAEIN? NSIHT TW DANSh MND LWG HI QBWL KIA KRTE HIN
13.20: AWR AUN KA TRZ عML IH HWTA HE KH ALLH KE SATH APNE عHD KW PWRA KRTE HIN، AUSE MZBWT BANDHNE KE BعD TWR NHIN DALTE
13.21: AUN KI RWSh IH HWTI HE KH ALLH NE JN JN RWABT KW BRQRAR RKHNE KA HKM DIA HE ANHIN BRQRAR RKHTE HIN، APNE RB SE DRTE HIN AWR AS BAT KA KhWF RKHTE HIN KH KHIN AN SE BRI TRH HSAB NH LIA JAEE
13.22: AUN KA HAL IH HWTA HE KH APNE RB KI RZA KE LIE SBR SE KAM LITE HIN، NMAZ QAEM KRTE HIN، HMARE DIE HWEE RZQ MIN SE عLANIH AWR PWShIDH KhRCh KRTE HIN، AWR BRAEI KW BHLAEI SE DFع KRTE HIN AaKhRT KA GHR ANHI LWGWN KE LIE HE
13.23: IعNI AISE BAGh JW AUN KI ABDI QIAM GAH HWN GE WH KhWD BHI AN MIN DAKhL HWN GE AWR AN KE AaBAؤ AJDAD AWR AUN KI BIWIWN AWR AUN KI AWLAD MIN SE JW JW SALH HIN WH BHI AUN KE SATH WHAN JAEIN GE MLAEKH HR TRF SE AUN KE ASTQBAL KE LIE AaEIN GE
13.24: AWR AUN SE KHIN GE KH "TM PR SLAMTI HE، TM NE DNIA MIN JS TRH SBR SE KAM LIA AUS KI BDWLT AaJ TM AIS KE MSTHQ HWEE HW" PS KIA HI KhWB HE IH AaKhRT KA GHR!
13.25: RHE WH LWG JW ALLH KE عHD KW MZBWT BANDH LINE KE BعD TWR DALTE HIN، JW AUN RABTWN KW KATTE HIN JNHIN ALLH NE JWRNE KA HKM DIA HE، AWR JW ZMIN MIN FSAD PHILATE HIN، WH LعNT KE MSTHQ HIN AWR AN KE LIE AaKhRT MIN BHT BRA THKANA HE

16.54: MGR JB ALLH AS WQT KW TAL DITA HE TW IKA IK TM MIN SE AIK GRWH APNE RB KE SATH DWSRWN KW (AS MHRBANI KE ShKRIE MIN) ShRIK KRNE LGTA HE
16.55: TAKH ALLH KE AHSAN KI NAShKRI KRE AChHA، MZE KR LW، عNQRIB TMHIN MعLWM HW JAEE GA
16.56: IH LWG JN KI HQIQT SE WAQF NHIN HIN AUN KE HSE HMARE DIE HWEE RZQ MIN SE MQRR KRTE HIN KhDA KI QSM، ZRWR TM SE PWChHA JAEE GA KH IH JHWT TM NE KISE GHR LIE THE?
16.57: IH KhDA KE LIE BITIAN TJWIZ KRTE HIN SBHAN ALLH! AWR AIN KE LIE WH JW IH KhWD ChAHIN?
16.58: JB AIN MIN SE KSI KW BITI KE PIDA HWNE KI KhWSh KhBRI DI JATI HE TW AUS KE ChHRE PR KLWNS ChHA JATI HE AWR WH BS KhWN KA SA GHWNT PI KR RH JATA HE
16.59: LWGWN SE ChHPTA PHRTA HE KH AIS BRI KhBR KE BعD KIA KSI KW MNH DKHAEE SWChTA HE KH ZLT KE SATH BITI KW LIE RHE IA MTI MIN DBA DE? DIKHW KISE BRE HKM HIN JW IH KhDA KE BARE MIN LGATE HIN
16.60: BRI SFAT SE MTSF KIE JANE KE LAEQ TW WH LWG HIN JW AaKhRT KA IQIN NHIN RKHTE RHA ALLH، TW AUS KE LIE SB SE BRTR SFAT HIN، WHI TW SB PR GhALB AWR HKMT MIN KAML HE
16.61: AGR KHIN ALLH LWGWN KW AUN KI ZIADTI PR FWRAAn HI PKR LIA KR TA TW RWEE ZMIN PR KSI MTNFS KW NH ChHWRTA LIKN WH SB KW AIK WQT MQRR TK MHLT DITA HE، PHR JB WH WQT Aa JATA HE TW AS SE KWEI AIK GHRI BHR BHI AaGE PIChHE NHIN HW SKTA
16.62: AaJ IH LWG WH ChIZIN ALLH KE LIE TJWIZ KR RHE HIN JW KhWD APNE LIE AINHIN NAPSND HIN، AWR JHWT KHTI HIN AIN KI ZBANIN KH AIN KE LIE BHLA HI BHLA HE AIN KE LIE TW AIK HI ChIZ HE، AWR WH HE DWZKh KI AaG ZRWR IH SB SE PHLE AUS MIN PHNChAEE JAEIN GE
16.63: KhDA KI QSM، AE MHMDؐ، TM SE PHLE BHI BHT SI QWMWN MIN HM RSWL BHIJ ChKE HIN (AWR PHLE BHI IHI HWTA RHA HE KH) ShITAN NE AUN KE BRE KRTWT AUNHIN KhWShNMA BNA KR DKHAEE (AWR RSWLWN KI BAT ANHWN NE MAN KR NH DI) WHI ShITAN AaJ AIN LWGWN KA BHI SRPRST BNA HWA HE AWR IH DRDNAK SZA KE MSTHQ BN RHE HIN
16.64: HM NE IH KTAB TM PR AS LIE NAZL KI HE KH TM AUN AKhTLAFAT KI HQIQT AIN PR KHWL DW JN MIN IH PRE HWEE HIN IH KTAB RHNMAEI AWR RHMT BN KR ATRI HE AUN LWGWN KE LIE JW AISE MAN LIN
16.65: (TM HR BRSAT MIN DIKHTE HW KH) ALLH NE AaSMAN SE PANI BRSAIA AWR IKA IK MRDH PRI HWEI ZMIN MIN AUS KI BDWLT JAN DAL DI IQINAAn AS MIN AIK NShANI HE SNNE WALWN KE LIE
16.66: AWR TMHARE LIE MWIShIWN MIN BHI AIK SBQ MWJWD HE AUN KE PIT SE GWBR AWR KhWN KE DRMIAN HM AIK ChIZ TMHIN PLATE HIN، IعNI KhALS DWDH، JW PINE WALWN KE LIE NHAIT KhW Sh GWAR HE
16.67: (ASI TRH) KHJWR KE DRKhTWN AWR ANGWR KI BILWN SE BHI HM AIK ChIZ TMHIN PLATE HIN JSE TM NShH AaWR BHI BNA LITE HW AWR PAK RZQ BHI IQINAAn AS MIN AIK NShANI HE عQL SE KAM LINE WALWN KE LIE
16.68: AWR DIKHW، TMHARE RB NE ShHD KI MKHI PR IH BAT WHI KR DI KH PHARWN MIN، AWR DRKhTWN MIN، AWR TTIWN PR ChRHAEI HWEI BILWN MIN
16.69: APNE ChHTE BNA AWR HR TRH KE PHLWN KA RS ChWS AWR APNE RB KI HMWAR KI HWEI RAHWN PR ChLTI RH AIS MKHI KE ANDR SE RNG BRNG KA AIK ShRBT NKLTA HE JS MIN ShFA HE LWGWN KE LIE IQINAAn AS MIN BHI AIK NShANI HE AUN LWGWN KE LIE JW GhWR W FKR KRTE HIN
16.70: AWR DIKHW، ALLH NE TM KW PIDA KIA، PHR WH TM KW MWT DITA HE، AWR TM MIN SE KWEI BD TRIN عMR KW PHNChA DIA JATA HE TAKH SB KChH JANNE KE BعD PHR KChH NH JANE HQ IH HE KH ALLH HI عLM MIN BHI KAML HE AWR QDRT MIN BHI
16.71: AWR DIKHW، ALLH NE TM MIN SE BعZ KW BعZ PR RZQ MIN FZILT عTA KI HE PHR JN LWGWN KW IH FZILT DI GEI HE WH AISE NHIN HIN KH APNA RZQ APNE GhLAMWN KI TRF PHIR DIA KRTE HWN TAKH DWNWN AS RZQ MIN BRABR KE HSH DAR BN JAEIN TW KIA ALLH HI KA AHSAN MANNE SE AIN LWGWN KW ANKAR HE?
16.72: AWR WH ALLH HI HE JS NE TMHARE LIE TMHARI HM JNS BIWIAN BNAEIN AWR ASI NE AN BIWIWN SE TMHIN BITE PWTE عTA KIE AWR AChHI AChHI ChIZIN TMHIN KHANE KW DIN PHR KIA IH LWG (IH SB KChH DIKHTE AWR JANTE HWEE BHI) BATL KW MANTE HIN AWR ALLH KE AHSAN KA ANKAR KRTE HIN
16.73: AWR ALLH KW ChHWR KR AUN KW PWJTE HIN JN KE HATH MIN NH AaSMANWN SE ANHIN KChH BHI RZQ DINA HE NH ZMIN SE AWR NH IH KAM WH KR HI SKTE HIN?
16.74: PS ALLH KE LIE MSALIN NH GHRW، ALLH JANTA HE، TM NHIN JANTE
16.75: ALLH AIK MSAL DITA HE AIK TW HE GhLAM، JW DWSRE KA MMLWK HE AWR KhWD KWEI AKhTIAR NHIN RKHTA DWSRA ShKhS AISA HE JSE HM NE APNI TRF SE AChHA RZQ عTA KIA HE AWR WH AS MIN SE KHLE AWR ChHPE KhWB KhRCh KRTA HE BTAؤ، KIA IH DWNWN BRABR HIN? ALHMDLLH، MGR AKSR LWG (AS SIDHI BAT KW) NHIN JANTE
16.76: ALLH AIK AWR MSAL DITA HE DW AaDMI HIN AIK GWNGA BHRA HE، KWEI KAM NHIN KR SKTA، APNE AaQA PR BWJH BNA HWA HE، JDHR BHI WH ASE BHIJE KWEI BHLA KAM AUS SE BN NH AaEE DWSRA ShKhS AISA HE KH ANSAF KA HKM DITA HE AWR KhWD RAH RAST PR QAEM HE BTAؤ KIA IH DWNWN IKSAN HIN?
16.77: AWR ZMIN W AaSMAN KE PWShIDH HQAEQ KA عLM TW ALLH HI KW HE AWR QIAMT KE BRPA HWNE KA MعAMLH KChH DIR NH LE GA MGR BS ATNI KH JS MIN AaDMI KI PLK JHPK JAEE، BLKH AS SE BHI KChH KM HQIQT IH HE KH ALLH SB KChH KR SKTA HE
16.78: ALLH NE TM KW TMHARI MAؤN KE PITWN SE NKALA AS HALT MIN KH TM KChH NH JANTE THE AUS NE TMHIN KAN DIE، AaNKHIN DIN، AWR SWChNE WALE DL DIE، AS LIE KH TM ShKR GZAR BNW
16.79: KIA AIN LWGWN NE KBHI PRNDWN KW NHIN DIKHA KH FZAEE AaSMANI MIN KSI TRH MSKhR HIN? ALLH KE SWA KS NE AIN KW THAM RKHA HE? AIS MIN BHT NShANIAN HIN AUN LWGWN KE LIE JW AIMAN LATE HIN
16.80: ALLH NE TMHARE LIE TMHARE GHRWN KW JAEE SKWN BNAIA AS NE JANWRWN KI KHALWN SE TMHARE LIE AISE MKAN PIDA KIE JNHIN TM SFR AWR QIAM، DWNWN HALTWN MIN HLKA PATE HW AUS NE JANWRWN KE SWF AWR AWN AWR BALWN SE TMHARE LIE PHNNE AWR BRTNE KI BHT SI ChIZIN PIDA KR DIN JW ZNDGI KI MDT MQRRH TK TMHARE KAM AaTI HIN
16.81: AS NE APNI PIDA KI HWEI BHT SI ChIZWN SE TMHARE LIE SAEE KA ANTZAM KIA، PHARWN MIN TMHARE LIE PNAH GAHIN BNAEIN، AWR TMHIN AISI PWShAKIN BKhShIN JW TMHIN GRMI SE BChATI HIN AWR KChH DWSRI PWShAKIN JW AaPS KI JNG MIN TMHARI HFAZT KRTI HIN AS TRH WH TM PR APNI NعMTWN KI TKMIL KRTA HE ShAID KH TM FRMAN BRDAR BNW
16.82: AB AGR IH LWG MNH MWRTE HIN TW AE MHMDؐ، TM PR SAF SAF PIGhAM HQ PHNChA DINE KE SWA AWR KWEI ZMH DARI NHIN HE
16.83: IH ALLH KE AHSAN KW PHChANTE HIN، PHR AS KA ANKAR KRTE HIN AWR AIN MIN BISh TR LWG AISE HIN JW HQ MANNE KE LIE TIAR NHIN HIN
16.84: (AINHIN KChH HWSh BHI HE KH AUS RWZ KIA BNE GI) JBKH HM HR AMT MIN SE AIK GWAH KHRA KRIN GE، PHR KAFRWN KW NH HJTIN PISh KRNE KA MWQع DIA JAEIGA NH AN SE TWBH W ASTGhFAR HI KA MTALBH KIA JAEE GA
16.85: ZALM LWG JB AIK DFعH عZAB DIKH LIN GE TW AS KE BعD NH AUN KE عZAB MIN KWEI TKhFIF KI JAEE GI AWR NH ANHIN AIK LMHH BHR KI MHLT DI JAEE GI
16.86: AWR JB WH LWG JNHWN NE DNIA MIN ShRK KIA THA APNE THIRAEE HWEE ShRIKWN KW DIKHIN GE TW KHIN GE "AE PRWRDGAR، IHI HIN HMARE WH ShRIK JNHIN HM TJHE ChHWR KR PKARA KRTE THE" AS PR AUN KE WH MعBWD ANHIN SAF JWAB DIN GE KH "TM JHWTE HW"
16.87: AUS WQT IH SB ALLH KE AaGE JHK JAEIN GE AWR AN KI WH SARI AFTRA PRDAZIAN RFW ChKR HW JAEIN GI JW IH DNIA MIN KRTE RHE THE
16.88: JN LWGWN NE KhWD KFR KI RAH AKhTIAR KI AWR DWSRWN KW ALLH KI RAH SE RWKA ANHIN HM عZAB PR عZAB DIN GE AUS FSAD KE BDLE JW WH DNIA MIN BRPA KRTE RHE
16.89: (AE MHMDؐ، AINHIN AUS DN SE KhBRDAR KR DW) JB KH HM HR AMT MIN KhWD AUSI KE ANDR SE AIK GWAH ATHA KHRA KRIN GE JW AUS KE MQABLE MIN ShHADT DE GA، AWR AIN LWGWN KE MQABLE MIN ShHADT DINE KE LIE HM TMHIN LAEIN GE AWR (IH ASI ShHADT KI TIARI HE KH) HM NE IH KTAB TM PR NAZL KR DI HE JW HR ChIZ KI SAF SAF WZAHT KRNE WALI HE AWR HDAIT W RHMT AWR BShART HE AUN LWGWN KE LIE JNHWN NE SR TSLIM KhM KR DIA HE
16.90: ALLH عDL AWR AHSAN AWR SLH RHMI KA HKM DITA HE AWR BDI W BE HIAEI AWR ZLM W ZIADTI SE MNع KRTA HE WH TMHIN NSIHT KRTA HE TAKH TM SBQ LW
16.91: ALLH KE عHD KW PWRA KRW JBKH TM NE AS SE KWEI عHD BANDHA HW، AWR APNI QSMIN PKhTH KRNE KE BعD TWR NH DALW JBKH TM ALLH KW APNE AWPR GWAH BNA ChKE HW ALLH TMHARE SB AFعAL SE BAKhBR HE
16.92: TMHARI HALT AUS عWRT KI SI NH HW JAEE JS NE AaP HI MHNT SE SWT KATA AWR PHR AaP HI ASE TKRE TKRE KR DALA TM APNI QSMWN KW AaPS KE MعAMLAT MIN MKR W FRIB KA HTHIAR BNATE HW TAKH AIK QWM DWSRI QWM SE BRH KR FAEDE HASL KRE HALAN KH ALLH AS عHD W PIMAN KE ZRIعH SE TM KW AaZMAESh MIN DALTA HE، AWR ZRWR WH QIAMT KE RWZ TMHARE TMAM AKhTLAFAT KI HQIQT TM PR KHWL DE GA
16.93: AGR ALLH KI MShIT IH HWTI (KH TM MIN KWEI AKhTLAF NH HW) TW WH TM SB KW AIK HI AMT BNA DITA، MGR WH JSE ChAHTA HE GMRAHI MIN DALTA HE AWR JSE ChAHTA HE RAH RAST DKHA DITA HE، AWR ZRWR TM SE TMHARE AعMAL KI BAZ PRS HW KR RHE GI
16.94: (AWR AE MSLMANW،) TM APNI QSMWN KW AaPS MIN AIK DWSRE KW DHWKH DINE KA ZRIعH NH BNA LINA، KHIN AISA NH HW KH KWEI QDM JMNE KE BعD AKHR JAEE AWR TM AIS JRM KI PADASh MIN KH TM NE LWGWN KW ALLH KI RAH SE RWKA، BRA NTIJH DIKHW AWR SKhT SZA BHGTW
16.95: ALLH KE عHD KW THWRE SE FAEDE KE BDLE NH BICh DALW، JW KChH ALLH KE PAS HE WH TMHARE LIE ZIADH BHTR HE AGR TM JANW
16.96: JW KChH TMHARE PAS HE WH KhRCh HW JANE WALA HE AWR JW KChH ALLH KE PAS HE WHI BAQI RHNE WALA HE، AWR HM ZRWR SBR SE KAM LINE WALWN KW AUN KE AJR AUN KE BHTRIN AعMAL KE MTABQ DIN GE
16.97: JW ShKhS BHI NIK عML KRE GA، KhWAH WH MRD HW IA عWRT، BShR TIKH HW WH MWMN، ASE HM DNIA MIN PAKIZH ZNDGI BSR KRAEIN GE AWR (AaKhRT MIN) AISE LWGWN KW AN KE AJR AN KE BHTRIN AعMAL KE MTABQ BKhShIN GE
16.98: PHR JB TM QRAaN PRHNE LGW TW ShITAN RJIM SE KhDA KI PNAH MANG LIA KRW
16.99: AUSE AUN LWGWN PR TSLT HASL NHIN HWTA JW AIMAN LATE AWR APNE RB PR BHRWSA KRTE HIN
16.100: AS KA ZWR TW ANHI LWGWN PR ChLTA HE JW AS KW APNA SRPRST BNATE AWR AS KE BHKANE SE ShRK KRTE HIN
16.101: JB HM AIK AaIT KI JGH DWSRI AaIT NAZL KRTE HIN AWR ALLH BHTR JANTA HE KH WH KIA NAZL KRE TW IH LWG KHTE HIN KH TM IH QRAaN KhW D GHR TE HW ASL BAT IH HE KH AIN MIN SE AKSR LWG HQIQT SE NAWAQF HIN
16.102: AIN SE KHW KH AISE TW RWH ALQDS NE THIK THIK MIRE RB KI TRF SE BTDRIJ NAZL KIA HE TAKH AIMAN LANE WALWN KE AIMAN KW PKhTH KRE AWR FRMAN BRDARWN KW ZNDGI KE MعAMLAT MIN SIDHI RAH BTAEE AWR AUNHIN FLAH W SعADT KI KhWSh KhBRI DE
16.103: HMIN MعLWM HE IH LWG TMHARE MTعLQ KHTE HIN KH AS ShKhS KW AIK AaDMI SKHATA PRHATA HE HALANKH AN KA AShARH JS AaDMI KI TRF HE AS KI ZBAN عJMI HE AWR IH SAF عRBI ZBAN HE
16.104: HQIQT IH HE KH JW LWG ALLH KI AaIAT KW NHIN MANTE ALLH KBHI AN KW SHIH BAT TK PHNChNE KI TWFIQ NHIN DITA AWR AISE LWGWN KE LIE DRDNAK عZAB HE
16.105: (JHWTI BATIN NIA NHIN GHR TA BLKH) JHWT WH LWG GHR RHE HIN، JW ALLH KI AaIAT KW NHIN MANTE، WHI HQIQT MIN JHWTE HIN
16.106: JW ShKhS AIMAN LANE KE BعD KFR KRE (WH AGR) MJBWR KIA GIA HW AWR DL AS KA AIMAN PR MTMEN HW (TB TW KhIR) MGR JS NE DL KI RZA MNDI SE KFR KW QBWL KR LIA AS PR ALLH KA GhZB HE AWR AISE SB LWGWN KE LIE BRA عZAB HE
16.107: IH AS LIE KH AUNHWN NE AaKhRT KE MQABLH MIN DNIA KI ZNDGI KW PSND KR LIA، AWR ALLH KA QAعDH HE KH WH AUN LWGWN KW RAH NJAT NHIN DKHATA JW AUS KI NعMT KA KFRAN KRIN
16.108: IH WH LWG HIN JN KE DLWN AWR KANWN AWR AaNKHWN PR ALLH NE MHR LGA DI HE IH GhFLT MIN DWB ChKE HIN
16.109: ZRWR HE KH AaKhRT MIN IHI KhSARE MIN RHIN
16.110: BKhLAF AS KE JN LWGWN KA HAL IH HE KH JB (AIMAN LANE KI WJH SE) WH STAEE GEE TW AUNHWN NE GHR BAR ChHWR DIE، HJRT KI، RAH KhDA MIN SKhTIAN JHILIN AWR SBRSE KAM LIA، AUN KE LIE IQINAAn TIRA RB GhFWR W RHIM HE
16.111: (AIN SB KA FISLH AUS DN HWGA) JB KH HR MTNFS APNE HI BChAؤ KI FKR MIN LGA HWA HWGA AWR HR AIK KW AS KE KIE KA BDLH PWRA PWRA DIA JAEE GA AWR KSI PR ZRH BRABR ZLM NH HWNE PAEE GA
16.112: ALLH AIK BSTI KI MSAL DITA HE WH AMN W ATMINAN KI ZNDGI BSR KR RHI THI AWR HR TRF SE AS KW BFRAGhT RZQ PHNCh RHA THA KH AUS NE ALLH KI NعMTWN KA KFRAN ShRWع KR DIA TB ALLH NE AS KE BAShNDWN KW AUN KE KRTWTWN KA IH MZA ChKHAIA KH BHWK AWR KhWF KI MSIBTIN AN PR ChHA GEIN
16.113: AUN KE PAS AN KI APNI QWM MIN SE AIK RSWL AaIA MGR AUNHWN NE AS KW JHTLA DIA AaKhR KAR عZAB NE AUN KW Aa LIA JBKH WH ZALM HW ChKE THE
16.114: PS AE LWGW، ALLH NE JW KChH HLAL AWR PAK RZQ TM KW BKhShA HE AUSE KHAؤ AWR ALLH KE AHSAN KA ShKR ADA KRW AGR TM WAQعI AUSI KI BNDGI KRNE WALE HW
16.115: ALLH NE JW KChH TM PR HRAM KIA HE WH HE MURDAR AWR KhWN AWR SWR KA GWShT AWR WH JANWR JS PR ALLH KE SWA KSI AWR KA NAM LIA GIA HW ALBTH BHWK SE MJBWR HW KR AGR KWEI AIN ChIZWN KW KHA LE، BGhIR AS KE KH WH QANWN ALAHI KI KhLAF WRZI KA KhWAHSh MND HW، IA HD ZRWRT SE TJAWZ KA MRTKB HW، TW IQINAAn ALLH MعAF KRNE AWR RHM FRMANE WALA HE
16.116: AWR IH JW TMHARI ZBANIN JHWTE AHKAM LGAIA KRTI HIN KH IH ChIZ HLAL HE AWR WH HRAM، TW AS TRH KE HKM LGA KR ALLH PR JHWT NH BANDHA KRW JW LWG ALLH PR JHWTE AFTRA BANDHTE HIN WH HRGZ FLAH NHIN PAIA KRTE
16.117: DNIA KA عISh ChND RWZH HE AaKhRKAR AUN KE LIE DRDNAK SZA HE
16.118: WH ChIZIN HM NE KhAS TWR PR IHWDIWN KE LIE HRAM KI THIN JN KA ZKR HM AS SE PHLE TM SE KR ChKE HIN AWR IH AUN PR HMARA ZLM NH THA BLKH AUN KA APNA HI ZLM THA JW WH APNE AWPR KR RHE THE
16.119: ALBTH JN LWGWN NE JHALT KI BNA PR BRA عML KIA AWR PHR TWBH KR KE APNE عML KI ASLAH KR LI TW IQINAAn TWBH W ASLAH KE BعD TIRA RB AUN KE LIE GhFWR AWR RHIM HE
16.120: WAQعH IH HE KH ABRAHIMؑ APNI ZAT SE AIK PWRI AMT THA، ALLH KA MTIع FRMAN AWR IK SW WH KBHI MShRK NH THA
16.121: ALLH KI NعMTWN KA ShKR ADA KRNE WALA THA ALLH NE AS KW MNTKhB KR LIA AWR SIDHA RASTH DKHAIA
16.122: DNIA MIN AS KW BHLAEI DI AWR AaKhRT MIN WH IQINAAn SALHIN MIN SE HWGA
16.123: PHR HM NE TMHARI TRF IH WHI BHIJI KH IK SW HW KR ABRAHIMؑ KE TRIQE PR ChLW AWR WH MShRKWN MIN SE NH THA
16.124: RHA SBT، TW WH HM NE AUN LWGWN PR MSLT KIA THA JNHWN NE AS KE AHKAM MIN AKhTLAF KIA، AWR IQINAAn TIRA RB QIAMT KE RWZ AN SB BATWN KA FISLH KR DE GA JN MIN WH AKhTLAF KRTE RHE HIN
16.125: AE NBIؐ، APNE RB KE RASTE KI TRF DعWT DW HKMT AWR عMDH NSIHT KE SATH، AWR LWGWN SE MBAHSH KRW AISE TRIQH PR JW BHTRIN HW TMHARA RB HI ZIADH BHTR JANTA HE KH KWN AS KI RAH SE BHTKA HWA HE AWR KWN RAH RAST PR HE
16.126: AWR AGR TM LWG BDLH LW TW BS ASI QDR LE LW JS QDR TM PR ZIADTI KI GEI HW LIKN AGR TM SBR KRW TW IQINAAn IH SBR KRNE WALWN HI KE HQ MIN BHTR HE
16.127: AE MHMDؐ، SBR SE KAM KIE JAؤ AWR TMHARA IH SBR ALLH HI KI TWFIQ SE HE AIN LWGWN KI HRKAT PR R NJ NH KRW AWR NH AN KI ChAL BAZIWN PR DL TNG HW
16.128: ALLH AUN LWGWN KE SATH HE JW TQWIA SE KAM LITE HIN AWR AHSAN PR عML KRTE HIN

17.1: PAK HE WH JW LE GIA AIK RAT APNE BNDE KW MSJD HRAM SE DWR KI AUS MSJD TK JS KE MAHWL KW AS NE BRKT DI HE، TAKH ASE APNI KChH NShANIWN KA MShAHDH KRAEE HQIQT MIN WHI HE SB KChH SNNE AWR DIKHNE WALA
17.2: HM NE AIS SE PHLE MWSIAؑ KW KTAB DI THI AWR AUSE BNI ASRAEIL KE LIE ZRIعH HDAIT BNAIA THA، AIS TAKID KE SATH KH MIRE SWA KSI KW APNA WKIL NH BNANA
17.3: TM AUN LWGWN KI AWLAD HW JNHIN HM NE NWHؑ KE SATH KShTI PR SWAR KIA THA، AWR NWHؑ AIK ShKR GZAR BNDH THA
17.4: PHR HM NE APNI KTAB MIN BNI ASRAEIL KW AIS BAT PR BHI MTNBH KR DIA THA KH TM DW MRTBH ZMIN MIN FSAD عZIM BRPA KRW GE AWR BRI SRKShI DKHAؤ GE
17.5: AaKhRKAR JB AUN MIN SE PHLI SRKShI KA MWQع PISh AaIA، TW AE BNI ASRAEIL، HM NE TMHARE MQABLE PR APNE AISE BNDE ATHAEE JW NHAIT ZWR AaWR THE AWR WH TMHARE MLK MIN GHS KR HR TRF PHIL GEE IH AIK WعDH THA JSE PWRA HW KR HI RHNA THA
17.6: AIS KE BعD HM NE TMHIN AUN PR GhLBE KA MWQع DE DIA AWR TMHIN MAL AWR AWLAD SE MDD DI AWR TMHARI TعDAD PHLE SE BRHA DI
17.7: DIKHW! TM NE BHLAEI KI TW WH TMHARE APNE HI LIE BHLAEI THI، AWR BRAEI KI TW WH TMHARI APNI ZAT KE LIE BRAEI SABT HWEI PHR JB DWSRE WعDE KA WQT AaIA TW HM NE DWSRE DShMNWN KW TM PR MSLT KIA TAKH WH TMHARE ChHRE BGAR DIN AWR MSJD (BIT ALMQDS) MIN AUSI TRH GHS JAEIN JS TRH PHLE DShMN GHSE THE AWR JS ChIZ PR AN KA HATH PRE AUSE TBAH KR KE RKH DIN
17.8: HWSKTA HE KH AB TMHARA RB TM PR RHM KRE، LIKN AGR TM NE PHR APNI SABQ RWSh KA AعADH KIA TW HM BHI PR APNI SZA KA AعADH KRIN GE، AWR KA FR NعMT LWGWN KE LIE HM NE JHNM KW QID KhANH BNA RKHA HE
17.9: HQIQT IH HE KH IH QRAaN WH RAH DKHATA HE JW BALKL SIDHI HE JW LW G ASE MAN KR BHLE KAM KRNE LGIN ANHIN IH BShART DITA HE KH AN KE LIE BRA AJR HE
17.10: AWR JW LWG AaKhRT KW NH MANIN ANHIN IH KhBR DITA HE KH AN KE LIE HM NE DRDNAK عZAB MHIA KR RKHA HE
17.11: ANSAN ShR AUS TRH MANGTA HE JS TRH KhIR MANGNI ChAHIE ANSAN BRA HI JLD BAZ WAQع HWA HE
17.12: DIKHW، HM NE RAT AWR DN KW DW NShANIAN BNAIA HE RAT KI NShANI KW HM NE BE NWR BNAIA، AWR DN KI NShANI KW RWShN KR DIA TAKH TM APNE RB KA FZL TLASh KR SKW AWR MAH W SAL KA HSAB MعLWM KR SKW AISI TRH HM NE HR ChIZ KW ALG ALG MMIZ KR KE RKHA HE
17.13: HR ANSAN KA ShGWN HM NE AUS KE APNE GLE MIN LTKA RKHA HE، AWR QIAMT KE RWZ HM AIK NWShTH AUS KE LIE NKALIN GE JSE WH KHLI KTAB KI TRH PAEE GA
17.14: PRH APNA NAMH AعMAL، AaJ APNA HSAB LGANE KE LIE TW KhWD HI KAFI HE
17.15: JW KWEI RAH RAST AKhTIAR KRE AS KI RAST RWI AS KE APNE HI LIE MFID HE، AWR JW GMRAH HW AS KI GMRAHI KA WBA L AUSI PR HE KWEI BWJH ATHANE WALA DWSRE KA BWJH NH ATHAEE GA AWR HM عZAB DINE WALE NHIN HIN JB TK KH (LWGWN KW HQ W BATL KA FRQ SMJHANE KE LIE) AIK PIGhAM BR NH BHIJ DIN

18.11: TW HM NE ANHIN AUSI GhAR MIN THPK KR SALHA SAL KE LIE GHRI NIND SLA DIA
18.12: PHR HM NE ANHIN ATHAIA TAKH DIKHIN AUN KE DW GRWHWN MIN SE KWN APNI MDT QIAM KA THIK ShMAR KRTA HE
18.13: HM AN KA ASL QSH TMHIN SNATE HIN WH ChND NWJWAN THE JW APNE RB PR AIMAN LE AaEE THE AWR HM NE AN KW HDAIT MIN TRQI BKhShI THI
18.14: HM NE AN KE DL AUS WQT MZBWT KR DIE JB WH ATHE AWR ANHWN NE AعLAN KR DIA KH "HMARA RB TW BS WHI HE JW AaSMANWN AWR ZMIN KA RB HE HM AUSE ChHWR KR KSI DWSRE MعBWD KW NH PKARIN GE AGR HM AISA KRIN TW BALKL BIJA BAT KRIN GE"
18.15: (PHR ANHWN NE AaPS MIN AIK DWSRE SE KHA) "IH HMARI QWM TW RBّI KAENAT KW ChHWR KR DWSRE KhDA BNA BITHI HE IH LWG AN KE MعBWD HWNE PR KWEI WAZH DLIL KIWN NHIN LATE? AaKhR AUS ShKhS SE BRA ZALM AWR KWN HW SKTA HE JW ALLH PR JHWT BANDHE?
18.16: AB JBKH TM AN SE AWR AIN KE MعBWDANI GhIR ALLH SE BE TعLQ HW ChKE HW TW ChLW AB FLAN GhAR MIN ChL KR PNAH LW TMHARA RB TM PR APNI RHMT KA DAMN WSIع KRE GA AWR TMHARE KAM KE LIE SR W SAMAN MHIA KR DE GA"
18.17: TM ANHIN GhAR MIN DIKHTE TW TMHIN IWN NZR AaTA KH SWRJ JB NKLTA HE TW AN KE GhAR KW ChHWR KR DAEIN JANB ChRH JATA HE AWR JB GhRWB HWTA HE TW AN SE BCh KR BAEIN JANB ATR JATA HE AWR WH HIN KH GhAR KE ANDR AIK WSIع JGH MIN PRE HIN IH ALLH KI NShANIWN MIN SE AIK HE JS KW ALLH HDAIT DE WHI HDAIT PANE WALA HE AWR JSE ALLH BHTKA DE AS KE LIE TM KWEI WLI MRShD NHIN PA SKTE
18.18: TM ANHIN DIKH KR IH SMJHTE KH WH JAG RHE HIN، HALANKH WH SW RHE THE HM ANHIN DAEIN BAEIN KRWT DLWATE RHTE THE AWR AN KA KTA GhAR KE DHANE PR HATH PHILAEE BITHA THA AGR TM KHIN JHANK KR AUNHIN DIKHTE TW ALTE PAؤN BHAG KHRE HWTE AWR TM PR AN KE NZARE SE DHShT BITH JATI
18.19: AWR ASI عJIB KRShME SE HM NE ANHIN ATHA BTHAIA TAKH ZRA AaPS MIN PWChH GChH KRIN AN MIN SE AIK NE PWChHA "KHW KTNI DIR AS HAL MIN RHE?"DWSRWN NE KHA "ShAID DN BHR IA AS SE KChH KM RHE HWN GE" PHR WH BWLE "ALLH HI BHTR JANTA HE KH HMARA KTNA WQT AS HALT MIN GZRA ChLW، AB APNE MIN SE KSI KW ChANDI KA IH SKH DE KR ShHR BHIJIN AWR WH DIKHE KH SB SE AChHA KHANA KHAN MLTA HE WHAN SE WH KChH KHANE KE LIE LAEE AWR ChAHIE KH ZRA HWShIARI SE KAM KRE، AISA NH HW KH WH KSI KW HMARE IHAN HWNE SE KhBRDAR KR BITHE
18.20: AGR KHIN AUN LWGWN KA HATH HM PR PR GIA TW BS SNGSAR HI KR DALIN GE، IA PHR ZBRDSTI HMIN APNI MLT MIN WAPS LE JAEIN GE، AWR AISA HWA TWHM KBHI FLAH NH PA SKIN GE"
18.21: AIS TRH HM NE AHL ShHR KW AN KE HAL PR MTLع KIA TAKH LWG JAN LIN KH ALLH KA WعDH SChA HE AWR IH KH QIAMT KI GHRI BE ShK Aa KR RHE GI (MGR ZRA KhIAL KRW KH JB SWChNE KI ASL BAT IH THI) AUS WQT WH AaPS MIN AIS BAT PR JHGR RHE THE KH AIN (ASHAB KHF) KE SATH KIA KIA JAEE KChH LWGWN NE KHA "AIN PR AIK DIWAR ChN DW، AN KA RB HI AIN KE MعAMLH KW BHTR JANTA HE" MGR JW LWG AUN KE MعAMLAT PR GhALB THE ANHWN NE KHA " HM TW AN PR AIK عBADT GAH BNAEIN GE"
18.22: KChH LWG KHIN GE KH WH TIN THE AWR ChWTHA AN KA KTA THA AWR KChH DWSRE KHH DIN GE KH PANCh THE AWR ChHTA AUN KA KTA THA IH SB BE TKI HANKTE HIN KChH AWR LWG KHTE HIN KH SAT THE AWR AaTHWAN AUN KA KTA THA KHW، MIRA RB HI BHTR JANTA HE KH WH KTNE THE KM HI LWG AN KI SHIH TعDAD JANTE HIN PS TM SRSRI BAT SE BRH KR AN KI TعDAD KE MعAMLE MIN LWGWN SE BHS NH KRW، AWR NH AN KE MTعLQ KSI SE KChH PWChHW
18.23: AWR DIKHW، KSI ChIZ KE BARE MIN KBHI IH NH KHA KRW KH MIN KL IH KAM KR DWN GA
18.24: (TM KChH NHIN KR SKTE) AILّA IH KH ALLH ChAHE AGR BHWLE SE AISI BAT ZBAN SE NKL JAEE TW FWRAAn APNE RB KW IAD KRW AWR KHW "AMID HE KH MIRA RB AIS MعAMLE MIN RShD SE QRIB TR BAT KI TRF MIRI RHNMAEI FRMA DE GA"
18.25: AWR WH APNE GhAR MIN TIN SW SAL RHE، AWR (KChH LWG MDّT KE ShMAR MIN) 9 SAL AWR BRH GEE HIN
18.26: TM KHW، ALLH AN KE QIAM KI MDّT ZIADH JANTA HE، AaSMANWN AWR ZMIN KE SB PWShIDH AHWAL AUSI KW MعLWM HIN، KIA KhWB HE WH DIKHNE WALA AWR SNNE WALA! ZMIN W AaSMAN KI MKhLWQAT KA KWEI KhBRGIR AUS KE SWA NHIN، AWR WH APNI HKWMT MIN KSI KW ShRIK NHIN KRTA
18.27: AE NBIؐ! TMHARE RB KI KTAB MIN SE JW KChH TM PR WHI KIA GIA HE ASE (JWN KA TWN) SNA DW، KWEI AUS KE FRMWDAT KW BDL DINE KA MJAZ NHIN HE، (AWR AGR TM KSI KI KhATR AS MIN RD W BDL KRW GE TW) AUS SE BCh KR BHAGNE KE LIE KWEI JAEE PNAH NH PAؤ GE
18.28: AWR APNE DL KW AUN LWGWN KI MعIT PR MTMEN KRW JW APNE RB KI RZA KE TLB GAR BN KR SBH W ShAM AUSE PKARTE HIN، AWR AUN SE HRGZ NGAH NH PHIRW KIA TM DNIA KI ZINT PSND KRTE HW? KSI AISE ShKhS KI ATAعT NH KRW JS KE DL KW HM NE APNI IAD SE GhAFL KR DIA HE AWR JS NE APNI KhWAHSh NFS KI PIRWI AKhTIAR KR LI HE AWR JS KA TRIQ KAR AFRAT W TFRIT PR MBNI HE
18.29: SAF KHH DW KH IH HQ HE TMHARE RB KI TRF SE، AB JS KA JI ChAHE MAN LE AWR JS KA JI ChAHE ANKAR KR DE HM NE (ANKAR KRNE WALE) ZALMWN KE LIE AIK AaG TIAR KR RKHI HE JS KI LPTIN ANHIN GHIRE MIN LE ChKI HIN WHAN AGR WH PANI MANGIN GE TWAISE PANI SE AN KI TWAZع KI JAEE GI JW TIL KI TLChHT JISA HWGA AWR AN KA MNH BHWN DALE GA، BDTRIN PINE KI ChIZ AWR BHT BRI AaRAMGAH!
18.30: RHE WH LWG JW MAN LIN AWR NIK عML KRIN، TW IQINAAn HM NIKW KAR LWGWN KA AJR ZAEع NHIN KIA KRTE
18.31: AN KE LIE SDA BHAR JNTIN HIN JN KE NIChE NHRIN BHH RHI HWN GI، WHAN WH SWNE KE KNGNWN SE AaRASTH KIE JAEIN GE، BARIK RIShM AWR ATLS W DIBA KE SBZ KPRE PHNIN GE، AWR AWNChI MSNDWN PR TKIE LGA KR BITHIN GE BHTRIN AJR AWR AعLIA DRJE KI JAEE QIAM!
18.32: AE MHMDؐ! AIN KE SAMNE AIK MSAL PISh KRW DW ShKhS THE AN MIN SE AIK KW HM NE ANGWR KE DW BAGh DIE AWR AUN KE GRD KHJWR KE DRKhTWN KI BARH LGAEI AWR AN KE DRMIAN KAShT KI ZMIN RKHI
18.33: DWNWN BAGh KhWB PHLE PHWLE AWR BAR AaWR HWNE MIN ANHWN NE ZRA SI KSR BHI NH ChHWRI AUN BAGhWN KE ANDR HM NE AIK NHR JARI KR DI
18.34: AWRAUSE KhWB NFع HASL HWA IH KChH PA KR AIK DN WH APNE HMSAEE SE BAT KRTE HWEE BWLA "MIN TJH SE ZIADH MALDAR HWN AWR TJH SE ZIADH TAQTWR NFRI RKHTA HWN"
18.35: PHR WH APNI JNّT MIN DAKhL HWA AWR APNE NFS KE HQ MIN ZALM BN KR KHNE LGA "MIN NHIN SMJHTA KH IH DWLT KBHI FNA HW JAEE GI
18.36: AWR MJHE TWQع NHIN KH QIAMT KI GHRI KBHI AaEE GI TAHM AGR KBHI MJHE APNE RB KE HZWR PLTAIA BHI GIA TW ZRWR AIS SE BHI ZIADH ShANDAR JGH PAؤN GA"
18.37: AUS KE HMSAEE NE GFTGW KRTE HWEE AS SE KHA "KIA TW KFR KRTA HE AUS ZAT SE JS NE TJHE MTI SE AWR PHR NTFE SE PIDA KIA AWR TJHE AIK PWRA AaDMI BNA KHRA KIA?

18.39: AWR JB TW APNI JNT MIN DAKhL HW RHA THA TW AS WQT TIRI ZBAN SE IH KIWN NH NKLA KH MAShAءALLH، LA QWة ALّA BALLH? AGR TW MJHE MAL AWR AWLAD MIN APNE SE KMTR PA RHA HE
18.40: TW BعID NHIN KH MIRA RB MJHE TIRI JNT SE BHTR عTA FRMA DE AWR TIRI JNT PR AaSMAN SE KWEI AaFT BHIJ DE JS SE WH SAF MIDAN BN KR RH JAEE
18.41: IA AS KA PANI ZMIN MIN ATR JAEE AWR PHR TW ASE KSI TRH NH NKAL SKE"
18.42: AaKhRKAR HWA IH KH AS KA SARA SMRH MARA GIA AWR WH APNE ANGWRWN KE BAGh KW TTIWN PR ALTA PRA DIKH KR APNI LGAEI HWEI LAGT PR HATH MLTA RH GIA AWR KHNE LGA KH "KASh! MIN NE APNE RB KE SATH KSI KW ShRIK NH THIRAIA HWTA"
18.43: NH HWA ALLH KW ChHWR KR AS KE PAS KWEI JTHA KH AS KI MDD KRTA، AWR NH KR SKA WH AaP HI AS AaFT KA MQABLH
18.44: AUS WQT MعLWM HWA KH KARSAZI KA AKhTIAR KhDAEE BRHQ HI KE LIE HE، ANعAM WHI BHTR HE JW WH BKhShE AWR ANJAM WHI BKhIR HE JW WH DKHAEE
18.45: AWR AE NBIؐ! AINHIN HIAT DNIA KI HQIQT AIS MSAL SE SMJHAؤ KH AaJ HM NE AaSMAN SE PANI BRSA DIA TW ZMIN KI PAWD KhUWB GHNI HW GEI، AWR KL WHI NBATAT BHUS BN KR RH GEI JSE HWAEIN ARAEE LIE PHRTI HIN ALLH HR ChIZ PR QDRT RKHTA HE
18.46: IH MAL AWR IH AWLAD MHZ DUNIWI ZNDGI KI AIK HNGAMI AaRAESh HE ASL MIN TW BAQI RH JANE WALI NIKIAN HI TIRE RB KE NZDIK NTIJE KE LHAZ SE BHTR HIN AWR AUNHI SE AChHI AUMّIDIN WABSTH KI JA SKTI HIN
18.47: FKR AUS DN KI HWNI ChAHIE JB KH HM PHARWN KW ChLAEIN GE، AWR TM ZMIN KW BALKL BRHNH PAؤ GE، AWR HM TMAM ANSANWN KW AS TRH GHIR KR JMع KRIN GE KH (AGLWN PChHLWN MIN SE) AIK BHI NH ChHWTE GA
18.48: AWR SB KE SB TMHARE RB KE HZWR SF DR SF PISh KIE JAEIN GE LW DIKH LW، Aa GEE NA TM HMARE PAS AUSI TRH JISA HM NE TM KW PHLI BAR PIDA KIA THA TM NE TW IH SMJHA THA KH HM NE TMHARE LIE KWEI WعDE KA WQT MQRR HI NHIN KIA HE
18.49: AWR NAMH AعMAL SAMNE RKH DIA JAEE GA AS WQT TM DIKHW GE KH MJRM LWG APNI KTAB ZNDGI KE ANDRAJAT SE DR RHE HWN GE AWR KHH RHE HWN GE KH HAEE HMARI KM BKhTI، IH KISI KTAB HE KH HMARI KWEI ChHWTI BRI HRKT AISI NHIN RHI JW AS MIN DRJ NH HW GEI HW JW JW KChH ANHWN NE KIA THA WH SB APNE SAMNE HAZR PAEIN GE AWR TIRA RB KSI PR ZRA ZLM NH KRE GA
18.50: IAD KRW، JB HM NE FRShTWN SE KHA KH AaDMؑ KW SJDH KRW TW ANHWN NE SJDH KIA MGR ABLIS NE NH KIA WH JNWN MIN SE THA AS LIE APNE RB KE HKM KI ATAعT SE NKL GIA AB KIA TM MJHE ChHWR KR AUS KW AWR AS KI ZRّIّT KW APNA SRPRST BNATE HW HALANKH WH TMHARE DShMN HIN? BRA HI BRA BDL HE JSE ZALM LWG AKhTIAR KR RHE HIN
18.51: MIN NE AaSMAN W ZMIN PIDA KRTE WQT AUN KW NHIN BLAIA THA AWR NH KhWD AUN KI APNI TKhLIQ MIN ANHIN ShRIK KIA THA MIRA IH KAM NHIN HE KH GMRAH KRNE WALWN KW APNA MDD GAR BNAIA KRWN
18.52: PHR KIA KRIN GE IH LWG AUS RWZ JBKH AIN KA RB AIN SE KHE GA KH PKARW AB AUN HSTIWN KW JNHIN TM MIRA ShRIK SMJH BITHE THE IH AN KW PKARIN GE، MGR WH AIN KI MDD KW NH AaEIN GE AWR HM AN KE DRMIAN AIK HI HLAKT KA GRHA MShTRK KR DIN GE
18.53: SARE MJRM AUS RWZ AaG DIKHIN GE AWRSMJH LIN GE KH AB ANHIN AS MIN GRNA HE AWR WH AS SE BChNE KE LIE KWEI JAEE PNAH NH PAEIN GE

18.56: RSWLWN KW HM AS KAM KE SWA AWR KSI GhRZ KE LIE NHIN BHIJTE KH WH BShART AWR TNBIH KI KhDMT ANJAM DE DIN MGR KAFRWN KA HAL IH HE KH WH BATL KE HTHIAR LE KR HQ KW NIChA DKHANE KI KWShSh KRTE HIN AWR ANHWN NE MIRI AaIAT KW AWR AUN TNBIHAT KW JW ANHIN KI GEIN MZAQ BNA LIA HE

18.58: TIRA RB BRA DRGZR KRNE WALA AWR RHIM HE WH AN KE KRTWTWN PR ANHIN PKRNA ChAHTA TW JLDI HI عZAB BHIJ DITA MGR AN KE LIE WعDE KA AIK WQT MQRR HE AWR AS SE BCh KR BHAG NKLNE KI IH KWEI RAH NH PAEIN GE
18.59: IH عZAB RSIDH BSTIAN TMHARE SAMNE MWJWD HIN ANHWN NE JB ZLM KIA TW HM NE ANHIN HLAK KR DIA، AWR AN MIN SE HR AIK KI HLAKT KE LIE HM NE WQT MQRR KR RKHA THA

18.88: AWR JW AN MIN SE AIMAN LAEE GA AWR NIK عML KRE GA AUS KE LIE AChHI JZA HE AWR HM AS KW NRM AHKAM DIN GE"

18.95: AS NE KHA " JW KChH MIRE RB NE MJHE DE RKHA HE WH BHT HE TM BS MHNT SE MIRI MDD KRW، MIN TMHARE AWR AN KE DRMIAN BND BNAEE DITA HWN
18.96: MJHE LWHE KI ChADRIN LA KR DW" AaKhR JB DWNWN PHARWN KE DRMIANI KhLA KW AS NE PAT DIA TW LWGWN SE KHA KH AB AaG DHKAؤ HTIA KH JB (IH AaHNI DIWAR) BALKL AaG KI TRH SURKh HW GEI TW AS NE KHA "LAؤ، AB MIN AS PR PGHLA HWA TANBA ANDILWN GA"

22.1: LWGW، APNE RB KE GhZB SE BChW، HQIQT IH HE KH QIAMT KA ZLZLH BRI (HWLNAK) ChIZ HE
22.2: JS RWZ TM ASE DIKHW GE، HAL IH HW GA KH HR DWDH PLANE WALI APNE DWDH PITE BChّE SE GhAFL HW JAEE GI، HR HAMLH KA HML GR JAEE GA، AWR LWG TM KW MDHWSh NZR AaEIN GE، HALANKH WH NShE MIN NH HWN GE، BLKH ALLH KA عZAB HI KChH AISA SKhT HWGA
