22.5: LWGW، AGR TMHIN ZNDGI BعD MWT KE BARE MIN KChH ShK HE TW TMHIN MعLWM HW KH HM NE TM KW MTI SE PIDA KIA HE، PHR NTFE SE، PHR KhWN KE LWTHRE SE، PHR GWShT KI BWTI SE JW ShKL WALI BHI HWTI HE AWR BE ShKL BHI (IH HM AS LIE BTA RHE HIN) TAKH TM PR HQIQT WAZH KR DIN HM JS (NTFE) KW ChAHTE HIN AIK WQT KhAS TK RHMWN MIN THIRAEE RKHTE HIN، PHR TM KW AIK BChّE KI SWRT MIN NKAL LATE HIN (PHR TMHIN PRWRSh KRTE HIN) TAKH TM APNI PUWRI JWANI KW PHNChW AWR TM MIN SE KWEI PHLE HI WAPS BLA LIA JATA HE AWR KWEI BDTRIN عMR KI TRF PHIR DIA JATA HE TAKH SB KChH JANNE KE BعD PHR KChH NH JANE AWR TM DIKHTE HW KH ZMIN SWKHI PRI HE، PHR JHAN HM NE AUS PR MINH BRSAIA KH IKAIK WH PHBK ATHI AWR PHWL GEI AWR AS NE HR QSM KI KhWSh MNZR NBATAT AGLNI ShRWع KR DI
22.6: IH SB KChH AS WJH SE HE KH ALLH HI HQ HE، AWR WH MURDWN KW ZNDH KRTA HE، AWR WH HR ChIZ PR QADR HE،
22.7: AWR IH (AIS BAT KI DLIL HE) KH QIAMT KI GHRI Aa KR RHE GI، AS MIN KSI ShK KI GNJAESh NHIN، AWR ALLH ZRWR AUN LWGWN KW ATHAEE GA JW QBRWN MIN JA ChKE HIN

22.10: IH HE TIRA WH MSTQBL JW TIRE APNE HATHWN NE TIRE LIE TIAR KIA HE WRNH ALLH APNE BNDWN PR ZLM KRNE WALA NHIN HE
22.11: AWR LWGWN MIN KWEI AISA HE JW KNARE PR RH KR ALLH KI BNDGI KRTA HE، AGR FAEDH HWA TW MTMEN HW GIA AWR JW KWEI MSIBT Aa GEI TW ALTA PHR GIA AUS KI DNIA BHI GEI AWR AaKhRT BHI IH HE SRIH KhSARH
22.12: PHR WH ALLH KW ChHWR KR AUN KW PKARTA HE JW NH AUS KW NQSAN PHNChA SKTE HIN NH FAEDH IH HE GMRAHI KI ANTHA
22.13: WH AUN KW PKARTA HE JN KA NQSAN AUN KE NFع SE QRIB TR HE BDTRIN HE AUS KA MWLIA AWR BDTRIN HE AUS KA RFIQ
22.14: (AIS KE BRعKS) ALLH AUN LWGWN KW JW AIMAN LAEE AWR JNHWN NE NIK عML KIE، IQINAAn AISI JNTWN MIN DAKhL KRE GA JN KE NIChE NHRIN BHH RHI HWN GI ALLH KRTA HE JW KChH ChAHTA HE

22.16: AISI HI KHULI KHULI BATWN KE SATH HM NE AS QRAaN KW NAZL KIA HE، AWR HDAIT ALLH JSE ChAHTA HE DITA HE
22.17: JW LWG AIMAN LAEE، AWR JW IHWDI HWEE، AWR SABEI، AWR NSARIA، AWR MJWS، AWR JN LWGWN NE ShRK KIA، AN SB KE DRMIAN ALLH QIAMT KE RWZ FISLH KR DE GA، HR ChIZ ALLH KI NZR MIN HE
22.18: KIA TM DIKHTE NHIN HW KH ALLH KE AaGE SRBSJWD HIN WH SB JW AaSMANWN MIN HIN AWR JW ZMIN MIN HIN، SWRJ AWR ChAND AWR TARE AWR PHAR AWR DRKhT AWR JANWR AWR BHT SE ANSAN AWR BHT SE WH LWG BHI JW عZAB KE MSTHQ HW ChKE HIN? AWR JSE ALLH ZLIL W KhWAR KR DE AUSE PHR KWEI عZّT DINE WALA NHIN HE، ALLH KRTA HE JW KChH ChAHTA HE
22.19: IH DW FRIQ HIN JN KE DRMIAN APNE RB KE MعAMLE KA JHGRA HE AIN MIN SE WH LWG JNHWN NE KFR KIA HE AUN KE LIE AaG KE LBAS KATE JA ChKE HIN، AUN KE SRWN PR KHAWLTA HWA PANI DALA JAEE GA
22.20: JS SE AUN KI KHALIN HI NHIN PIT KE ANDR KE HSE TK GL JAEIN GE
22.21: AWR AUN KI KhBR LINE KE LIE LWHE KE GURZ HWN GE
22.22: JB KBHI WH GHBRA KR JHNّM SE NKLNE KI KWShSh KRIN GE PHR AUSI MIN DHKIL DIE JAEIN GE KH ChKHW AB JLNE KI SZA KA MZA
22.23: (DWSRI TRF) JW LWG AIMAN LAEE AWR JNHWN NE NIK عML KIE AUN KW ALLH AISI JNTWN MIN DAKhL KRE GA JN KE NIChE NHRIN BHH RHI HWN GI WHAN WH SWNE KE KNGNWN AWR MWTIWN SE AaRASTH KIE JAEIN GE AWR AN KE LBAS RIShM KE HWN GE

22.25: JN LWGWN NE KFR KIA AWR JW (AaJ) ALLH KE RASTE SE RWK RHE HIN AWR AUS MSJDI HRAM KI ZIART MIN MANع HIN JSE HM NE SB LWGWN KE LIE BNAIA HE، JS MIN MQAMI BAShNDWN AWR BAHR SE AaNE WALWN KE HQWQ BRABR HIN (AUN KI RWSh IQINAAn SZA KI MSTHQ HE) AIS (MSJDI HRAM) MIN JW BHI RASTI SE HT KR ZLM KA TRIQH AKhTIAR KRE GA ASE HM DRD NAK عZAB KA MZA ChKHAEIN GE

27.43: AUS KW (AIMAN LANE SE) JS ChIZ NE RWK RKHA THA WH AUN MعBWDWN KI عBADT THI JNHIN WH ALLH KE SWA PWJTI THI، KIWNKH WH AIK KAFR QWM SE THI

27.55: KIA TMHARA IHI ChLN HE KH عWRTWN KW ChHWR KR MRDWN KE PAS ShHWT RANI KE LIE JATE HW? HQIQT IH HE KH TM LWG SKhT JHALT KA KAM KRTE HW"
27.56: MGR AUS KI QWM KA JWAB AS KE SWA KChH NH THA KH ANHWN NE KHA "NKAL DW LWTؑ KE GHR WALWN KW APNI BSTI SE، IH BRE PAKBAZ BNTE HIN"
27.57: AaKhR KAR HM NE BChA LIA AUS KW AWR AUS KE GHR WALWN KW، BJZ AUS KI BIWI KE JS KA PIChHE RH JANA HM NE TE KR DIA THA
27.58: AWR BRSAEI AUN LWGWN PR AIK BRSAT، BHT HI BRI BRSAT THI WH AUN LWGWN KE HQ MIN JW MTNBH KIE JA ChKE THE
27.59: (AE NBIؐ) KHW، HMD ALLH KE LIE AWR SLAM AS KE AUN BNDWN PR JNHIN AS NE BRGZIDH KIA (AIN SE PWChHW) ALLH BHTR HE IA WH MعBWD JNHIN IH LWG AS KA ShRIK BNA RHE HIN?
27.60: BHLA WH KWN HE JS NE AaSMANWN AWR ZMIN KW PIDA KIA AWR TMHARE LIE AaSMAN SE PANI BRSAIA PHR AS KE ZRIعH SE WH KhWShNMA BAGh AGAEE JN KE DRKhTWN KA AGANA TMHARE BS MIN NH THA? 27.62: KWN HE JW BE QRAR KI DعA SNTA HE JBKH WH AUSE PKARE AWR KWN AS KI TKLIF RFع KRTA HE? AWR (KWN HE JW) TMHIN ZMIN KA KhLIFH BNATA HE? KIA ALLH KE SATH KWEI AWR KhDA BHI (IH KAM KRNE WALA) HE? TM LWG KM HI SWChTE HW

27.66: BLKH AaKhRT KA TW عLM HI AIN LWGWN SE GM HW GIA HE، BLKH IH AS KI TRF SE ShK MIN HIN، BLKH IH AUS SE ANDHE HIN

27.79: PS AE NBIؐ، ALLH PR BHRWSA RKHW، IQINAAn TM SRIH HQ PR HW

27.81: AWR NH ANDHWN KW RASTH BTA KR BHTKNE SE BChA SKTE HW TM TW APNI BAT AUNHI LWGWN KW SNA SKTE HW JW HMARI AaIAT PR AIMAN LATE HIN AWR PHR FRMAN BRDAR BN JATE HIN
27.82: AWR JB HMARI BAT PUWRI HWNE KA WQT AUN PR Aa PHNChE GA TW HM AN KE LIE AIK JANWR ZMIN SE NKALIN GE JW AN SE KLAM KRE GA KH LWG HMARI AaIAT PR IQIN NHIN KRTE THE
27.83: AWR ZRA TSWR KRW AUS DN KA JB HM HR AMّT MIN SE AIK FWJ KI FWJ AUN LWGWN KI GHIR LAEIN GE JW HMARI AaIAT KW JHTLAIA KRTE THE، PHR AN KW (AN KI AQSAM KE LHAZ SE DRJH BDRJH) MRTB KIA JAEE GA
27.84: IHAN TK KH JB SB Aa JAEIN GE TW (AN KA RB AN SE) PWChHE GA KH "TM NE MIRI AaIAT KW JHTLA DIA HALANKH TM NE AN KA عLMI AHATH NH KIA THA? AGR IH NHIN TW AWR TM KIA KR RHE THE?"

27.88: AaJ TW PHARWN KW DIKHTA HE AWR SMJHTA HE KH KhWB JME HWEE HIN، MGR AUS WQT IH BADLWN KI TRH AR RHE HWN GE، IH ALLH KI QDRT KA KRShMH HW GA JS NE HR ChIZ KW HKMT KE SATH ASTWAR KIA HE WH KhWB JANTA HE KH TM LWG KIA KRTE HW

27.91: (AE MHMDؐ، AIN SE KHW) "MJHE TW IHI HKM DIA GIA HE KH AIS ShHR KE RB KI BNDGI KRWN JS NE AISE HRM BNAIA HE AWR JW HR ChIZ KA MALK HE MJHE HKM DIA GIA HE KH MIN MSLM BN KR RHWN
27.92: AWR IH QRAaN PRH KR SNAؤN" AB JW HDAIT AKhTIAR KRE GA WH APNE HI BHLE KE LIE HDAIT AKhTIAR KRE GA AWR JW GMRAH HW AUS SE KHH DW KH MIN TW BS KhBRDAR KR DINE WALA HWN
27.93: AIN SE KHW، TعRIF ALLH HI KE LIE HE، عNQRIB WH TMHIN APNI NShANIAN DKHA DE GA AWR TM ANHIN PHChAN LW GE، AWR TIRA RB BE KhBR NHIN HE AUN AعMAL SE JW TM LWG KRTE HW

28.2: IH KTAB MBIN KI AaIAT HIN
28.3: HM MWSIAؑ AWR FRعWN KA KChH HAL THIK THIK TMHIN SUNATE HIN AISE LWGWN KE FAEDE KE LIE JW AIMAN LAEIN
28.4: WAQعH IH HE KH FRعWN NE ZMIN MIN SRKShI KI AWR AS KE BAShNDWN KW GRWHWN MIN TQSIM KR DIA AN MIN SE AIK GRWH KW WH ZLIL KRTA THA، AS KE LRKWN KW QTL KRTA AWR AS KI LRKIWN KW JITA RHNE DITA THA FI ALWAQع WH MFSD LWGWN MIN SE THA
28.5: AWR HM IH ARADH RKHTE THE KH MHRBANI KRIN AN LWGWN PR JW ZMIN MIN ZLIL KR KE RKHE GEE THE AWR ANHIN PIShWA BNA DIN AWR ANHI KW WARS BNAEIN
28.6: AWR ZMIN MIN AN KW AQTDAR BKhShIN AWR AN SE FRعWN W HAMAN AWR AN KE LShKRWN KW WHI KChH DKHLA DIN JS KA ANHIN DR THA
28.7: HM NE MWSIAؑ KI MAN KW AShARH KIA KH "AIS KW DWDH PLA، PHR JB TJHE AUS KI JAN KA KhTRH HW TW ASE DRIA MIN DAL DE AWR KChH KhWF AWR GhM NH KR، HM ASE TIRE HI PAS WAPS LE AaEIN GE AWR AS KW PIGhMBRWN MIN ShAML KRIN GE"
28.8: Aa KhRKAR FRعWN KE GHR WALWN NE ASE (DRIA SE) NKAL LIA TAKH WH AN KA DShMN AWR AN KE LIE SBBI RNJ BNE، WAQعI FRعWN AWR HAMAN AWR AS KE LShKR (APNI TDBIR MIN) BRE GhLT KAR THE
28.9: FRعWN KI BIWI NE (AS SE) KHA "IH MIRE AWR TIRE LIE AaNKHWN KI THNDK HE، ASE QTL NH KRW، KIA عJB KH IH HMARE LIE MFID SABT HW، IA HM ASE BITA HI BNA LIN" AWR WH (ANJAM SE) BE KhBR THE
28.10: AUDHR MWSIAؑ KI MAN KA DL ARA JA RHA THA WH AS RAZ KW FASh KR BITHTI AGR HM AS KI DHARS NH BNDHA DITE TAKH WH (HMARE WعDE PR) AIMAN LANE WALWN MIN SE HW
28.11: AUS NE BChE KI BHN SE KHA AS KE PIChHE PIChHE JA ChNANChH WH ALG SE AS KW AS TRH DIKHTI RHI KH (DShMNWN KW) AS KA PTH NH ChLA
28.12: AWR HM NE BChّE PR PHLE HI DUWDH PILANE WALIWN KI ChHATIAN HRAM KR RKHI THIN (IH HALT DIKH KR) AUS LRKI NE AUN SE KHA "MIN TMHIN AISE GHR KA PTH BTAؤN JS KE LWG AS KI PRWRSh KA ZMّH LIN AWR KhIR KhWAHI KE SATH ASE RKHIN?"
28.13: AS TRH HM MWSIAؑ KW AS KI MAN KE PAS PLTA LAEE TAKH AS KI AaNKHIN THNDI HWN AWR WH GhMGIN NH HW AWR JAN LE KH ALLH KA WعDH SChA THA، MGR AKSR LWG AS BAT KW NHIN JANTE
28.14: PHR JB MWSIAؑ APNI PWRI JWANI KW PHNCh GIA AWR AS KA NShWWNMA MKML HW GIA TW HM NE ASE HKM AWR عLM عTA KIA، HM NIK LWGWN KW AISI HI JZA DITE HIN
28.15: (AIK RWZ) WH ShHR MIN AISE WQT MIN DAKhL HWA JBKH AHLI ShHR GhFLT MIN THE WHAN AS NE DIKHA KH DW AaDMI LR RHE HIN AIK AS KI APNI QWM KA THA AWR DUWSRA AS KI DShMN QWM SE TعLQ RKHTA THA AS KI QWM KE AaDMI NE DShMN QWM WALE KE KhLAF ASE MDD KE LIE PKARA MWSIAؑ NE AS KW AIK GHWNSA MARA AWR AS KA KAM TMAM KR DIA (IH HRKT SRZD HWTE HI) MWSIAؑ NE KHA "IH ShITAN KI KARFRMAEI HE، WH SKhT DShMN AWR KHLA GMRAH KN HE"
28.16: PHR WH KHNE LGA "AE MIRE RB، MAIN NE APNE NFS PR BRA ZLM KR DALA، MIRI MGhFRT FRMA DE" ChNANChH ALLH NE AS KI MGhFRT FRMA DI، WH GhFWR RHIM HE
28.17: MWSIAؑ NE عHD KIA KH "“AE MIRE RB، IH AHSAN JW TW NE MJH PR KIA HE AIS KE BعD AB MIN KBHI MJRMWN KA MDD GAR NH BNWN GA"
28.18: DUWSRE RWZ WH SBH SWIRE DRTA AWR HR TRF SE KhTRH BHANPTA HWA ShHR MIN JA RHA THA KH IKAIK KIA DIKHTA HE KH WHI ShKhS JS NE KL ASE MDD KE LIE PKARA THA AaJ PHR ASE PKAR RHA HE MWSIAؑ NE KHA "TUW TW BRA HI BHKA HUWA AaDMI HE"
28.19: PHR JB MWSIAؑ NE ARADH KIA KH DShMN QWM KE AaDMI PR HMLH KRE TW WH PKAR ATHA "AE MWSIAؑ، KIA AaJ TW MJHE AUSI TRH QTL KRNE LGA HE JS TRH KL AIK ShKhS KW QTL KR ChKA HE، TW AS MLK MIN JBّAR BN KR RHNA ChAHTA HE، ASLAH NHIN KRNA ChAHTA"
28.20: AS KE BعD AIK AaDMI ShHR KE PRLE SIRE SE DAWRTA HWA AaIA AWR BWLA "MWSIAؑ، SRDARWN MIN TIRE QTL KE MShWRE HW RHE HIN، IHAN SE NKL JA، MIN TIRA KhIR KhWAH HWN"
28.21: IH KhBR SNTE HI MWSIAؑ DRTA AWR SHMTA NKL KHRA HWA AWR AS NE DعA KI KH "AE MIRE RB، MJHE ZALMWN SE BChA"
28.22: (MSR SE NKL KR) JB MWSIAؑ NE MADIAN KA RUKh KIA TW AUS NE KHA "AUMID HE KH MIRA RB MJHE THIK RASTE PR DAL DE GA"
28.23: AWR JB WH MADIAN KE KNWEIN PR PHNChA TW AUS NE DIKHA KH BHT SE LWG APNE JANWRWN KW PANI PLA RHE HIN AWR AN SE ALG AIK TRF DW عWRTIN APNE JANWRWN KW RWK RHI HIN MWSIAؑ NE AIN عWRTWN SE PWChHA "TMHIN KIA PRIShANI HE?" ANHWN NE KHA "HM APNE JANWRWN KW PANI NHIN PLA SKTIN JB TK IH ChRWAHE APNE JANWR NKAL KR NH LE JAEIN، AWR HMARE WALD AIK BHT BWRHE AaDMI HIN"
28.24: IH SN KW MWSIAؑ NE AN KE JANWRWN KW PANI PLA DIA، PHR AIK SAEE KI JGH JA BITHA AWR BWLA "PRWRDGAR، JW KhIR BHI TW MJH PR NAZL KR DE MIN AS KA MHTAJ HWN"

28.31: AWR (HKM DIA GIA KH) PHINK DE APNI LATHI JWNHI KH MWSIAؑ NE DIKHA KH WH LATHI SANP KI TRH BL KHA RHI HE TW WH PITH PHIR KR BHAGA AWR AS NE MR KR BHI NH DIKHA (ARShAD HWA) "MWSIAؑ، PLT Aa AWR KhWF NH KR، TW BALKL MHFWZ HE

28.34: AWR MIRA BHAEI HARWNؑ MJHE SE ZIADH ZBAN AaWR HE، ASE MIRE SATH MDD GAR KE TWR PR BHIJ TAKH WH MIRI TAEID KRE، MJHE ANDIShH HE KH WH LWG MJHE JHTLAEIN GE"

28.36: PHR JB MWSIAؑ AUN LWGWN KE PAS HMARI KHULI KHULI NShANIAN LE KR PHNChA TW ANHWN NE KHA KH IH KChH NHIN HE MGR BNAWTI JADWGR AWR IH BATIN TW HM NE APNE BAP DADA KE ZMANE MIN KBHI SUNIN HI NHIN
28.37: MWSIAؑ NE JWAB DIA "MIRA RB AUS ShKhS KE HAL SE KhWB WAQF HE JW AS KI TRF SE HDAIT LE KR AaIA HE AWR WHI BHTR JANTA HE KH AaKhRI ANJAM KS KA AChHA HWNA HE، HQ IH HE KH ZALM KBHI FLAH NHIN PATE"
28.38: AWR FRعWN NE KHA "AE AHL DRBAR MIN TW APNE SWA TMHARE KSI KhDA KW NHIN JANTA HAMAN، ZRA AINTIN PKWA KR MIRE LIE AIK AWNChI عMART TW BNWA، ShAID KH AS PR ChRH KR MIN MWSIAؑ KE KhDA KW DIKH SKWN، MIN TW ASE JHUWTA SMJHTA HWN"

28.40: AaKhR KAR HM NE ASE AWR AS KE LShKRWN KW PKRA AWR SMNDR MIN PHINK DIA AB DIKH LW KH AN ZALMWN KA KISA ANJAM HWA

28.44: (AE MHMDؐ) TM AUS WQT MGhRBI GWShE MIN MWJWD NH THE JB HM NE MWSIAؑ KW IH FRMAN ShRIعT عTA KIA، AWR NH TM ShAHDIN MIN ShAML THE

28.46: AWR TM TWR KE DAMN MIN BHI AUS WQT MWJWD NH THE JB HM NE (MWSIAؑ KW PHLI MRTBH) PKARA THA، MGR IH TMHARE RB KI RHMT HE (KH TM KW IH MعLWMAT DI JAR HI HIN) TAKH TM AUN LWGWN KW MTNBّH KR DW JN KE PAS TM SE PHLE KWEI MTNBّH KRNE WALA NHIN AaIA، ShAID KH WH HWSh MIN AaEIN

28.48: MGR JB HMARE HAN SE HQ AN KE PAS Aa GIA TW WH KHNE LGE "KIWN NH DIA GIA AIS KW WHI KChH JW MWSIAؑ KW DIA GIA THA?" KIA IH LWG AUS KA ANKAR NHIN KR ChKE HIN JW AS SE PHLE MWSIAؑ KW DIA GIA THA? ANHWN NE KHA "DWNWN JADWGR HIN JW AIK DUWSRE KI MDD KRTE HIN" AWR KHA "HM KSI KW NHIN MANTE"
28.49: (AE NBIؐ،) AN SE KHW، "AChHA TW LAؤ ALLH KI TRF SE KWEI KTAB JW AIN DWNWN SE ZIADH HDAIT BKhShNE WALI HW AGR TM SChE HW، MIN ASI KI PIRWI AKhTIAR KRWN GA"
28.50: AB AGR WH TMHARA IH MTALBH PWRA NHIN KRTE TW SMJH LW KH DRASL IH APNI KhWAHShAT KE PIRW HIN، AWR AUS ShKhS SE BRH KR KWN GMRAH HW GA JW KhDAEI HDAIT KE BGhIR BS APNI KhWAHShAT KI PIRWI KRE? ALLH AISE ZALMWN KW HRGZ HDAIT NHIN BKhShTA
28.51: AWR (NSIHT KI) BAT PE DR PE HM ANHIN PHNChA ChKE HIN TAKH WH GhFLT SE BIDAR HWN
28.52: JN LWGWN KW AS SE PHLE HM NE KTAB DI THI WH AIS (QRAaN) PR AIMAN LATE HIN
28.53: AWR JB IH AUN KW SUNAIA JATA HE TW WH KHTE HIN KH "HM AIS PR AIMAN LAEE، IH WAQعI HQ HE HMARE RB KI TRF SE، HM TW PHLE HI SE MSLM HIN"

28.55: AWR JB ANHWN NE BIHWDH BAT SNI TW IH KHH KR AS SE KNARH KSh HW GEE KH "HMARE AعMAL HMARE LIE AWR TMHARE AعMAL TMHARE LIE، TM KW SLAM HE، HM JAHLWN KA SA TRIQH AKhTIAR NHIN KRNA ChAHTE"
28.56: AE NBIؐ، TM JSE ChAHW ASE HDAIT NHIN DE SKTE، MGR ALLH JSE ChAHTA HE HDAIT DITA HE AWR WH AN LWGWN KW KhWB JANTA HE JW HDAIT QBWL KRNE WALE HIN
28.57: WH KHTE HIN "AGR HM TMHARE SATH AIS HDAIT KI PIRWI AKhTIAR KR LIN TW APNI ZMIN SE AUChK LIE JAEIN GE" KIA IH WAQعH NHIN HE KH HM NE AIK PRAMN HRM KW AN KE LIE JAEE QIAM BNA DIA JS KI TRF HR TRH KE SMRAT KHChE ChLE AaTE HIN، HMARI TRF SE RZQ KE TWR PR? MGR AN MIN SE AKSR LWG JANTE NHIN HIN
28.58: AWR KTNI HI AISI BSTIAN HM TBAH KR ChKE HIN JN KE LWG APNI MعIShT PR ATRA GEE THE SW DIKH LW، WH AN KE MSKN PRE HWEE HIN JN MIN AN KE BعD KM HI KWEI BSA HE، Aa KhRKAR HM HI WARS HW KR RHE
28.59: AWR TIRA RB BSTIWN KW HLAK KRNE WALA NH THA JB TK KH AN KE MRKZ MIN AIK RSUWL NH BHIJ DITA JW AN KW HMARI AaIAT SUNATA AWR HM BSTIWN KW HLAK KRNE WALE NH THE JB TK KH AN KE RHNE WALE ZALM NH HW JATE
28.60: TM LWGWN KW JW KChH BHI DIA GIA HE WH MHZ DUNIA KI ZNDGI KA SAMAN AWR AS KI ZINT HE، AWR JW KChH ALLH KE PAS HE WH AS SE BHTR AWR BAQI TR HE KIA TM LWG عQL SE KAM NHIN LITE?
28.61: BHLA WH ShKhS JS SE HM NE AChHA WعDH KIA HW AWR WH ASE PANE WALA HW KBHI AS ShKhS KI TRH HW SKTA HE JSE HM NE SRF HIAT DNIA KA SRWSAMAN DE DIA HW AWR PHR WH QIAMT KE RWZ SZA KE LIE PISh KIA JANE WALA HW?

28.63: IH QWL JN PR ChSPAN HW GA WH KHIN GE "AE HMARE RB، BE ShK IHI LWG HIN JN KW HM NE GMRAH KIA THA، AINHIN HM NE AUSI TRH GMRAH KIA JISE HM KhWD GMRAH HWEE HM AaP KE SAMNE BRAءT KA AZHAR KRTE HIN IH HMARI TW BNDGI NHIN KRTE THE"

28.66: AUS WQT KWEI JWAB AIN KW NH SUWJHE GA AWR NH IH AaPS MIN AIK DUWSRE SE PWChH HI SKIN GE

28.73: IH ASI KI RHMT HE KH AS NE TMHARE LIE RAT AWR DN BNAEE TAKH TM (RAT MIN) SKWN HASL KRW AWR (DN KW) APNE RB KA FZL TLASh KRW، ShAID KH TM ShKR GZAR BNW

28.80: MGR JW LWG عLM RKHNE WALE THE WH KHNE LGE "AFSWS TMHARE HAL PR، ALLH KA SWAB BHTR HE AUS ShKhS KE LIE JW AIMAN LAEE AWR NIK عML KRE، AWR IH DWLT NHIN MLTI MGR SBR KRNE WALWN KW"
28.81: AaKhR KAR HM NE ASE AWR AS KE GHR KW ZMIN MIN DAHNSA DIA PHR KWEI AS KE HAMIWN KA GRWH NH THA JW ALLH KE MQABLH MIN AS KI MDD KW AaTA AWR NH WH KhWD APNI MDD AaP KR SKA
28.82: AB WHI LWG JW KL AS KI MNZLT KI TMNA KR RHE THE KHNE LGE "AFSWS، HM BHWL GEE THE KH ALLH APNE BNDWN MIN SE JS KA RZQ ChAHTA HE KShADH KRTA HE AWR JSE ChAHTA HE NAPA TLA DITA HE AGR ALLH NE HM PR AHSAN NH KIA HWTA TW HMIN BHI ZMIN MIN DAHNSA DITA AFSWS HM KW IAD NH RHA KH KAFR FLAH NHIN PAIA KRTE"
28.83: WH AaKhRT KA GHR TW HM AUN LWGWN KE LIE MKhSWS KR DIN GE JW ZMIN MIN APNI BRAEI NHIN ChAHTE AWR NH FSAD KRNA ChAHTE HIN AWR ANJAM KI BHALAEI MTQIN HI KE LIE HE

28.85: AE NBIؐ، IQIN JANW KH JS NE IH QRAaN TM PR FRZ KIA HE WH TMHIN AIK BHTRIN ANJAM KW PHNChANE WALA HE AIN LWGWN SE KHH DW KH "MIRA RB KhUWB JANTA HE KH HDAIT LE KR KWN AaIA HE AWR KHULI GMRAHI MIN KWN MUBTLA HE"
28.86: TM AS BAT KE HRGZ AMIDWAR NH THE KH TM PR KTAB NAZL KI JAEE GI، IH TW MHZ TMHARE RB KI MHRBANI SE (TM PR NAZL HWEI HE)، PS TM KAFRWN KE MDD GAR NH BNW
28.87: AWR AISA KBHI NH HWNE PAEE KH ALLH KI AaIAT JB TM PR NAZL HWN TW KFّAR TMHIN AUN SE BAZ RKHIN APNE RB KI TRF DعWT DW AWR HRGZ MShRKWN MIN ShAML NH HW
28.88: AWR ALLH KE SATH KSI DUWSRE MعBUWD KW NH PKARW AUS KE SWA KWEI MعBUWD NHIN HE HR ChIZ HLAK HWNE WALI HE SWAEE AUS KI ZAT KE FRMAN RWAEI AUSI KI HE AWR AUSI KI TRF TM SB PLTAEE JAؤ GE

29.2: KIA LWGWN NE IH SMJH RKHA HE KH WH BS ATNA KHNE PR ChHWR DIE JAEIN GE KH "HM AIMAN LAEE " AWR AN KW AaZMAIA NH JAEE GA?
29.3: HALAN KH HM AUN SB LWGWN KI AaZMAESh KR ChKE HIN JW AIN SE PHLE GZRE HIN ALLH KW TW ZRWR IH DIKHNA HE KH SChّE KWN HIN AWR JHWTE KWN
29.4: AWR KIA WH LWG JW BURI HRKTIN KR RHE HIN IH SMJHE BITHE HIN KH WH HM SE BAZI LE JAEIN GE? BRA GhLT HKM HE JW WH LGA RHE HIN
29.5: JW KWEI ALLH SE MLNE KI TWQع RKHTA HW (AUSE MعLWM HWNA ChAHIE KH) ALLH KA MQRR KIA HWA WQT AaNE HI WALA HE، AWR ALLH SB KChH SUNTA AWR JANTA HE
29.6: JW ShKhS BHI MJAHDH KRIGA APNE HI BHLE KE LIE KRE GA، ALLH IQINAAn DNIA JHAN WALWN SE BE NIAZ HE
29.7: AWR JW LWG AIMAN LAEIN GE AWR NIK AعMAL KRIN GE AUN KI BRAEIAN HM AN SE DUWR KR DIN GE AWR ANHIN AUN KE BHTRIN AعMAL KI JZA DIN GE
29.8: HM NE ANSAN KW HDAIT KI HE KH APNE WALDIN KE SATH NIK SLWK KRE LIKN AGR WH TJH PR ZWR DALIN KH TW MIRE SATH KSI AISE (MعBUWD) KW ShRIK THIRAEE JSE TW (MIRE ShRIK KI HISIT SE) NHIN JANTA TW AN KI ATAعT NH KR MIRI HI TRF TM SB KW PLT KR AaNA HE، PHR MIN TM KW BTA DWN GA KH TM KIA KRTE RHE HW
29.9: AWR JW LWG AIMAN LAEE HWN GE AWR JNHWN NE NIK AعMAL KIE HWN GE AUN KW HM ZRWR SALHIN MIN DAKhL KRIN GE
29.10: LWGWN MIN SE KWEI AISA HE JW KHTA HE KH HM AIMAN LAEE ALLH PR MGR JB WH ALLH KE MعAMLH MIN STAIA GIA TW AS NE LWGWN KI DALI HWEI AaZMAESh KW ALLH KE عZAB KI TRH SMJH LIA AB AGR TIRE RB KI TRF SE FTH W NSRT Aa GEI TW IHI ShKhS KHE GA KH "HM TW TMHARE SATH THE" KIA DNIA WALWN KE DLWN KA HAL ALLH KW BKhWBI MعLWM NHIN HE?
29.11: AWR ALLH KW TW ZRWR IH DIKHNA HI HE KH AIMAN LANE WALE KWN HIN AWR MNAFQ KWN

29.13: HAN ZRWR WH APNE BWJH BHI ATHAEIN GE AWR APNE BWJHWN KE SATH BHT SE DWSRE BWJH BHI AWR QIAMT KE RWZ IQINAAn AN SE AIN AFTRA PRDAZIWN KI BAZPRS HW GI JW WH KRTE RHE HIN
29.14: HM NE NWHؑ KW AS KI QWM KI TRF BHIJA AWR WH PChAS KM AIK HZAR BRS AUN KE DRMIAN RHA AaKhR KAR AUN LWGWN KW TWFAN NE Aa GHIRA AS HAL MIN KH WH ZALM THE
29.15: PHR NWHؑ KW AWR KShTI WALWN KW HM NE BChA LIA AWR AUSE DNIA WALWN KE LIE AIK NShAN عBRT BNA KR RKH DIA
29.16: AWR ABRAHIMؑ KW BHIJA JBKH AUS NE APNI QWM SE KHA "ALLH KI BNDGI KRW AWR AUS SE DRW IH TMHARE LIE BHTR HE AGR TM JANW
29.17: TM ALLH KW ChHWR KR JNHIN PWJ RHE HW WH TW MHZ BT HIN AWR TM AIK JHWT GHR RHE HW DR HQIQT ALLH KE SWA JN KI TM PRSTSh KRTE HW WH TMHIN KWEI RZQ BHI DINE KA AKhTIAR NHIN RKHTE ALLH SE RZQ MANGW AWR AUSI KI BNDGI KRW AWR AS KA ShKR ADA KRW، ASI KI TRF TM PLTAEE JANE WALE HW

29.19: KIA AIN LWGWN NE KBHI DIKHA HI NHIN HE KH ALLH KS TRH KhLQ KI ABTDA KRTA HE، PHR AUS KA AعADH KRTA HE? IQINAAn IH (AعADH TW) ALLH KE LIE AaSAN TR HE
29.20: AN SE KHW KH ZMIN MIN ChLW PHRW AWR DIKHW KH AUS NE KS TRH KhLQ KI ABTDA KI HE، PHR ALLH BAR DIGR BHI ZNDGI BKhShE GA IQINAAn ALLH HR ChIZ PR QADR HE
29.21: JSE ChAHE SZA DE AWR JS PR ChAHE RHM FRMAEE، AUSI KI TRF TM PHIRE JANE WALE HW
29.22: TM NH ZMIN MIN عAJZ KRNE WALE HW NH AaSMAN MIN، AWR ALLH SE BChANE WALA KWEI SRPRST AWR MDD GAR TMHARE LIE NHIN HE
29.23: JN LWGWN NE ALLH KI AaIAT KA AWR AS SE MLAQAT KA ANKAR KIA HE WH MIRI RHMT SE MAIWS HW ChKE HIN AWR AN KE LIE DRD NAK SZA HE
29.24: PHR AUS KI QWM KA JWAB AIS KE SWA KChH NH THA KH ANHWN NE KHA "QTL KR DW AISE IA JLA DALW AIS KW" AaKhR KAR ALLH NE ASE AaG SE BChA LIA، IQINAAn AS MIN NShANIAN HIN AUN LWGWN KE LIE JW AIMAN LANE WALE HIN

31.5: IHI LWG APNE RB KI TRF SE RAHI RAST PR HIN AWR IHI FLAH PANE WALE HIN
31.6: AWR ANSANWN HI MIN SE KWEI AISA BHI HE JW KLAM DLFRIB KhRID KR LATA HE TAKH LWGWN KW ALLH KE RASTH SE عLM KE BGhIR BHTKA DE AWR AS RASTE KI DعWT KW MZAQ MIN ARA DE AISE LWGWN KE LIE SKhT ZLIL KRNE WALA عZAB HE
31.7: ASE JB HMARI AaIAT SNAEI JATI HIN TW WH BRE GHMND KE SATH AS TRH RKh PHIR LITA HE GWIA KH AS NE ANHIN SNA HI NHIN، GWIA KH AS KE KAN BHRE HIN AChHA، MZhDH SUNA DW ASE AIK DRD NAK عZAB KA
31.8: ALBTH JW LWG AIMAN LE AaEIN AWR NIK عML KRIN، AUN KE LIE NعMT BHRI JNTIN HIN
31.9: JN MIN WH HMIShH RHIN GE IH ALLH KA PKhTH WعDH HE AWR WH ZBRDST AWR HKIM HE
31.10: AS NE AaSMANWN KW PIDA KIA BGhIR STWNWN KE JW TM KW NZR AaEIN AUS NE ZMIN MIN PHAR JMA DIE TAKH WH TMHIN LE KR DHLK NH JAEE AS NE HR TRH KE JANWR ZMIN MIN PHILA DIE AWR AaSMAN SE PANI BRSAIA AWR ZMIN MIN QSM QSM KI عMDH ChIZIN AGA DIN
31.11: IH TW HE ALLH KI TKhLIQ، AB ZRA MJHE DKHAؤ، AN DWSRWN NE KIA PIDA KIA HE? ASL BAT IH HE KH IH ZALM LWG SRIH GMRAHI MIN PRE HWEE HIN
31.12: HM NE LQMAN KW HKMT عTA KI THI KH ALLH KA ShKR GZAR HW JW KWEI ShKR KRE AUS KA ShKR AUS KE APNE HI LIE MFID HE AWR JW KWEI KFR KRE TW HQIQT MIN ALLH BE NIAZ AWR AaP SE AaP MHMWD HE
31.13: IAD KRW JB LQMAN APNE BITE KW NSIHT KR RHA THA TW AS NE KHA "BITA! KhDA KE SATH KSI KW ShRIK NH KRNA، HQ IH HE KH ShRK BHT BRA ZLM HE"
31.14: AWR HQIQT IH HE KH HM NE ANSAN KW APNE WALDIN KA HQ PHChANNE KI KhWD TAKID KI HE AUS KI MAN NE ZعF PR ZعF AUTHA KR ASE APNE PIT MIN RKHA AWR DW SAL AUS KA DWDH ChHWTNE MIN LGE (AISI LIE HM NE AUS KW NSIHT KI KH) MIRA ShKR KR AWR APNE WALDIN KA ShKR BJA LA، MIRI HI TRF TJHE PLTNA HE
31.15: LIKN AGR WH TJH PR DBAؤ DALIN KH MIRE SATH TW KSI AISE KW ShRIK KRE JSE TW NHIN JANTA TW AN KI BAT HRGZ NH MAN DUNIA MIN AN KE SATH NIK BRTAؤ KRTA RH MGR PIRWI AUS ShKhS KE RASTE KI KR JS NE MIRI TRF RJWع KIA HE PHR TM SB KW PLTNA MIRI HI TRF HE، AUS WQT MIN TMHIN BTA DWN GA KH TM KISE عML KRTE RHE HW
31.16: (AWR LQMAN NE KHA THA KH) "BITA، KWEI ChIZ RAEI KE DANH BRABR BHI HW AWR KSI ChTAN MIN IA AaSMANWN IA ZMIN MIN KHIN ChHPI HWEI HW، ALLH AUSE NKAL LAEE GA WH BARIK BIN AWR BAKhBR HE
31.17: BITA، NMAZ QAEM KRNE KA HKM DE، BDI SE MNع KR، AWR JW MSIBT BHI PRE AS PR SBR KR IH WH BATIN HIN JN KI BRI TAKID KI GEI HE
31.18: AWR LWGWN SE MNH PHIR KR BAT NH KR، NH ZMIN MIN AKR KR ChL، ALLH KSI KhWD PSND AWR FKhR JTANE WALE ShKhS KW PSND NHIN KRTA
31.19: APNI ChAL MIN AعTDAL AKhTIAR KR، AWR APNI AaWAZ ZRA PST RKH، SB AaWAZWN SE ZIADH BURI AaWAZ GDHWN KI AaWAZ HWTI HE
31.20: KIA TM LWG NHIN DIKHTE KH ALLH NE ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN KI SARI ChIZIN TMHARE LIE MSKhR KR RKHI HIN AWR APNI KHLI AWR ChHPI NعMTIN TM PR TMAM KR DI HIN? AIS PR HAL IH HE KH ANSANWN MIN SE KChH LWG HIN JW ALLH KE BARE MIN JHGRTE HIN BGhIR AS KE KH AN KE PAS KWEI عILM HW، IA HDAIT، IA KWEI RWShNI DKHANE WALI KTAB
31.21: AWR JB AN SE KHA JATA HE KH PIRWI KRW AUS ChIZ KI JW ALLH NE NAZL KI HE TW KHTE HIN KH HM TW AUS ChIZ KI PIRWI KRIN GE JS PR HM NE APNE BAP DADA KW PAIA HE KIA IH ANHI KI PIRWI KRIN GE KhWAH ShITAN AUN KW BHRKTI HWEI AaG HI KI TRF KIWN NH BLATA RHA HW?
31.22: JW ShKhS APNE AaP KW ALLH KE HWALH KR DE AWR عMLAAn WH NIK HW، AS NE FI ALWAQع AIK BHRWSE KE QABL SHARA THAM LIA، AWR SARE MعAMLAT KA AaKhRI FISLH ALLH HI KE HATH HE
31.23: AB JW KFR KRTA HE AS KA KFR TMHIN GhM MIN MBTLA NH KRE، ANHIN PLT KR AaNA TW HMARI HI TRF HE، PHR HM ANHIN BTA DIN GE KH WH KIA KChH KR KE AaEE HIN IQINAAn ALLH SINWN KE ChHPE HWEE RAZ TK JANTA HE
31.24: HM THWRI MDT ANHIN DUNIA MIN MZE KRNE KA MWQع DE RHE HIN، PHR AN KW BE BS KR KE AIK SKhT عZAB KI TRF KHINCh LE JAEIN GE
31.25: AGR TM AIN SE PWChHW KH ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN KW KS NE PIDA KIA HE، TW IH ZRWR KHIN GE KH ALLH NE KHW ALHMDLLH MGR AN MIN SE AKSR LWG JANTE NHIN HIN
31.26: AaSMANWN AWR ZMIN MIN JW KChH HE ALLH HI KA HE، BE ShK ALLH BE NIAZ AWR AaP SE AaP MHMWD HE
31.27: ZMIN MIN JTNE DRKhT HIN AGR WH SB KE SB QLM BN JAEIN AWR SMNDR (DWAT BN JAEE) JSE SAT MZID SMNDR RWShNAEI MHIA KRIN TB BHI ALLH KI BATIN (LKHNE SE) KhTM NH HWN GI BE ShK ALLH ZBRDST AWR HKIM HE
31.28: TM SARE ANSANWN KW PIDA KRNA AWR PHR DWBARH JILA AUTHANA TW (AUS KE LIE) BS AISA HE JISE AIK MTNFS KW (PIDA KRNA AWR JILA ATHANA) HQIQT IH HE KH ALLH SB KChH SUNNE AWR DIKHNE WALA HE
31.29: KIA TM DIKHTE NHIN HW KH ALLH RAT KW DN MIN PRWTA HWA LE AaTA HE AWR DN KW RAT MIN? AUS NE SUWRJ AWR ChAND KW MSKhR KR RKHA HE، SB AIK WQT MQRR TK ChLE JA RHE HIN، AWR (KIA TM NHIN JANTE) KH JW KChH BHI TM KRTE HW ALLH AUS SE BAKhBR HE
31.30: IH SB KChH AS WJH SE HE KH ALLH HI HQ HE AWR ASE ChHWR KR JN DUWSRI ChIZWN KW IH LWG PKARTE HIN WH SB BATL HIN، AWR (AS WJH SE KH) ALLH HI BZRG W BRTR HE
31.31: KIA TM DIKHTE NHIN HW KH KShTI SMNDR MIN ALLH KE FZL SE ChLTI HE TAKH WH TMHIN APNI KChH NShANIAN DKHAEE? DR HQIQT AS MIN BHT SI NShANIAN HIN HR AUS ShKhS KE LIE JW SBR AWR ShKR KRNE WALA HW
31.32: AWR JB (SMNDR MIN) AIN LWGWN PR AIK MWJ SAEBANWN KI TRH ChHA JATI HE TW IH ALLH KW PKARTE HIN APNE DIN KW BALKL ASI KE LIE KhALS KR KE، PHR JB WH BChA KR ANHIN KhShKI TK PHNChA DITA HE TW AN MIN SE KWEI AQTSAD BRTTA HE، AWR HMARI NShANIWN KA ANKAR NHIN KRTA MGR HR WH ShKhS JW GhDّAR AWR NAShKRA HE
31.33: LWGW، BChW APNE RB KE GhZB SE AWR DRW AUS DN SE JBKH KWEI BAP APNE BITE KI TRF SE BDLH NH DE GA AWR NH KWEI BITA HI APNE BAP KI TRF SE KChH BDLH DINE WALA HWGA FI ALWAQع ALLH KA WعDH SChA HE PS IH DNIA KI ZNDGI TMHIN DHWKE MIN NH DALE AWR NH DHWKH BAZ TM KW ALLH KE MعAMLE MIN DHWKA DINE PAEE
31.34: AUS GHRI KA عLM ALLH HI KE PAS HE، WHI BARSh BRSATA HE، WHI JANTA HE KH MAؤN KE PITWN MIN KIA PRWRSh PA RHA HE، KWEI MTNFS NHIN JANTA KH KL WH KIA KMAEI KRNE WALA HE AWR NH KSI ShKhS KW IH KhBR HE KH KS SRZMIN MIN AS KI MWT AaNI HE، ALLH HI SB KChH JANNE WALA AWR BAKhBR HE

32.2: AIS KTAB KI TNZIL BLA ShBH RB ALعALMIN KI TRF SE HE
32.3: KIA IH LWG KHTE HIN KH AS ShKhS NE AISE KhWD GHR LIA HE? NHIN، BLKH IH HQ HE TIRE RB KI TRF SE TAKH TW MTNBH KRE AIK AISI QWM KW JS KE PAS TJH SE PHLE KWEI MTNBH KRNE WALA NHIN AaIA، ShAID KH WH HDAIT PA JAEIN
32.4: WH ALLH HI HE JS NE AaSMANWN AWR ZMIN KW AWR AUN SARI ChIZWN KW JW AN KE DRMIAN HIN ChH DNWN MIN PIDA KIA AWR AS KE BعD عRSh PR JLWH FRMA HWA، AUS KE SWA NH TMHARA KWEI HAMI W MDD GAR HE AWR NH KWEI AUS KE AaGE SFARSh KRNE WALA، PHR KIA TM HWSh MIN NH Aaؤ GE?
32.5: WH AaSMAN SE ZMIN TK DUNIA KE MعAMLAT KI TDBIR KRTA HE AWR AS TDBIR KI RWDAD AUWPR AUS KE HZWR JATI HE AIK AISE DN MIN JS KI MQDAR TMHARE ShMAR SE AIK HZAR SAL HE
32.6: WHI HE HR PWShIDH AWR ZAHR KA JANNE WALA، ZBRDST، AWR RHIM
32.7: JW ChIZ BHI AS NE BNAEI KhWB HI BNAEI AU S NE ANSAN KI TKhLIQ KI ABTDA GARE SE KI
32.8: PHR AUS KI NSL AIK AISE ST SE ChLAEI JW HQIR PANI KI TRH KA HE
32.9: PHR AS KW NIK SUK SE DRST KIA AWR AS KE ANDR APNI RWH PHWNK DI، AWR TM KW KAN DIE، AaNKHIN DIN AWR DIL DIE TM LWG KM HI ShKR GZAR HWTE HW
32.10: AWR IH LWG KHTE HIN: "JB HM MTI MIN RAL MIL ChKE HWN GE TW KIA HM PHR NEE SRE SE PIDA KIE JAEIN GE?" ASL BAT IH HE KH IH APNE RB KI MLAQAT KE MNKR HIN
32.11: AIN SE KHW "MWT KA WH FRShTH JW TM PR MQRR KIA GIA HE TM KW PWRA KA PWRA APNE QBZE MIN LE LE GA AWR PHR TM APNE RB KI TRF PLTA LAEE JAؤ GE"
32.12: KASh TM DIKHW WH WQT JB IH MJRM SR JHKAEE APNE RB KE HZWR KHRE HWN GE (AUS WQT IH KHH RHE HWN GE) "AE HMARE RB، HM NE KhWB DIKH LIA AWR SUN LIA AB HMIN WAPS BHIJ DE TAKH HM NIK عML KRIN، HMIN AB IQIN AaGIA HE"
32.13: (JWAB MIN ARShAD HW GA) "AGR HM ChAHTE TW PHLE HI HR NFS KW AS KI HDAIT DE DITE MGR MIRI WH BAT PUWRI HW GEI JW MIN NE KHI THI KH MIN JHNّM KW JNWN AWR ANSANWN SB SE BHR DWN GA
32.14: PS AB ChKHW MZA APNI AIS HRKT KA KH TM NE AS DN KI MLAQAT KW FRAMWSh KR DIA، HM NE BHI AB TMHIN FRAMWSh KR DIA HE ChKHW HMIShGI KE عZAB KA MZA APNE KRTWTWN KI PADASh MIN"
32.15: HMARI AaIAT PR TW WH LWG AIMAN LATE HIN JNHIN IH AaIAT SNA KR JB NSIHT KI JATI HE TW SJDE MIN GR PRTE HIN AWR APNE RB KI HMD KE SATH AS KI TSBIH KRTE HIN AWR TKBR NHIN KRTE
32.16: AUN KI PITHIN BSTRWN SE ALG RHTI HIN، APNE RB KW KhWF AWR TMع KE SATH PKARTE HIN، AWR JW KChH RZQ HM NE AUNHIN DIA HE AS MIN SE KhRCh KRTE HIN
32.17: PHR JISA KChH AaNKHWN KI THNDK KA SAMAN AN KE AعMAL KI JZA MIN AN KE LIE ChHPA RKHA GIA HE AS KI KSI MTNFS KW KhBR NHIN HE
32.18: BHLA KHIN IH HW SKTA HE KH JW ShKhS MWMN HW WH AUS ShKhS KI TRH HW JAEE JW FASQ HW? IH DWNWN BRABR NHIN HW SKTE
32.19: JW LWG AIMAN LAEE HIN AWR JNHWN NE NIK عML KIE HIN AUN KE LIE TW JNTWN KI QIAM GAHIN HIN، ZIAFT KE TWR PR AUN KE AعMAL KE BDLE MIN
32.20: AWR JNHWN NE FSQ AKhTIAR KIA HE AUN KA THKANA DWZKh HE JB KBHI WH AS SE NKLNA ChAHIN GE ASI MIN DHKIL DIE JAEIN GE AWR AN SE KHA JAEE GA KH ChKHW AB AUSI AaG KE عZAB KA MZA JS KW TM JHTLAIA KRTE THE
32.21: AUS BRE عZAB SE PHLE HM AISI DNIA MIN (KSI NH KSI ChHWTE) عZAB KA MZA AINHIN ChKHATE RHIN GE، ShAID KH IH (APNI BAGhIANH RWSh SE) BAZ Aa JAEIN
32.22: AWR AUS SE BRA ZALM KWN HW GA JSE AS KE RB KI AaIAT KE ZRIعH SE NSIHT KI JAEE AWR PHR WH AN SE MNH PHIR LE AISE MJRMWN SE TW HM ANTQAM LE KR RHIN GE
32.23: AIS SE PHLE HM MWSIAؑ KW KTAB DE ChKE HIN، LHAZA AUSI ChIZ KE MLNE PR TMHIN KWEI ShK NH HWNA ChAHIE AUS KTAB KW HM NE BNI ASRAEIL KE LIE HDAIT BNAIA THA
32.24: AWR JB ANHWN NE SBR KIA AWR HMARI AaIAT PR IQIN LATE RHE TW AN KE ANDR HM NE AISE PIShWA PIDA KIE JW HMARE HKM SE RHNMAEI KRTE THE
32.25: IQINAAn TIRA RB HI QIAMT KE RWZ AUN BATWN KA FISLH KRE GA JN MIN (BNI ASRAEIL) BAHM AKhTLAF KRTE RHE HIN
32.26: AWR KIA AIN LWGWN KW (AIN TARIKhI WAQعAT MIN) KWEI HDAIT NHIN MLI KH AN SE PHLE KTNI QWMWN KW HM HLAK KR ChKE HIN JN KE RHNE KI JGHWN MIN AaJ IH ChLTE PHRTE HIN? AS MIN BRI NShANIAN HIN، KIA IH SNTE NHIN HIN?
32.27: AWR KIA AIN LWGWN NE IH MNZR KBHI NHIN DIKHA KH HM AIK BE AaB W GIAH ZMIN KI TRF PANI BHA LATE HIN، AWR PHR ASI ZMIN SE WH FSL AUGATE HIN JS SE AN KE JANWRWN KW BHI ChARH MLTA HE AWR IH KhWD BHI KHATE HIN? TW KIA ANHIN KChH NHIN SWJHTA?
32.28: IH LWG KHTE HIN KH "IH FISLH KB HW GA AGR TM SChE HW?"
32.29: AN SE KHW "FISLE KE DN AIMAN LANA AUN LWGWN KE LIE KChH BHI NAFع NH HW GA JNHWN NE KFR KIA HE AWR PHR AUN KW KWEI MHLT NH MLE GI"
32.30: AChHA، AINHIN AN KE HAL PR ChHWR DW AWR ANTZAR KRW، IH BHI MNTZR HIN

33.1: AE NBIؐ! ALLH SE DRW AWR KFAR W MNAFQIN KI ATAعT NH KRW، HQIQT MIN عLIM AWR HKIM TW ALLH HI HE
33.2: PIRWI KRW AUS BAT KI JS KA AShARH TMHARE RB KI TRF SE TMHIN KIA JA RHA HE، ALLH HR AUS BAT SE BAKhBR HE JW TM LWG KRTE HW
33.3: ALLH PR TWKL KRW، ALLH HI WKIL HWNE KE LIE KAFI HE
33.4: ALLH NE KSI ShKhS KE DHR MIN DW DIL NHIN RKHE HIN، NH AS NE TM LWGWN KI AUN BIWIWN KW JN SE TM ZHAR KRTE HW TMHARI MAN BNA DIA HE، AWR NH AS NE TMHARE MNH BWLE BITWN KW TMHARA HQIQI BITA BNAIA HE IH TW WH BATIN HIN JW TM LWG APNE MNH SE NKAL DITE HW، MGR ALLH WH BAT KHTA HE JW MBNI BR HQIQT HE، AWR WHI SHIH TRIQE KI TRF RHNMAEI KRTA HE
33.5: MNH BWLE BITWN KW AN KE BAPWN KI NSBT SE PKARW، IH ALLH KE NZDIK ZIADH MNSFANH BAT HE AWR AGR TMHIN MعLWM NH HW KH AN KE BAP KWN HIN TW WH TMHARE DINI BHAEI AWR RFIQ HIN NA DANSTH JW BAT TM KHW AS KE LIE TM PR KWEI GRFT NHIN HE، LIKN AUS BAT PR ZRWR GRFT HE JS KA TM DL SE ARADH KRW ALLH DRGZR KRNE WALA AWR RHIM HE
33.6: BLAShBH NBI TW AHL AIMAN KE LIE AUN KI APNI ZAT PR MQDM HE، AWR NBI KI BIWIAN AUN KI MAEIN HIN، MGR KTAB ALLH KI RW SE عAM MWMNIN W MHAJRIN KI BH NSBT RShTH DAR AIK DWSRE KE ZIADH HQDAR HIN، ALBTH APNE RFIQWN KE SATH TM KWEI BHLAEI (KRNA ChAHW TW) KR SKTE HW IH HKM KTAB ALAHI MIN LKHA HWA HE
33.7: AWR (AE NBIؐ) IAD RKHW AUS عHD W PIMAN KW JW HM NE SB PIGhMBRWN SE LIA HE، TM SE BHI AWR NWHؑ AWR ABRAHIMؑ AWR MWSIAؑ AWR عISIAؑ ABN MRIM SE BHI SB SE HM PKhTH عHD LE ChKE HIN
33.8: TAKH SChE LWGWN SE (AN KA RB) AN KI SChAEI KE BARE MIN SWAL KRE، AWR KAFRWN KE LIE TW AS NE DRD NAK عZAB MHIA KR HI RKHA HE
33.9: AE LWGW، JW AIMAN LAEE HW، IAD KRW ALLH KE AHSAN KW JW (ABHI ABHI) AUS NE TM PR KIA HE JB LShKR TM PR ChRH AaEE TW HM NE AUN PR AIK SKhT AaNDHI BHIJ DI AWR AISI FWJIN RWANH KIN JW TM KW NZR NH AaTI THIN ALLH WH SB KChH DIKH RHA THA JW TM LWG AS WQT KR RHE THE
33.10: JB WH AUWPR SE AWR NIChE SE TM PR ChRH AaEE JB KhWF KE MARE AaNKHIN PTHRA GEIN، KLIJE MNH KW Aa GEE، AWR TM LWG ALLH KE BARE MIN TRH TRH KE GMAN KRNE LGE
33.11: AUS WQT AIMAN LANE WALE KhWB AaZMAEE GEE AWR BURI TRH HLA MARE GEE
33.12: IAD KRW WH WQT JB MNAFQIN AWR WH SB LWG JN KE DLWN MIN RWG THA SAF SAF KHH RHE THE KH ALLH AWR AUS KE RSWLؐ NE JW WعDE HM SE KIE THE WH FRIB KE SWA KChH NH THE
33.13: JB AUN MIN SE AIK GRWH NE KHA KH "AE ISRB KE LWGW، TMHARE LIE AB THIRNE KA KWEI MWQع NHIN HE، PLT ChLW" JB AN KA AIK FRIQ IH KHH KR NBIؐ SE RKhST TLB KR RHA THA KH "HMARE GHR KhTRE MIN HIN،" HALANKH WH KhTRE MIN NH THE، DRASL WH (MHAZ JNG SE) BHAGNA ChAHTE THE
33.14: AGR ShHR KE ATRAF SE DShMN GHS AaEE HWTE AWR AUS WQT ANHIN FTNE KI TRF DعWT DI JATI TW IH AS MIN JA PRTE AWR MShKL HI SE ANHIN ShRIK FTNH HWNE MIN KWEI TAML HWTA
33.15: AN LWGWN NE AS SE PHLE ALLH SE عHD KIA THA KH IH PITH NH PHIRIN GE، AWR ALLH SE KIE HWEE عHD KI BAZ PRS TW HWNI HI THI
33.16: AE NBIؐ! AN SE KHW، AGR TM MWT IA QTL SE BHAGW TW IH BHAGNA TMHARE LIE KChH BHI NFع BKhSh NH HW GA AS KE BعD ZNDGI KE MZE LWTNE KA THWRA HI MWQع TMHIN ML SKE GA
33.17: AIN SE KHW، KWN HE JW TMHIN ALLH SE BChA SKTA HW AGR WH TMHIN NQSAN PHNChANA ChAHE? AWR KWN AS KI RHMT KW RWK SKTA HE AGR WH TM PR MHRBANI KRNA ChAHE? ALLH KE MQABLE MIN TW IH LWG KWEI HAMI W MDD GAR NHIN PA SKTE HIN
33.18: ALLH TM MIN SE AUN LWGWN KW KhWB JANTA HE JW (JNG KE KAM MIN) RKAWTIN DALNE WALE HIN، JW APNE BHAEIWN SE KHTE HIN KH "Aaؤ HMARI TRF" JW LRAEI MIN HSH LITE BHI HIN TW BS NAM GNANE KW
33.19: JW TMHARA SATH DINE MIN SKhT BKhIL HIN KhTRE KA WQT Aa JAEE TW AS TRH DIDE PHRA PHRA KR TMHARI TRF DIKHTE HIN JISE KSI MRNE WALE PR GhShI TARI HW RHI HW، MGR JB KhTRH GZR JATA HE TW IHI LWG FAEDWN KE HRIS BN KR QINChI KI TRH ChLTI HWEI ZBANIN LIE TMHARE ASTQBAL KW Aa JATE HIN IH LWG HRGZ AIMAN NHIN LAEE، ASI LIE ALLH NE AN KE SARE AعMAL ZAEع KR DIE AWR AISA KRNA ALLH KE LIE BHT AaSAN HE
33.20: IH SMJH RHE HIN KH HMLH AaWR GRWH ABHI GEE NHIN HIN AWR AGR WH PHR HMLH AaWR HW JAEIN TW AN KA JI ChAHTA HE KH AUS MWQع PR IH KHIN SHRA MIN BDWؤN KE DRMIAN JA BITHIN AWR WHIN SE TMHARE HALAT PWChHTE RHIN TAHM AGR IH TMHARE DRMIAN RHE BHI TW LRAEI MIN KM HI HSH LIN GE
33.21: DR HQIQT TM LWGWN KE LIE ALLH KE RSWLؐ MIN AIK BHTRIN NMWNH THA، HR AUS ShKhS KE LIE JW ALLH AWR IWM AaKhR KA AMIDWAR HW AWR KSRT SE ALLH KW IAD KRE
33.22: AWR SChE MWMNWN (KA HAL AUS WQT IH THA KH) JB ANHWN NE HMLH AaWR LShKRWN KW DIKHA TW PKAR ATHE KH "IH WHI ChIZ HE JS KA ALLH AWR AS KE RSWL NE HM SE WعDH KIA THA، ALLH AWR AUS KE RSWLؐ KI BAT BALKL SChّI THI" AIS WAQعH NE AUN KE AIMAN AWR AN KI SPRDGI KW AWR ZIADH BRHA DIA
33.23: AIMAN LANE WALWN MIN AISE LWG MWJWD HIN JNHWN NE ALLH SE KIE HWEE عHD KW SChA KR DKHAIA HE AN MIN SE KWEI APNI NZR PWRI KR ChKA AWR KWEI WQT AaNE KA MNTZR HE ANHWN NE APNE RWIE MIN KWEI TBDILI NHIN KI
33.24: (IH SB KChH AS LIE HWA) TAKH ALLH SChWN KW AUN KI SChAEI KI JZA DE AWR MNAFQWN KW ChAHE TW SZA DE AWR ChAHE TW AN KI TWBH QBWL KR LE، BE ShK ALLH GhFWR W RHIM HE
33.25: ALLH NE KFAR KA MNH PHIR DIA، WH KWEI FAEDH HASL KIE BGhIR APNE DL KI JLN LIE IWNHI PLT GEE، AWR MWMNIN KI TRF SE ALLH HI LRNE KE LIE KAFI HW GIA، ALLH BRI QWT WALA AWR ZBRDST HE
33.26: PHR AHL KTAB MIN SE JN LWGWN NE AN HMLH AaWRWN KA SATH DIA THA، ALLH AN KI GRHIWN SE ANHIN ATAR LAIA AWR AUN KE DLWN MIN AUS NE AISA RUعB DAL DIA KH AaJ AN MIN SE AIK GRWH KW TM QTL KR RHE HW AWR DWSRE GRWH KW QID KR RHE HW
33.27: AS NE TM KW AN KI ZMIN AWR AN KE GHRWN AWR AN KE AMWAL KA WARS BNA DIA AWR WH عLAQH TMHIN DIA JSE TM NE KBHI PAMAL NH KIA THA ALLH HR ChIZ PR QADR HE
33.28: AE NBIؐ، APNI BIWIWN SE KHW، AGR TM DNIA AWR AS KI ZINT ChAHTI HW TW Aaؤ، MIN TMHIN KChH DE DLA KR BHLE TRIQE SE RKhST KR DWN
33.29: AWR AGR TM ALLH AWR AS KE RSWLؐ AWR DAR AaKhRT KI TALB HW TW JAN LW KH TM MIN SE JW NIKW KAR HIN ALLH NE AN KE LIE BRA AJR MHIA KR RKHA HE
33.30: NBIؐ KI BIWIW، TM MIN SE JW KSI SRIH FHSh HRKT KA ARTKAB KRE GI ASE DWHRA عZAB DIA JAEE GA، ALLH KE LIE IH BHT AaSAN KAM HE

38.18: HM NE PHARWN KW AS KE SATH MSKhR KR RKHA THA KH SBH W ShAM WH AS KE SATH TSBIH KRTE THE

38.24: DAؤDؑ NE JWAB DIA: "AIS ShKhS NE APNI DNBIWN KE SATH TIRI DNBI MLA LINE KA MTALBH KR KE IQINAAn TJH PR ZLM KIA، AWR WAQعH IH HE KH ML JL KR SATH RHNE WALE LWG AKSR AIK DWSRE PR ZIADTIAN KRTE RHTE HIN، BS WHI LWG AS SE BChE HWEE HIN JW AIMAN RKHTE AWR عML SALH KRTE HIN، AWR AISE LWG KM HI HIN" (IH BAT KHTE KHTE) DAؤDؑ SMJH GIA KH IH TW HM NE DRASL AS KI AaZMAESh KI HE، ChNANChH AS NE APNE RB SE MعAFI MANGI AWR SJDE MIN GR GIA AWR RJWع KR LIA

38.44: (AWR HM NE AS SE KHA) TNKWN KA AIK MTHA LE AWR AUS SE MAR DE، APNI QSM NH TWR HM NE AUSE SABR PAIA، BHTRIN BNDH، APNE RB KI TRF BHT RJWع KRNE WALA

38.62: AWR WH AaPS MIN KHIN GE "KIA BAT HE، HM AUN LWGWN KW KHIN NHIN DIKHTE JNHIN HM DNIA MIN BRA SMJHTE THE?

38.76: AUS NE JWAB DIA "MIN AUS SE BHTR HWN، AaP NE MJH KW AaG SE PIDA KIA HE AWR AS KW MTI SE"

39.1: AIS KTAB KA NZWL ALLH ZBRDST AWR DANA KI TRF SE HE
39.2: (AE MHMDؐ) IH KTAB HM NE TMHARI TRF BRHQ NAZL KI HE، LHAZA TM ALLH HI KI BNDGI KRW DIN KW AUSI KE LIE KhALS KRTE HWEE
39.3: KhBRDAR، DIN KhALS ALLH KA HQ HE RHE WH LWG JNHWN NE AUS KE SWA DWSRE SRPRST BNA RKHE HIN (AWR APNE AIS FعL KI TWJIH IH KRTE HIN KH) HM TW AUN KI عBADT SRF AS LIE KRTE HIN KH WH ALLH TK HMARI RSAEI KRA DIN، ALLH IQINAAn AUN KE DRMIAN AUN TMAM BATWN KA FISLH KR DE GA JN MIN WH AKhTLAF KR RHE HIN ALLH KSI AISE ShKhS KW HDAIT NHIN DITA JW JHWTA AWR MNKR HQ HW
39.4: AGR ALLH KSI KW BITA BNANA ChAHTA TW APNI MKhLWQ MIN SE JS KW ChAHTA BRGZIDH KR LITA، PAK HE WH AS SE (KH KWEI AUS KA BITA HW)، WH ALLH HE AKILA AWR SB PR GhALB
39.5: AS NE AaSMANWN AWR ZMIN KW BRHQ PIDA KIA HE WHI DN PR RAT AWR RAT PR DN KW LPITTA HE AUSI NE SWRJ AWR ChAND KW AS TRH MSKhR KR RKHA HE KH HR AIK AIK WQT MQRR TK ChLE JA RHA HE JAN RKHW، WH ZBRDST HE AWR DRGZR KRNE WALA HE
39.6: AUSI NE TM KW AIK JAN SE PIDA KIA، PHR WHI HE JS NE AUS JAN SE AS KA JWRA BNAIA AWR ASI NE TMHARE LIE MWIShIWN MIN SE AaTH NR W MADH PIDA KIE WH TMHARI MAؤN KE PITWN MIN TIN TIN TARIK PRDWN KE ANDR TMHIN AIK KE BعD AIK ShKL DITA ChLA JATA HE IHI ALLH (JS KE IH KAM HIN) TMHARA RB HE، BADShAHI ASI KI HE، KWEI MعBWD AS KE SWA NHIN HE، PHR TM KDHR SE PHRAEE JA RHE HW?
39.7: AGR TM KFR KRW TW ALLH TM SE BE NIAZ HE، LIKN WH APNE BNDWN KE LIE KFR KW PSND NHIN KRTA، AWR AGR TM ShKR KR W TW ASE WH TMHARE LIE PSND KRTA HE KWEI BWJH ATHANE WALA KSI DWSRE KA BWJH NH ATHAEE GA AaKhRKAR TM SB KW APNE RB KI TRF PLTNA HE، PHR WH TMHIN BTA DE GA KH TM KIA KRTE RHE HW، WH TW DLWN KA HAL TK JANTA HE
39.8: ANSAN PR JB KWEI AaFT AaTI HE TW WH APNE RB KI TRF RJWع KR KE AUSE PKARTA HE PHR JB AS KA RB ASE APNI NعMT SE NWAZ DITA HE TW WH AUS MSIBT KW BHWL JATA HE JS PR WH PHLE PKAR RHA THA AWR DWSRWN KW ALLH KA HMSR THIRATA HE TAKH AUS KI RAH SE GMRAH KRE (AE NBIؐ) AUS SE KHW KH THWRE DN APNE KFR SE LTF ATHA LE، IQINAAn TW DWZKh MIN JANE WALA HE
39.9: (KIA AIS ShKhS KI RWSh BHTR HE IA AUS ShKhS KI) JW MTIع FRMAN HE، RAT KI GHRIWN MIN KHRA RHTA AWR SJDE KRTA HE، AaKhRT SE DRTA AWR APNE RB KI RHMT SE AMID LGATA HE? AIN SE PWChHW، KIA JANNE WALE AWR NH JANNE WALE DWNWN KBHI IKSAN HW SKTE HIN? NSIHT TW عQL RKHNE WALE HI QBWL KRTE HIN
39.10: (AE NBIؐ) KHW KH AE MIRE BNDW JW AIMAN LAEE HW، APNE RB SE DRW JN LWGWN NE AIS DNIA MIN NIK RWIH AKhTIAR KIA HE AN KE LIE BHLAEI HE AWR KhDA KI ZMIN WSIع HE، SBR KRNE WALWN KW TW AN KA AJR BE HSAB DIA JAEE GA
39.11: (AE NBIؐ) AIN SE KHW، MJHE HKM DIA GIA HE KH DIN KW ALLH KE LIE KhALS KR KE AUS KI BNDGI KRWN
39.12: AWR MJHE HKM DIA GIA HE KH SB SE PHLE MIN KhWD MSLM BNWN
39.13: KHW، AGR MIN APNE RB KI NAFRMANI KRWN TW MJHE AIK BRE DN KE عZAB KA KhWF HE
39.14: KHH DW KH MIN TW APNE DIN KW ALLH KE LIE KhALS KR KE AUSI KI BNDGI KRWN GA
39.15: TM AUS KE SWA JS JS KI BNDGI KRNA ChAHW KRTE RHW KHW، ASL DIWALIE TW WHI HIN JNHWN NE QIAMT KE RWZ APNE AaP KW AWR APNE AHL W عIAL KW GHATE MIN DAL DIA KhWB SN RKHW، IHI KHLA DIWALH HE
39.16: AUN PR AaG KI ChHTRIAN AWPR SE BHI ChHAEI HWN GI AWR NIChE SE BHI IH WH ANJAM HE JS SE ALLH APNE BNDWN KW DRATA HE، PS AE MIRE BNDW، MIRE GhZB SE BChW
39.17: BKhLAF AS KE JN LWGWN NE TAGhWT KI BNDGI SE AJTNAB KIA AWR ALLH KI TRF RJWع KR LIA AUN KE LIE KhWShKhBRI HE PS (AE NBIؐ) BShART DE DW MIRE AUN BNDWN KW
39.18: JW BAT KW GhWR SE SNTE HIN AWR AS KE BHTRIN PHLW KI PIRWI KRTE HIN IH WH LWG HIN JN KW ALLH NE HDAIT BKhShI HE AWR IHI DANShMND HIN
39.19: (AE NBIؐ) AUS ShKhS KW KWN BChA SKTA HE JS PR عZAB KA FISLH ChSPAN HW ChKA HW? KIA TM AUSE BChA SKTE HW JW AaG MIN GR ChKA HW?
39.20: ALBTH JW LWG APNE RB SE DR KR RHE AUN KE LIE BLND عMARTIN HIN MNZL PR MNZL BNI HWEI، JN KE NIChE NHRIN BHH RHI HWN GI IH ALLH KA WعDH HE، ALLH KBHI APNE WعDE KI KhLAF WRZI NHIN KRTA
39.21: KIA TM NHIN DIKHTE KH ALLH NE AaSMAN SE PANI BRSAIA، PHR AS KW SWTWN AWR ChShMWN AWR DRIAؤN KI ShKL MIN ZMIN KE ANDR JARI KIA، PHR AS PANI KE ZRIعH SE WH TRH TRH KI KHITIAN NKALTA HE JN KI QSMIN MKhTLF HIN، PHR WH KHITIAN PK KR SWKH JATI HIN، PHR TM DIKHTE HW KH WH ZRD PR GEIN، PHR AaKhRKAR ALLH AUN KW BHS BNA DITA HE DR HQIQT AIS MIN AIK SBQ HE عQL RKHNE WALWN KE LIE
39.22: AB KIA WH ShKhS JS KA SINH ALLH NE ASLAM KE LIE KHWL DIA AWR WH APNE RB KI TRF SE AIK RWShNI PR ChL RHA HE (AUS ShKhS KI TRH HW SKTA HE JS NE AIN BATWN SE KWEI SBQ NH LIA?) TBAHI HE AUN LWGWN KE LIE JN KE DL ALLH KI NSIHT SE AWR ZIADH SKhT HW GEE WH KHLI GMRAHI MIN PRE HWEE HIN
39.23: ALLH NE BHTRIN KLAM ATARA HE، AIK AISI KTAB JS KE TMAM AJZAء HM RNG HIN AWR JS MIN BAR BAR MZAMIN DHRAEE GEE HIN AUSE SN KR AUN LWGWN KE RWNGTE KHRE HW JATE HIN JW APNE RB SE DRNE WALE HIN، AWR PHR AN KE JSM AWR AN KE DL NRM HW KR ALLH KE ZKR KI TRF RAGhB HW JATE HIN IH ALLH KI HDAIT HE JS SE WH RAH RAST PR LE AaTA HE JSE ChAHTA HE AWR JSE ALLH HI HDAIT NH DE AS KE LIE PHR KWEI HADI NHIN HE
39.24: AB AUS ShKhS KI BD HALI KA TM KIA ANDAZH KR SKTE HW JW QIAMT KE RWZ عZAB KI SKhT MAR APNE MNH PR LE GA? AISE ZALMWN SE TW KHH DIA JAEE GA KH AB ChKHW MZH AUS KMAEI KA JW TM KRTE RHE THE
39.25: AIN SE PHLE BHI BHT SE LWG ASI TRH JHTLA ChKE HIN AaKhR AUN PR عZAB AISE RKh SE AaIA JDHR AN KA KhIAL BHI NH JA SKTA THA
39.26: PHR ALLH NE AN KW DNIA HI KI ZNDGI MIN RSWAEI KA MZH ChKHAIA، AWR AaKhRT KA عZAB TW AS SE ShDID TR HE، KASh IH LWG JANTE
39.27: HM NE AIS QRAaN MIN LWGWN KW TRH TRH KI MSALIN DI HIN KH IH HWSh MIN AaEIN
39.28: AISA QRAaN JW عRBI ZBAN MIN HE، JS MIN KWEI TIRH NHIN HE، TAKH IH BRE ANJAM SE BChIN
39.29: ALLH AIK MSAL DITA HE AIK ShKhS TW WH HE JS KI MLKIT MIN BHT SE KJ KhLQ AaQA ShRIK HIN JW ASE APNI APNI TRF KHINChTE HIN AWR DWSRA ShKhS PWRA KA PWRA AIK HI AaQA KA GhLAM HE KIA AN DWNWN KA HAL IKSAN HW SKTAHE? ALHMDLLH، MGR AKSR LWG NADANI MIN PRE HWEE HIN
39.30: (AE NBIؐ) TMHIN BHI MRNA HE AWR AIN LWGWN KW BHI MRNA HE
39.31: AaKhRKAR QIAMT KE RWZ TM SB APNE RB KE HZWR APNA APNA MQDMH PISh KRW GE
39.32: PHR AUS ShKhS SE BRA ZALM AWR KWN HW GA JS NE ALLH PR JHWT BANDHA AWR JB SChAEI AS KE SAMNE AaEI TW AUSE JHTLA DIA KIA AISE KAFRWN KE LIE JHNM MIN KWEI THKANA NHIN HE?
39.33: AWR JW ShKhS SChAEI LE KR AaIA AWR JNHWN NE AS KW SCh MANA، WHI عZAB SE BChNE WALE HIN
39.34: ANHIN APNE RB KE HAN WH SB KChH MLE GA JS KI WH KhWAHSh KRIN GE IH HE NIKI KRNE WALWN KI JZA
39.35: TAKH JW BD TRIN AعMAL ANHWN NE KIE THE ANHIN ALLH AN KE HSAB SE SAQT KR DE AWR JW BHTRIN AعMAL WH KRTE RHE AUN KE LHAZ SE AUN KW AJR عTA FRMAEE
39.36: (AE NBIؐ) KIA ALLH APNE BNDE KE LIE KAFI NHIN HE? IH LWG AUS KE SWA DWSRWN SE TM KW DRATE HIN HALANKH ALLH JSE GMRAHI MIN DAL DE AUSE KWEI RASTH DKHANE WALA NHIN
39.37: AWR JSE WH HDAIT DE AUSE BHTKANE WALA BHI KWEI NHIN، KIA ALLH ZBRDST AWR ANTQAM LINE WALA NHIN HE?
39.38: AIN LWGWN SE AGR TM PWChHW KH ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN KW KS NE PIDA KIA HE TW IH KhWD KHIN GE KH ALLH NE AIN SE KHW، JB HQIQT IH HE TW TMHARA KIA KhIAL HE KH AGR ALLH MJHE KWEI NQSAN PHNChANA ChAHE TW KIA TMHARI IH DIWIAN، JNHIN TM ALLH KW ChHWR KR PKARTE HW، MJHE AUS KE PHNChAEE HWEE NQSAN SE BChA LIN GI? IA ALLH MJH PR MHRBANI KRNA ChAHE TW KIA IH AS KI RHMT KW RWK SKIN GI? BS AN SE KHH DW KH MIRE LIE ALLH HI KAFI HE، BHRWSH KRNE WALE AUSI PR BHRWSH KRTE HIN
39.39: AN SE SAF KHW KH "AE MIRI QWM KE LWGW، TM APNI JGH APNA KAM KIE JAؤ، MIN APNA KAM KRTA RHWN GA، عNQRIB TMHIN MعLWM HW JAEE GA
39.40: KH KS PR RSWA KN عZAB AaTA HE AWR KSE WH SZA MLTI HE JW KBHI TLNE WALI NHIN"
39.41: (AE NBIؐ) HM NE SB ANSANWN KE LIE IH KTAB BRHQ TM PR NAZL KR DI HE AB JW SIDHA RASTH AKhTIAR KRE GA APNE LIE KRE GA AWR JW BHTKE GA AUS KE BHTKNE KA WBAL AUSI PR HWGA، TM AUN KE ZMH DAR NHIN HW
39.42: WH ALLH HI HE JW MWT KE WQT RWHIN QBZ KRTA HE AWR JW ABHI NHIN MRA HE AUS KI RWH NIND MIN QBZ KR LITA HE، PHR JS PR WH MWT KA FISLH NAFZ KRTA HE AUSE RWK LITA HE AWR DWSRWN KI RWHIN AIK WQT MQRR KE LIE WAPS BHIJ DITA HE AIS MIN BRI NShANIAN HIN AUN LWGWN KE LIE JW GhWR W FKR KRNE WALE HIN
39.43: KIA AUS KhDA KW ChHWR KR AIN LWGWN NE DWSRWN KW ShFIع BNA RKHA HE? AN SE KHW، KIA WH ShFAعT KRIN GE KhWAH AUN KE AKhTIAR MIN KChH NH HW AWR WH SMJHTE BHI NH HWN?
39.44: KHW، ShFAعT SARI KI SARI ALLH KE AKhTIAR MIN HE AaSMANWN AWR ZMIN KI BADShAHI KA WHI MALK HE PHR AUSI KI TRF TM PLTAEE JANE WALE HW
39.45: JB AKILE ALLH KA ZKR KIA JATA HE TW AaKhRT PR AIMAN NH RKHNE WALWN KE DL KRHNE LGTE HIN، AWR JB AUS KE SWA DWSRWN KA ZKR HWTA HE TW IKAIK WH KhWShI SE KHL ATHTE HIN
39.46: KHW، KhDAIA! AaSMANWN AWR ZMIN KE PIDA KRNE WALE، HAZR W GhAEB KE JANNE WALE، TW HI APNE BNDWN KE DRMIAN AUS ChIZ KA FISLH KRE GA JS MIN WH AKhTLAF KRTE RHE HIN
39.47: AGR AIN ZALMWN KE PAS ZMIN KI SARI DWLT BHI HW، AWR ATNI HI AWR BHI، TW IH RWZ QIAMT KE BRE عZAB SE BChNE KE LIE SB KChH FDIE MIN DINE KE LIE TIAR HW JAEIN GE WHAN ALLH KI TRF SE AN KE SAMNE WH KChH AaEE GA JS KA ANHWN NE KBHI ANDAZH HI NHIN KIA HE
39.48: WHAN APNI KMAEI KE SARE BRE NTAEJ AN PR KHL JAEIN GE AWR WHI ChIZ AN PR MSLT HW JAEE GI JS KA IH MZAQ ARATE RHE HIN
39.49: IHI ANSAN JB ZRA SI MSIBT AISE ChHW JATI HE TW HMIN PKARTA HE، AWR JB HM ASE APNI TRF SE NعMT DE KR APHAR DITE HIN TW KHTA HE KH IH TW MJHE عLM KI BNA PR DIA GIA HE! NHIN، BLKH IH AaZMAESh HE، MGR AN MIN SE AKSR LWG JANTE NHIN HIN
39.50: IHI BAT AN SE PHLE GZRE HWEE LWG BHI KHH ChKE HIN، MGR JW KChH WH KMATE THE WH AN KE KSI KAM NH AaIA
39.51: PHR APNI KMAEI KE BRE NTAEJ ANHWN NE BHGTE، AWR AIN LWGWN MIN SE BHI JW ZALM HIN WH عNQRIB APNI KMAEI KE BRE NTAEJ BHGTIN GE، IH HMIN عAJZ KR DINE WALE NHIN HIN
39.52: AWR KIA ANHIN MعLWM NHIN HE KH ALLH JS KA ChAHTA HE RZQ KShADH KR DITA HE AWR JS KA ChAHTA HE TNG KR DITA HE? AS MIN NShANIAN HIN AUN LWGWN KE LIE JW AIMAN LATE HIN
39.53: (AE NBIؐ) KHH DW KH AE MIRE BNDW، JNHWN NE APNI JANWN PR ZIADTI KI HE، ALLH KI RHMT SE MAIWS NH HW JAؤ، IQINAAn ALLH SARE GNAH MعAF KR DITA HE، WH TW GhFWR W RHIM HE
39.54: PLT Aaؤ APNE RB KI TRF AWR MTIع BN JAؤ AUS KE QBL AIS KE KH TM PR عZAB Aa JAEE AWR PHR KHIN SE TMHIN MDD NH ML SKE
39.55: AWR PIRWI AKhTIAR KR LW APNE RB KI BHIJI HWEI KTAB KE BHTRIN PHLW KI، QBL AIS KE KH TM PR AChANK عZAB AaEE AWR TM KW KhBR BHI NH HW
39.56: KHIN AISA NH HW KH BعD MIN KWEI ShKhS KHE "AFSWS MIRI AUS TQSIR PR JW MIN ALLH KI JNAB MIN KRTA RHA، BLKH MIN TW ALTA MZAQ ARANE WALWN MIN ShAML THA"
39.57: IA KHE "KASh ALLH NE MJHE HDAIT BKhShI HWTI TW MIN BHI MTQIWN MIN SE HWTA"
39.58: IA عZAB DIKH KR KHE "KASh MJHE AIK MWQع AWR ML JAEE AWR MIN BHI NIK عML KRNE WALWN MIN ShAML HW JAؤN"
39.59: (AWR AUS WQT ASE IH JWAB MLE KH) "KIWN NHIN، MIRI AaIAT TIRE PAS Aa ChKI THIN، PHR TW NE ANHIN JHTLAIA AWR TKBR KIA AWR TW KAFRWN MIN SE THA"
39.60: AaJ JN LWGWN NE KhDA PR JHWT BANDHE HIN QIAMT KE RWZ TM DIKHW GE KH AN KE MNH KALE HWN GE KIA JHNM MIN MTKBRWN KE LIE KAFI JGH NHIN HE?
39.61: AS KE BRعKS JN LWGWN NE IHAN TQWIA KIA HE AN KE ASBAB KAMIABI KI WJH SE ALLH AN KW NJAT DE GA، AN KW NH KWEI GZND PHNChE GA AWR NH WH GhMGIN HWN GE
39.62: ALLH HR ChIZ KA KhALQ HE AWR WHI HR ChIZ PR NGHBAN HE
39.63: ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN KE KhZANWN KI KNJIAN AUSI KE PAS HIN AWR JW LWG ALLH KI AaIAT SE KFR KRTE HIN WHI GHATE MIN RHNE WALE HIN
39.64: (AE NBIؐ) AIN SE KHW "PHR KIA AE JAHLW، TM ALLH KE SWA KSI AWR KI BNDGI KRNE KE LIE MJH SE KHTE HW?"
39.65: (IH BAT TMHIN AN SE SAF KHH DINI ChAHIE KIWNKH) TMHARI TRF AWR TM SE PHLE GZRE HWEE TMAM ANBIAء KI TRF IH WHI BHIJI JA ChKI HE KH AGR TM NE ShRK KIA TW TMHARA عML ZAEع HW JAEE GA AWR TM KhSARE MIN RHW GE
39.66: LHAZA (AE NBIؐ) TM BS ALLH HI KI BNDGI KRW AWR ShKR GZAR BNDWN MIN SE HW JAؤ
39.67: AIN LWGWN NE ALLH KI QDR HI NH KI JISA KH AS KI QDR KRNE KA HQ HE (AS KI QDRT KAMLH KA HAL TW IH HE KH) QIAMT KE RWZ PWRI ZMIN AUS KI MTHI MIN HW GI AWR AaSMAN AS KE DST RAST MIN LPTE HWEE HWN GE PAK AWR BALATR HE WH AS ShRK SE JW IH LWG KRTE HIN
39.68: AWR AUS RWZ SWR PHWNKA JAEE GA AWR WH SB MR KR GR JAEIN GE JW AaSMANWN AWR ZMIN MIN HIN SWAEE AUN KE JNHIN ALLH ZNDH RKHNA ChAHE PHR AIK DWSRA SWR PHWNKA JAEE GA AWR IKAIK SB KE SB ATH KR DIKHNE LGIN GE
39.69: ZMIN APNE RB KE NWR SE ChMK ATHE GI، KTAB AعMAL LA KR RKH DI JAEE GI، ANBIAء AWR TMAM GWAH HAZR KR DIE JAEIN GE، LWGWN KE DRMIAN THIK THIK HQ KE SATH FISLH KR DIA JAEE GA AWR AUN PR KWEI ZLM NH HWGA
39.70: AWR HR MTNFS KW JW KChH BHI AUS NE عML KIA THA AUS KA PWRA PWRA BDLH DE DIA JAEE GA LWG JW KChH BHI KRTE HIN ALLH AS KW KhWB JANTA HE
39.71: (AIS FISLH KE BعD) WH LWG JNHWN NE KFR KIA THA JHNM KI TRF GRWH DR GRWH HANKE JAEIN GE، IHAN TK KH JB WH WHAN PHNChIN GE TW AS KE DRWAZE KHWLE JAEIN GE AWR AUS KE KARNDE AN SE KHIN GE "KIA TMHARE PAS TMHARE APNE LWGWN MIN SE AISE RSWL NHIN AaEE THE، JNHWN NE TM KW TMHARE RB KI AaIAT SNAEI HWN AWR TMHIN AS BAT SE DRAIA HW KH AIK WQT TMHIN IH DN BHI DIKHNA HWGA?" WH JWAB DIN GE "HAN، AaEE THE، MGR عZAB KA FISLH KAFRWN PR ChPK GIA"
39.72: KHA JAEE GA، DAKhL HW JAؤ JHNM KE DRWAZWN MIN، IHAN AB TMHIN HMIShH RHNA HE، BRA HI BRA THKANA HE IH MTKBRWN KE LIE
39.73: AWR JW LWG APNE RB KI NAFRMANI SE PRHIZ KRTE THE ANHIN GRWH DR GRWH JNT KI TRF LE JAIA JAEE GA IHAN TK KH JB WH WHAN PHNChIN GE، AWR AS KE DRWAZE PHLE HI KHWLE JA ChKE HWN GE، TW AUS KE MNTZMIN AN SE KHIN GE KH "SLAM HW TM PR، BHT AChHE RHE، DAKhL HW JAؤ AS MIN HMIShH KE LIE"
39.74: AWR WH KHIN GE "ShKR HE AUS KhDA KA JS NE HMARE SATH APNA WعDH SCh KR DKHAIA AWR HM KW ZMIN KA WARS BNA DIA، AB HM JNT MIN JHAN ChAHIN APNI JGH BNA SKTE HIN" PS BHTRIN AJR HE عML KRNE WALWN KE LIE
39.75: AWR TM DIKHW GE KH FRShTE عRSh KE GRD HLQH BNAEE HWEE APNE RB KI HMD AWR TSBIH KR RHE HWN GE، AWR LWGWN KE DRMIAN THIK THIK HQ KE SATH FISLH ChKA DIA JAEE GA، AWR PKAR DIA JAEE GA KH HMD HE ALLH RBّ ALعALMIN KE LIE

40.2: AIS KTAB KA NZWL ALLH KI TRF SE HE JW ZBRDST HE، SB KChH JANNE WALA HE
40.3: GNAH MعAF KRNE WALA AWR TWBH QBWL KRNE WALA HE، SKhT SZA DINE WALA AWR BRA SAHB FZL HE KWEI MعBWD AS KE SWA NHIN، AUSI KI TRF SB KW PLTNA HE
40.4: ALLH KI AaIAT MIN JHGRE NHIN KRTE MGR SRF WH LWG JNHWN NE KFR KIA HE AIS KE BعD DNIA KE MLKWN MIN AUN KI ChLT PHRT TMHIN KSI DHWKE MIN NH DALE
40.5: AIN SE PHLE NWHؑ KI QWM BHI JHTLA ChKI HE، AWR AUS KE BعD BHT SE DWSRE JTHWN NE BHI IH KAM KIA HE HR QWM APNE RSWL PR JHPTI TAKH AUSE GRFTAR KRE AUN SB NE BATL KE HTHIARWN SE HQ KW NIChA DKHANE KI KWShSh KI MGR AaKhR KAR MIN NE AN KW PKR LIA، PHR DIKH LW KH MIRI SZA KISI SKhT THI
40.6: AISI TRH TIRE RB KA IH FISLH BHI AUN SB LWGWN PR ChSPAN HW ChKA HE JW KFR KE MRTKB HWEE HIN KH WH WASL BJHNM HWNE WALE HIN
40.7: عRSh ALAHI KE HAML FRShTE AWR WH JW عRSh KE GRD W PISh HAZR RHTE HIN، SB APNE RB KI HMD KE SATH AS KI TSBIH KR RHE HIN WH AS PR AIMAN RKHTE HIN AWR AIMAN LANE WALWN KE HQ MIN DعAEE MGhFRT KRTE HIN WH KHTE HIN: "AE HMARE RB، TW APNI RHMT AWR APNE عLM KE SATH HR ChIZ PR ChHAIA HWA HE، PS MعAF KR DE AWR عZAB DWZKh SE BChA LE AUN LWGWN KW JNHWN NE TWBH KI HE AWR TIRA RASTH AKhTIAR KR LIA HE
40.8: AE HMARE RB، AWR DAKhL KR AUN KW HMIShH RHNE WALI AUN JNTWN MIN JN KA TW NE AUN SE WعDH KIA HE، AWR AUN KE WALDIN AWR BIWIWN AWR AWLAD MIN SE JW SALH HWN (AUN KW BHI WHAN AUN KE SATH PHNChA DE) TW BLA ShBH QADR MTLQ AWR HKIM HE
40.9: AWR BChA DE AUN KW BRAEIWN SE JS KW TW NE QIAMT KE DN BRAEIWN SE BChA DIA AUS PR TW NE BRA RHM KIA، IHI BRI KAMIABI HE"
40.10: JN LWGWN NE KFR KIA HE، QIAMT KE RWZ AUN KW PKAR KR KHA JAEE GA "AaJ TMHIN JTNA ShDID GhSH APNE AWPR Aa RHA HE، ALLH TM PR AUS SE ZIADH GhZB NAK AUS WQT HWTA THA JB TMHIN AIMAN KI TRF BLAIA JATA THA AWR TM KFR KRTE THE"
40.11: WH KHIN GE "AE HMARE RB، TW NE WAQعI HMIN DW DFعH MWT AWR DW DFعH ZNDGI DE DI، AB HM APNE QSWRWN KA AعTRAF KRTE HIN، KIA AB IHAN SE NKLNE KI BHI KWEI SBIL HE?"
40.12: (JWAB MLE GA) "IH HALT JS MIN TM MBTLA HW، AIS WJH SE HE KH JB AKILE ALLH KI TRF BLAIA JATA THA TW TM MANNE SE ANKAR KR DITE THE AWR JB AUS KE SATH DWSRWN KW MLAIA JATA TW TM MAN LITE THE AB FISLH ALLH BZRG W BRTR KE HATH HE"
40.13: WHI HE JW TM KW APNI NShANIAN DKHATA HE AWR AaSMAN SE TMHARE LIE RZQ NAZL KRTA HE، MGR (AIN NShANIWN KE MShAHDE SE) SBQ SRF WHI ShKhS LITA HE JW ALLH KI TRF RJWع KRNE WALA HW
40.14: (PS AE RJWع KRNE WALW) ALLH HI KW PKARW APNE DIN KW AUS KE LIE KhALS KR KE، KhWAH TMHARA IH FعL KAFRWN KW KTNA HI NAGWAR HW
40.15: WH BLND DRJWN WALA، MALK عRSh HE APNE BNDWN MIN SE JS PR ChAHTA HE APNE HKM SE RWH NAZL KR DITA HE TAKH WH MLAQAT KE DN SE KhBRDAR KR DE
40.16: WH DN JBKH SB LWG BE PRDH HWN GE، ALLH SE AN KI KWEI BAT BHI ChHPI HWEI NH HW GI (AUS RWZ PKAR KR PWChHA JAEE GA) AaJ BADShAHI KS KI HE? (SARA عALM PKAR ATHE GA) ALLH WAHD QHAR KI
40.17: (KHA JAEE GA) AaJ HR MTNFS KW AUS KMAEI KA BDLH DIA JAEE GA JW AS NE KI THI AaJ KSI PR KWEI ZLM NH HW GA AWR ALLH HSAB LINE MIN BHT TIZ HE
40.18: AE NBIؐ، DRA DW AIN LWGWN KW AUS DN SE JW QRIB Aa LGA HE JB KLIJE MNH KW Aa RHE HWN GE AWR LWG ChP ChAP GhM KE GHWNT PIE KHRE HWNGE ZALMWN KA NH KWEI MShFQ DWST HW GA AWR NH KWEI ShFIع JS KI BAT MANI JAEE
40.19: ALLH NGAHWN KI ChWRI TK SE WAQF HE AWR WH RAZ TK JANTA HE JW SINWN NE ChHPA RKHE HIN
40.20: AWR ALLH THIK THIK BE LAG FISLH KRIGA RHE WH JN KW (IH MShRKIN) ALLH KW ChHWR KR PKARTE HIN، WH KSI ChIZ KA BHI FISLH KRNE WALE NHIN HIN BLAShBH ALLH HI SB KChH SNNE AWR DIKHNE WALA HE
40.21: KIA IH LWG KBHI ZMIN MIN ChLE PHRE NHIN HIN KH ANHIN AUN LWGWN KA ANJAM NZR AaTA JW AIN SE PHLE GZR ChKE HIN? WH AIN ZIADH TAQT WR THE AWR AN SE ZIADH ZBRDST AaSAR ZMIN MIN ChHWR GEE HIN MGR ALLH NE AN KE GNAHWN PR ANHIN PKR LIA AWR AUN KW ALLH SE BChANE WALA KWEI NH THA
40.22: IH AN KA ANJAM AS LIE HWA KH AN KE PAS AUN KE RSWL BINAT LE KR AaEE AWR ANHWN NE MANNE SE ANKAR KR DIA AaKhR KAR ALLH NE AN KW PKR LIA، IQINAAn WH BRI QWT WALA AWR SZA DINE MIN BHT SKhT HE
40.24: FRعWN AWR HAMAN AWR QARWN KI TRF APNE NShANIWN AWR NMAIAN SNDI MAMWRIT KE SATH BHIJA، MGR ANHWN NE KHA "SAHR HE، KZAB HE"
40.25: PHR JB WH HMARI TRF SE HQ AN KE SAMNE LE AaIA TW ANHWN NE KHA "JW LWG AIMAN LA KR AS KE SATH ShAML HWEE HIN AN SB KE LRKWN KW QTL KRW AWR LRKIAN KW JITA ChHWR DW" MGR KAFRWN KI ChAL AKART HI GEI
40.26: AIK RWZ FRعWN NE APNE DRBARIWN SE KHA "ChHWRW MJHE، MIN AIS MWSIAؑ KW QTL KIE DITA HWN، AWR PKAR DIKHE IH APNE RB KW MJHE ANDIShH HE KH IH TMHARA DIN BDL DALE GA، IA MLK MIN FSAD BRPA KRE GA"
40.27: MWSIAؑ NE KHA "MIN NE TW HR AUS MTKBR KE MQABLE MIN JW IAWM ALHSAB PR AIMAN NHIN RKHTA APNE R B AWR TMHARE RB KI PNAH LE LI HE"
40.28: AS MWQع PR AaL FRعWN MIN SE AIK MWMN ShKhS، JW APNA AIMAN ChHPAEE HWEE THA، BWL ATHA: "KIA TM AIK ShKhS KW SRF AIS BNA PR QTL KR DW GE KH WH KHTA HE MIRA RB ALLH HE? HALANKH WH TMHARE RB KI TRF SE TMHARE PAS BINAT LE AaIA AGR WH JHWTA HE TW AS KA JHWT KhWD ASI PR PLT PRE GA LIKN AGR WH SChA HE TW JN HWLNAK NTAEJ KA WH TM KW KhWF DLATA HE AN MIN SE KChH TW TM PR ZRWR HI Aa JAEIN GE ALLH KSI ShKhS KW HDAIT NHIN DITA JW HD SE GZR JANE WALA AWR KZAB HW
40.29: AE MIRI QWM KE LWGW! AaJ TMHIN BADShAHI HASL HE AWR ZMIN MIN TM GhALB HW، LIKN AGR KhDA KA عZAB HM PR Aa GIA TW PHR KWN HE JW HMARI MDD KR SKE GA" FRعWN NE KHA "MIN TW TM LWGWN KW WHI RAEE DE RHA HWN JW MJHE MNASB NZR AaTI HE AWR MIN AUSI RASTE KI TRF TMHARI RHNMAEI KRTA HWN JW THIK HE"
40.30: WH ShKhS JW AIMAN LAIA THA AUS NE KHA "AE MIRI QWM KE LWGW، MJHE KhWF HE KH KHIN TM PR BHI WH DN NH Aa JAEE JW AS SE PHLE BHT SE JTHWN PR Aa ChKA HE
40.31: JISA DN QWM NWHؑ AWR عAD AWR SMWD AWR AN KE BعD WALI QWMWN PR AaIA THA AWR IH HQIQT HE KH ALLH APNE BNDWN PR ZLM KA KWEI ARADH NHIN RKHTA
40.32: AE QWM، MJHE DR HE KH KHIN TM PR FRIAD W FGhAN KA DN NH Aa JAEE
40.33: JB TM AIK DWSRE KW PKARW GE AWR BHAGE BHAGE PHRW GE، MGR AUS WQT ALLH SE BChANE WALA KWEI NH HW GA SCh IH HE KH JSE ALLH BHTKA DE AUSE PHR KWEI RASTH DKHANE WALA NHIN HWTA
40.34: AS SE PHLE IWSFؑ TMHARE PAS BINAT LE KR AaEE THE MGR TM AUN KI LAEI HWEI TعLIM KI TRF SE ShK HI MIN PRE RHE PHR JB AUN KA ANTQAL HW GIA TW TM NE KHA AB AUN KE BعD ALLH KWEI RSWL HRGZ NH BHIJE GA" AISI TRH ALLH AUN SB LWGWN KW GMRAHI MIN DAL DITA HE JW HD SE GZRNE WALE AWR ShKI HWTE HIN
40.35: AWR ALLH KI AaIAT MIN JHGRE KRTE HIN BGhIR AS KE KH AN KE PAS KWEI SND IA DLIL AaEI HW IH RWIH ALLH AWR AIMAN LANE WALWN KE NZDIK SKhT MBGhWZ HE AISI TRH ALLH HR MTKR W JBAR KE DL PR THPH LGA DITA HE
40.36: FRعWN NE KHA "AE HAMAN، MIRE LIE AIK BLND عMART BNA TAKH MIN RASTWN TK PHNCh SKWN
40.37: AaSMANWN KE RASTWN TK، AWR MWSIAؑ KE KhDA KW JHANK KR DIKHWN MJHE TW IH MWSIAؑ JHWTA HI MعLWM HWTA HE" AS TRH FRعWN KE LIE AS KI BD عMLI KhWShNMA BNA DI GEI AWR WH RAH RAST SE RWK DIA GIA FRعWN KI SARI ChAL BAZI (AUS KI APNI) TBAHI KE RASTH HI MIN SRF HWEI
40.38: WH ShKhS JW AIMAN LAIA THA، BWLA "AE MIRI QWM KE LWGW، MIRI BAT MANW، MIN TMHIN SHIH RASTH BTATA HWN
40.39: AE QWM، IH DNIA KI ZNDGI TW ChND RWZH HE، HMIShH KE QIAM KI JGH AaKhRT HI HE
40.40: JW BRAEI KRE GA AUS KW ATNA HI BDLH MLE GA JTNI AUS NE BRAEI KI HW GI AWR JW NIK عML KRE GA، KhWAH WH MRD HW IA عWRT، BShRTIKH HW WH MWMN، AISE SB LWG JNT MIN DAKhL HWN GE JHAN AUN KW BE HSAB RZQ DIA JAEE GA
40.41: AE QWM، AaKhR IH KIA MAJRA HE KH MIN TW TM LWGWN KW NJAT KI TRF BLATA HWN AWR TM LWG MJHE AaG KI TRF DعWT DITE HW!
40.42: TM MJHE AS BAT KI DعWT DITE HW KH MIN ALLH SE KFR KRWN AWR AS KE SATH AUN HSTIWN KW ShRIK THIRAؤN JNHIN MIN NHIN JANTA، HALANKH MIN TMHIN AUS ZBRDST MGhFRT KRNE WALE KhDA KI TRF BLA RHA HWN
40.43: NHIN، HQ IH HE AWR AIS KE KhLAF NHIN HW SKTA KH JN KI TRF TM MJHE BLA RHE HW AUN KE LIE NH DNIA MIN KWEI DعWT HE NH AaKhRT MIN، AWR HM SB KW PLTNA ALLH HI KI TRF HE، AWR HD SE GZRNE WALE AaG MIN JANE WALE HIN
40.44: AaJ JW KChH MIN KHH RHA HWN، عNQRIB WH WQT AaEE GA JB TM AUSE IAD KRW GE AWR APNA MعAMLH MIN ALLH KE SPRD KRTA HWN، WH APNE BNDWN KA NGHBAN HE"
40.45: AaKhRKAR AUN LWGWN NE JW BRI SE BRI ChALIN AUS MWMN KE KhLAF ChLIN، ALLH NE AUN SB SE AUS KW BChA LIA، AWR FRعWN KE SATHI KhWD BDTRIN عZAB KE PHIR MIN Aa GEE
40.46: DWZKh KI AaG HE JS KE SAMNE SBH W ShAM WH PISh KIE JATE HIN، AWR JB QIAMT KI GHRI Aa JAEE GI TW HKM HW GA KH AaL FRعWN KW ShDID TR عZAB MIN DAKhL KRW
40.47: PHR ZRA KhIAL KRW AUS WQT KA JB IH LWG DWZKh MIN AIK DWSRE SE JHGR RHE HWN GE DNIA MIN JW LWG KMZWR THE WH BRE BNNE WALWN SE KHIN GE KH "HM TMHARE TABع THE، AB KIA IHAN TM NAR JHNM KI TKLIF KE KChH HSE SE HM KW BChA LW GE?"
40.48: WH BRE BNNE WALE JWAB DIN GE "HM SB IHAN AIK HAL MIN HIN، AWR ALLH BNDWN KE DRMIAN FISLH KR ChKA HE"
40.49: PHR IH DWZKh MIN PRE HWEE LWG JHNM KE AHL KARWN SE KHIN GE "APNE RB SE DعA KRW KH HMARE عZAB MIN BS AIK DN KI TKhFIF KR DE"
40.50: WH PWChHIN GE "KIA TMHARE PAS TMHARE RSWL BINAT LE KR NHIN AaTE RHE THE?" WH KHIN GE "HAN"JHNM KE AHL KAR BWLIN GE: "PHR TW TM HI DعA KRW، AWR KAFRWN KI DعA AKART HI JANE WALI HE"
40.51: IQIN JANW KH HM APNE RSWLWN AWR AIMAN LANE WALWN KI MDD AIS DNIA KI ZNDGI MIN BHI LAZMAAn KRTE HIN، AWR AUS RWZ BHI KRIN GE JB GWAH KHRE HWN GE،
40.52: JB ZALMWN KW AN KI MعZRT KChH BHI FAEDH NH DE GI AWR AUN PR LعNT PRE GI AWR BD TRIN THKANA AUN KE HSE MIN AaEE GA
40.53: AaKhR DIKH LW KH MWSIAؑ KI HM NE RHNMAEI KI AWR BNI ASRAEIL KW AS KTAB KA WARS BNA DIA
40.54: JW عQL W DANSh RKHNE WALWN KE LIE HDAIT W NSIHT THI
40.55: PS AE NBIؐ، SBR KRW، ALLH KA WعDH BR HQ HE، APNE QSWR KI MعAFI ChAHW AWR SBH W ShAM APNE RB KI HMD KE SATH AS KI TSBIH KRTE RHW
40.56: HQIQT IH HE KH JW LWG KSI SND W HJT KE BGhIR JW AUN KE PAS AaEI HW، ALLH KI AaIAT MIN JHGRE KR RHE HIN AUN KE DLWN MIN KBR BHRA HWA HE، MGR WH AUS BRAEI KW PHNChNE WALE NHIN HIN JS KA WH GHMND RKHTE HIN BS ALLH KI PNAH MANG LW، WH SB KChH DIKHTA AWR SNTA HE
40.57: AaSMANWN AWR ZMIN KA PIDA KRNA ANSANWN KW PIDA KRNE KI BH NSBT IQINAAn ZIADH BRA KAM HE، MGR AKSR LWG JANTE NHIN HIN
40.58: AWR IH NHIN HW SKTA KH ANDHA AWR BINA IKSAN HW JAEE AWR AIMANDAR W SALH AWR BD KAR BRABR THIRIN MGR TM LWG KM HI KChH SMJHTE HW
40.59: IQINAAn QIAMT KI GHRI AaNE WALI HE، AS KE AaNE MIN KWEI ShK NHIN، MGR AKSR LWG NHIN MANTE
40.60: TMHARA RB KHTA HE "MJHE PKARW، MIN TMHARI DعAEIN QBWL KRWN GA، JW LWG GHMND MIN Aa KR MIRI عBADT SE MNH MWRTE HIN، ZRWR WH ZLIL W KhWAR HW KR JHNM MIN DAKhL HWN GE"
40.61: WH ALLH HI TW HE JS NE TMHARE LIE RAT BNAEI TAKH AS MIN SKWN HASL KRW، AWR DN KW RWShN KIA HQIQT IH HE KH ALLH LWGWN PR BRA FZL FRMANE WALA HE MGR AKSR LWG ShKR ADA NHIN KRTE
40.62: WHI ALLH (JS NE TMHARE LIE IH KChH KIA HE) TMHARA RB HE HR ChIZ KA KhALQ AS KE SWA KWEI MعBWD NHIN PHR TM KDHR SE BHKAEE JA RHE HW?
40.63: AISI TRH WH SB LWG BHKAEE JATE RHE HIN JW ALLH KI AaIAT KA ANKAR KRTE THE
40.64: WH ALLH HI TW HE JS NE TMHARE LIE ZMIN KW JAEE QRAR BNAIA AWR AWPR AaSMAN KA GNBD BNA DIA JS NE TMHARI SWRT BNAEI AWR BRI HI عMDH BNAEI JS NE TMHIN PAKIZH ChIZWN KA RZQ DIA WHI ALLH (JS KE IH KAM HIN) TMHARA RB HE BE HSAB BRKTWN WALA HE WH KAENAT KA RB

42.19: ALLH APNE BNDWN PR BHT MHRBAN HE JSE JW KChH ChAHTA HE DITA HE، WH BRI QWT WALA AWR ZBRDST HE
42.20: JW KWEI AaKhRT KI KHITI ChAHTA HE AUS KI KHITI KW HM BRHATE HIN، AWR JW DNIA KI KHITI ChAHTA HE AUSE DNIA HI MIN SE DITE HIN MGR AaKhRT MIN AUS KA KWEI HSH NHIN HE
42.21: KIA IH LWG KChH AISE ShRIK KhDA RKHTE HIN JNHWN NE AIN KE LIE DIN KI NWعIT RKHNE WALA AIK AISA TRIQH MQRR KR DIA HE JS KA ALLH NE AIZN NHIN DIA? AGR FISLE KI BAT PHLE TE NH HW GEI HWTI TW AN KA QZIH ChKA DIA GIA HWTA IQINAAn AIN ZALMWN KE LIE DRD NAK عZAB HE
42.22: TM DIKHW GE KH IH ZALM AUS WQT APNE KIE KE ANJAM SE DR RHE HWN GE AWR WH AIN PR Aa KR RHE GA BKhLAF AIS KE JW LWG AIMAN LE AaEE HIN AWR JNHWN NE NIK عML KIE HIN WH JNT KE GLSTANWN MIN HWN GE، JW KChH BHI WH ChAHIN GE APNE RB KE HAN PAEIN GE، IHI BRA FZL HE
42.23: IH HE WH ChIZ JS KI KhWSh KhBRI ALLH APNE AUN BNDWN KW DITA HE JNHWN NE MAN LIA AWR NIK عML KIE AE NBIؐ، AIN LWGWN SE KHH DW KH MIN AIS KAM PR TM SE KSI AJR KA TALB NHIN HWN، ALBTH QRABT KI MHBT ZRWR ChAHTA HWN JW KWEI BHLAEI KMAEE GA HM AS KE LIE AS BHLAEI MIN KhWBI KA AZAFH KR DIN GE BE ShK ALLH BRA DR GZR KRNE WALA AWR QDR DAN HE
42.24: KIA IH LWG KHTE HIN KH AIS ShKhS NE ALLH PR JHWTA BHTAN GHR LIA HE? AGR ALLH ChAHE TW TMHARE DL PR MHR KR DE WH BATL KW MTA DITA HE AWR HQ KW APNE FRMANWN SE HQ KR DKHATA HE WH SINWN KE ChHPE HWEE RAZ JANTA HE

42.26: WH AIMAN LANE WALWN AWR NIK عML KRNE WALWN KI DعA QBWL KRTA HE AWR APNE FZL SE AN KW AWR ZIADH DITA HE RHE ANKAR KRNE WALE، TW AN KE LIE DRDNAK SZA HE

42.28: WHI HE JW LWGWN KE MAIWS HW JANE KE BعD MINH BRSATA HE AWR APNI RHMT PHILA DITA HE، AWR WHI QABL TعRIF WLI HE
42.29: AUS KI NShANIWN MIN SE HE IH ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN KI PIDAESh، AWR IH JANDAR MKhLWQAT JW AUS NE DWNWN JGH PHILA RKHI HIN WH JB ChAHE ANHIN AKTHA KR SKTA HE
42.30: TM PR JW MSIBT BHI AaEI HE، TMHARE APNE HATHWN KI KMAEI SE AaEI HE، AWR BHT SE QSWRWN SE WH WISE HI DR GZR KR JATA HE
42.31: TM ZMIN MIN APNE KhDA KW عAJZ KR DINE WALE NHIN HW، AWR ALLH KE MQABLE MIN TM KWEI HAMI W NASR NHIN RKHTE
42.32: AUS KI NShANIWN MIN SE HIN IH JHAZ JW SMNDR MIN PHARWN KI TRH NZR AaTE HIN
42.33: ALLH JB ChAHE HWA KW SAKN KR DE AWR IH SMNDR KI PITH PR KHRE KE KHRE RH JAEIN AIS MIN BRI NShANIAN HIN HR AUS ShKhS KE LIE JW KMAL DRJH SBR W ShKR KRNE WALA HW
42.34: IA (AUN PR SWAR HWNE WALWN KE) BHT SE GNAHWN SE DR GZR KRTE HWEE AN KE ChND HI KRTWTWN KI PADASh MIN ANHIN DBW DE
42.35: AWR AUS WQT HMARI AaIAT MIN JHGRE KRNE WALWN KW PTH ChL JAEE KH AN KE LIE KWEI JAEE PNAH NHIN HE
42.36: JW KChH BHI TM LWGWN KW DIA GIA HE WH MHZ DNIA KI ChND RWZH ZNDGI KA SR W SAMAN HE، AWR JW KChH ALLH KE HAN HE WH BHTR BHI HE AWR PAEDAR BHI WH AUN LWGWN KE LIE HE JW AIMAN LAEE HIN AWR APNE RB PR BHRWSH KRTE HIN

42.38: JW APNE RB KA HKM MANTE HIN، NMAZ QAEM KRTE HIN، APNE MعAMLAT AaPS KE MShWRE SE ChLATE HIN، HM NE JW KChH BHI RZQ ANHIN DIA HE AUS MIN SE KhRCh KRTE HIN

42.40: BRAEI KA BDLH WISI HI BRAEI HE، PHR JW KWEI MعAF KR DE AWR ASLAH KRE AUS KA AJR ALLH KE ZMH HE، ALLH ZALMWN KW PSND NHIN KRTA

42.43: ALBTH JW ShKhS SBR SE KAM LE AWR DRGZR KRE، TW IH BRI AWLWALعZMI KE KAMWN MIN SE HE
42.44: JS KW ALLH HI GMRAHI MIN PHINK DE AUS KA KWEI SNBHALNE WALA ALLH KE BعD NHIN HE TM DIKHW GE KH IH ZALM JB عZAB DIKHIN GE TW KHIN GE AB PLTNE KI BHI KWEI SBIL HE?
42.45: AWR TM DIKHW GE KH IH JHNM KE SAMNE JB LAEE JAEIN GE TW ZLT KE MARE JHKE JA RHE HWN GE AWR AUS KW NZR BChA BChA KR KN AaNKHIWN SE DIKHIN GE AUS WQT WH LWG JW AIMAN LAEE THE KHIN GE KH WAQعI ASL ZIAN KAR WHI HIN JNHWN NE AaJ QIAMT KE DN APNE AaP KW AWR APNE MTعLQIN KW KhSARE MIN DAL DIA KhBRDAR RHW، ZALM LWG MSTQL عZAB MIN HWN GE
42.46: AWR AN KE KWEI HAMI W SRPRST NH HWN GE JW ALLH KE MQABLE MIN AN KI MDD KW AaEIN JSE ALLH GMRAHI MIN PHINK DE AS KE LIE BChAؤ KI KWEI SBIL NHIN
42.47: MAN LW APNE RB KI BAT QBL AS KE KH WH DN AaEE JS KE TLNE KI KWEI SWRT ALLH KI TRF SE NHIN HE AUS DN TMHARE LIE KWEI JAEE PNAH NH HWGI AWR NH KWEI TMHARE HAL KW BDLNE KI KWShSh KRNE WALA HW GA
42.48: AB AGR IH LWG MNH MWRTE HIN TW AE NBIؐ، HM NE TM KW AN PR NGHBAN BNA KR TW NHIN BHIJA HE TM PR TW SRF BAT PHNChA DINE KI ZMH DARI HE ANSAN KA HAL IH HE KH JB HM ASE APNI RHMT KA MZA ChKHATE HIN TW AUS PR PHWL JATA HE، AWR AGR AS KE APNE HATHWN KA KIA DHRA KSI MSIBT KI ShKL MIN AUS PR ALT PRTA HE TW SKhT NAShKRA BN JATA HE
42.49: ALLH ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN KI BADShAHI KA MALK HE، JW KChH ChAHTA HE PIDA KRTA HE، JSE ChAHTA HE LRKIAN DITA HE، JSE ChAHTA HE LRKE DITA HE

42.51: KSI BShR KA IH MQAM NHIN HE KH ALLH AUS SE RWBRW BAT KRE AUS KI BAT IA TW WHI (AShARE) KE TWR PR HWTI HE، IA PRDE KE PIChHE SE، IA PHR WH KWEI PIGhAM BR (FRShTH) BHIJTA HE AWR WH AUS KE HKM SE JW KChH WH ChAHTA HE، WHI KRTA HE، WH BRTR AWR HKIM HE

42.53: AUS KhDA KE RASTE KI TRF JW ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN KI HR ChIZ KA MALK HE KhBRDAR RHW، SARE MعAMLAT ALLH HI KI TRF RJWع KRTE HIN

43.2: QSM HE AIS WAZH KTAB KI

43.10: WHI NA JS NE TMHARE LIE AS ZMIN KW GHWARH BNAIA AWR AS MIN TMHARI KhATR RASTE BNA DIE TAKH TM APNI MNZL MQSWD KI RAH PASKW
43.11: JS NE AIK KhAS MQDAR MIN AaSMAN SE PANI ATARA AWR AS KE ZRIعH SE MRDH ZMIN KW JLA ATHAIA، AISI TRH AIK RWZ TM ZMIN SE BRAaMD KIE JAؤ GE

43.15: (IH SB KChH JANTE AWR MANTE HWEE BHI) AIN LWGWN NE AUS KE BNDWN MIN SE BعZ KW AS KA JZ BNA DALA، HQIQT IH HE KH ANSAN KHLA AHSAN FRAMWSh HE

43.17: AWR HAL IH HE KH JS AWLAD KW IH LWG AUS KhDAEE RHMAN KI TRF MNSWB KRTE HIN AUS KI WLADT KA MZhDH JB KhWD AIN MIN SE KSI KW DIA JATA HE TW AUS KE MNH PR SIAHI ChHA JATI HE AWR WH GhM SE BHR JATA HE

43.19: ANHWN NE FRShTWN KW، JW KhDAEE RHMAN KE KhAS BNDE HIN، عWRTIN QRAR DE LIA KIA AUN KE JSM KI SAKhT AINHWN NE DIKHI HE? AIN KI GWAHI LKH LI JAEE GI AWR ANHIN AS KI JWABDHI KRNI HW GI

43.27: MIRA TعLQ SRF AUS SE HE JS NE MJHE PIDA KIA، WHI MIRI RHNMAEI KRE GA"

43.31: KHTE HIN، IH QRAaN DWNWN ShHRWN KE BRE AaDMIWN MIN SE KSI PR KIWN NH NAZL KIA GIA?
43.32: KIA TIRE RB KI RHMT IH LWG TQSIM KRTE HIN? DNIA KI ZNDGI MIN AIN KI GZR BSR KE ZRAEع TW HM NE AIN KE DRMIAN TQSIM KIE HIN، AWR AIN MIN SE KChH LWGWN KW KChH DWSRE LWGWN PR HM NE BDRJHA FWQIT DI HE TAKH IH AIK DWSRE SE KhDMT LIN AWR TIRE RB KI RHMT AUS DWLT SE ZIADH QIMTI HE JW (AIN KE REIS) SMIT RHE HIN
43.33: AGR IH ANDIShH NH HWTA KH SARE LWG AIK HI TRIQE KE HW JAEIN GE TW KhDAEE RHMAN SE KFR KRNE WALWN KE GHRWN KI ChHTIN، AWR AN KI SIRHIAN JN SE WH APNE BALA KhANWN PR ChRHTE HIN

43.42: IA TM KW AaNKHWN SE AIN KA WH ANJAM DKHA DIN JS KA HM NE AIN SE WعDH KIA HE، HMIN AIN PR PWRI QDRT HASL HE

43.48: HM AIK PR AIK AISI NShANI AUN KW DKHATE ChLE GEE JW PHLI SE BRH ChRH KR THI، AWR HM NE AUN KW عZAB MIN DHR LIA TAKH WH APNI RWSh SE BAZ AaEIN

43.51: AIK RWZ FRعWN NE APNI QWM KE DRMIAN PKAR KR KHA، "LWGW، KIA MSR KI BADShAHI MIRI NHIN HE، AWR IH NHRIN MIRE NIChE NHIN BHH RHI HIN? KIA TM LWGWN KW NZR NHIN AaTA?

43.54: AUS NE APNI QWM KW HLKA SMJHA AWR ANHWN NE AS KI ATAعT KI، DR HQIQT WH THE HI FASQ LWG
43.55: AaKhR KAR JB ANHWN NE HMIN GhZB NAK KR DIA TW HM NE AN SE ANTQAM LIA AWR AN KW AKTHA GhRQ KR DIA

43.58: AWR LGE KHNE KH HMARE MعBWD AChHE HIN IA WH? IH MSAL WH TMHARE SAMNE MHZ KJ BHSI KE LIE LAEE HIN، HQIQT IH HE KH IH HIN HI JHGRALW LWG
43.59: ABN MRIMؑ AIS KE SWA KChH NH THA KH AIK BNDH THA JS PR HM NE ANعAM KIA AWR BNI ASRAEIL KE LIE APNI QDRT KA AIK NMWNH BNA DIA
43.60: HM ChAHIN TW TM SE FRShTE PIDA KR DIN JW ZMIN MIN TMHARE JANShIN HWN
43.61: AWR WH DRASL QIAMT KI AIK NShANI HE، PS TM AUS MIN ShK NH KRW AWR MIRI BAT MAN LW، IHI SIDHA RASTH HE
43.62: AISA NH HW ShITAN TM KW AUS SE RWK DE KH WH TMHARA KHLA DShMN HE
43.63: AWR JB عISIAؑ SRIH NShANIAN LIE HWEE AaIA THA TW AS NE KHA THA KH "MIN TM LWGWN KE PAS HKMT LE KR AaIA HWN، AWR AS LIE AaIA HWN KH TM PR BعZ AUN BATWN KI HQIQT KHWL DWN JN MIN TM AKhTLAF KR RHE HW، LHAZA TM ALLH SE DRW AWR MIRI ATAعT KRW
43.64: HQIQT IH HE KH ALLH HI MIRA RB BHI HE AWR TMHARA RB BHI AUSI KI TM عBADT KRW، IHI SIDHA RASTH HE"
43.65: MGR (AUS KI AIS SAF TعLIM KE BAWJWD) GRWHWN NE AaPS MIN AKhTLAF KIA، PS TBAHI HE AUN LWGWN KE LIE JNHWN NE ZLM KIA AIK DRDNAK DN KE عZAB SE

43.69: KHA JAEE GA KH "AE MIRE BNDW، AaJ TMHARE LIE KWEI KhWF NHIN AWR NH TMHIN KWEI GhM LAHQ HWGA
43.70: DAKhL HW JAؤ JNT MIN TM AWR TMHARI BIWIAN، TMHIN KhWSh KR DIA JAEE GA"
43.71: AUN KE AaGE SWNE KE THAL AWR SAGhR GRDSh KRAEE JAEIN GE AWR HR MN BHATI AWR NGAHWN KW LZT DINE WALI ChIZ WHAN MWJWD HW GI AN SE KHA JAEE GA، "TM AB IHAN HMIShH RHW GE

43.74: RHE MJRMIN، TW WH HMIShH JHNM KE عZAB MIN MBTLA RHIN GE
43.75: KBHI AUN KE عZAB MIN KMI NH HW GI، AWR WH AS MIN MAIWS PRE HWN GE
43.76: AN PR HM NE ZLM NHIN KIA BLKH WH KhWD HI APNE AWPR ZLM KRTE RHE
43.77: WH PKARIN GE، "AE MALK، TIRA RB HMARA KAM HI TMAM KR DE TW AChHA HE" WH JWAB DE GA، "TM IWN HI PRE RHW GE
43.78: HM TMHARE PAS HQ LE KR AaEE THE MGR TM MIN SE AKSR KW HQ HI NAGWAR THA"
43.79: KIA AIN LWGWN NE KWEI AQDAM KRNE KA FISLH KR LIA HE? AChHA TW HM BHI PHR AIK FISLH KIE LITE HIN
43.80: KIA AINHWN NE IH SMJH RKHA HE KH HM AIN KI RAZ KI BATIN AWR AIN KI SRGWShIAN SNTE NHIN HIN? HM SB KChH SN RHE HIN AWR HMARE FRShTE AIN KE PAS HI LKH RHE HIN
43.81: AIN SE KHW، "AGR WAQعI RHMAN KI KWEI AWLAD HWTI TW SB SE PHLE عBADT KRNE WALA MIN HWTA"
43.82: PAK HE AaSMANWN AWR ZMIN KA FRMAN RWA عRSh KA MALK، AUN SARI BATWN SE JW IH LWG AUS KI TRF MNSWB KRTE HIN

45.2: AIS KTAB KA NZWL ALLH KI TRF SE HE JW ZBRDST AWR HKIM HE

45.6: IH ALLH KI NShANIAN HIN JNHIN HM TMHARE SAMNE THIK THIK BIAN KR RHE HIN AB AaKhR ALLH AWR AS KI AaIAT KE BعD AWR KWN SI BAT HE JS PR IH LWG AIMAN LAEIN GE

45.10: AUN KE AaGE JHNM HE JW KChH BHI ANHWN NE DNIA MIN KMAIA HE AS MIN SE KWEI ChIZ AUN KE KSI KAM NH AaEE GI، NH AUN KE WH SRPRST HI AUN KE LIE KChH KR SKIN GE JNHIN ALLH KW ChHWR KR ANHWN NE APNA WLI BNA RKHA HE AUN KE LIE BRA عZAB HE

45.13: AS NE ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN KI SARI HI ChIZWN KW TMHARE LIE MSKhR KR DIA، SB KChH APNE PAS SE AIS MIN BRI NShANIAN HIN AUN LWGWN KE LIE JW GhWR W FKR KRNE WALE HIN
45.14: AE NBIؐ، AIMAN LANE WALWN SE KHH DW KH JW LWG ALLH KI TRF SE BRE DN AaNE KA KWEI ANDIShH NHIN RKHTE، AUN KI HRKTWN PR DRGZR SE KAM LIN TAKH ALLH KhWD AIK GRWH KW AS KI KMAEI KA BDLH DE

45.17: AWR DIN KE MعAMLH MIN AUNHIN WAZH HDAIAT DE DIN PHR JW AKhTLAF AUN KE DRMIAN RW NMA HWA WH (NA WAQFIT KI WJH SE NHIN BLKH) عLM Aa JANE KE BعD HWA AWR AS BNA PR HWA KH WH AaPS MIN AIK DWSRE PR ZIADTI KRNA ChAHTE THE ALLH QIAMT KE RWZ AUN MعAMLAT KA FISLH FRMA DE GA JN MIN WH AKhTLAF KRTE RHE HIN

46.3: HM NE ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN KW AWR AUN SARI ChIZWN KW JW AUN KE DRMIAN HIN BRHQ، AWR AIK MDT KhAS KE TعIN KE SATH PIDA KIA HE MGR IH KAFR LWG AUS HQIQT SE MNH MWRE HWEE HIN JS SE AN KW KhBRDAR KIA GIA HE
46.4: AE NBIؐ، AIN SE KHW، "KBHI TM NE AaNKHIN KHWL KR DIKHA BHI KH WH HSTIAN HIN KIA JNHIN TM KhDA KW ChHWR KR PKARTE HW? ZRA MJHE DKHAؤ TW SHI KH ZMIN MIN ANHWN NE KIA PIDA KIA HE، IA AaSMANWN KI TKhLIQ W TDBIR MIN AN KA KIA HSH HE AIS SE PHLE AaEI HWEI KTAB IA عLM KA KWEI BQIH (AIN عQAED KE SBWT MIN) TMHARE PAS HW TW WHI LE Aaؤ AGR TM SChE HW"

46.7: AIN LWGWN KW JB HMARI SAF SAF AaIAT SNAEI JATI HIN AWR HQ AIN KE SAMNE Aa JATA HE TW IH KAFR LWG AUS KE MTعLQ KHTE HIN KH IH TW KHLA JADW HE
46.8: KIA AUN KA KHNA IH HE KH RSWL NE AISE KhWD GHR LIA HE? AN SE KHW، "AGR MIN NE AISE KhWD GHR LIA HE TW TM MJHE KhDA KI PKR SE KChH BHI NH BChA SKW GE، JW BATIN TM BNATE HW ALLH AN KW KhWB JANTA HE، MIRE AWR TMHARE DRMIAN WHI GWAHI DINE KE LIE KAFI HE، AWR WH BRA DRGZR KRNE WALA AWR RHIM HE"
46.9: AIN SE KHW، "MIN KWEI NRALA RSWL TW NHIN HWN، MIN NHIN JANTA KH KL TMHARE SATH KIA HWNA HE AWR MIRE SATH KIA، MIN TW SRF AUS WHI KI PIRWI KRTA HWN JW MIRE PAS BHIJI JATI HE AWR MIN AIK SAF SAF KhBRDAR KR DINE WALE KE SWA AWR KChH NHIN HWN"
46.10: AE NBIؐ، AN SE KHW "KBHI TM NE SWChA BHI KH AGR IH KLAM ALLH HI KI TRF SE HWA AWR TM NE AIS KA ANKAR KR DIA (TW TMHARA KIA ANJAM HWGA)? AWR AIS JISE AIK KLAM PR TW BNI ASRAEIL KA AIK GWAH ShHADT BHI DE ChKA HE WH AIMAN LE AaIA AWR TM APNE GHMND MIN PRE RHE AISE ZALMWN KW ALLH HDAIT NHIN DIA KRTA"
