46.12: HALANKH AIS SE PHLE MWSIAؑ KI KTAB RHNMA AWR RHMT BN KR Aa ChKI HE، AWR IH KTAB AUS KI TSDIQ KRNE WALI ZBAN عRBI MIN AaEI HE TAKH ZALMWN KW MTNBH KR DE AWR NIK RWSh AKhTIAR KRNE WALWN KW BShART DE DE
46.13: IQINAAn JN LWGWN NE KHH DIA KH ALLH HI HMARA RB HE، PHR AUS PR JM GEE، AUN KE LIE NH KWEI KhWF HE AWR NH WH GhMGIN HWN GE
46.14: AISE SB LWG JNT MIN JANE WALE HIN JHAN WH HMIShH RHIN GE APNE AUN AعMAL KE BDLE JW WH DNIA MIN KRTE RHE HIN
46.15: HM NE ANSAN KW HDAIT KI KH WH APNE WALDIN KE SATH NIK BR TAؤ KRE AUS KI MAN NE MShQT ATHA KR ASE PIT MIN RKHA AWR MShQT ATHA KR HI AS KW JNA، AWR AS KE HML AWR DWDH ChHRANE MIN TIS MHINE LG GEE IHAN TK KH JB WH APNI PWRI TAQT KW PHNChA AWR ChALIS SAL KA HW GIA TW AS NE KHA "AE MIRE RB، MJHE TWFIQ DE KH MIN TIRI AUN NعMTWN KA ShKR ADA KRWN JW TW NE MJHE AWR MIRE WALDIN KW عTA FRMAEIN، AWR AISA NIK عML KRWN JS SE TW RAZI HW، AWR MIRI AWLAD KW BHI NIK BNA KR MJHE SUKH DE، MIN TIRE HZWR TWBH KRTA HWN AWR TABع FRMAN (MSLM) BNDWN MIN SE HWN"
46.16: AIS TRH KE LWGWN SE HM AUN KE BHTRIN AعMAL KW QBWL KRTE HIN AWR AN KI BRAEIWN SE DRGZR KR JATE HIN IH JNTI LWGWN MIN ShAML HWN GE AUS SChE WعDE KE MTABQ JW AN SE KIA JATA RHA HE
46.17: AWR JS ShKhS NE APNE WALDIN SE KHA "AUF، TNG KR DIA TM NE، KIA TM MJHE IH KhWF DLATE HW KH MIN MRNE KE BعD PHR QBR SE NKALA JAؤN GA HALANKH MJH SE PHLE BHT SI NSLIN GZR ChKI HIN (AUN MIN SE TW KWEI ATH KR NH AaIA)" MAN AWR BAP ALLH KI DWHAEI DE KR KHTE HIN "ARE BDNSIB، MAN JA، ALLH KA WعDH SChA HE" MGR WH KHTA HE "IH SB AGLE WQTWN KI FRSWDH KHANIAN HIN"
46.18: IH WH LWG HIN JN PR عZAB KA FISLH ChSPAN HW ChKA HE AIN SE PHLE JNWN AWR ANSANWN KE JW TWLE (AISI QMASh KE) HW GZRE HIN AUNHI MIN IH BHI JA ShAML HWN GE BE ShK IH GHATE MIN RH JANE WALE LWG HIN
46.19: DWNWN GRWHWN MIN SE HR AIK KE DRJE AN KE AعMAL KE LHAZ SE HIN TAKH ALLH AN KE KIE KA PWRA PWRA BDLH AN KW DE AN PR ZLM HRGZ NH KIA JAEE GA
46.20: PHR JB IH KAFR AaG KE SAMNE LA KHRE KIE JAEIN GE TW AN SE KHA JAEE GA: "TM APNE HSE KI NعMTIN APNI DNIA KI ZNDGI MIN KhTM KR ChKE AWR AN KA LTF TM NE ATHA LIA، AB JW TKBR TM ZMIN MIN KSI HQ KE BGhIR KRTE RHE AWR JW NAFRMANIAN TM NE KIN AUN KI PADASh MIN AaJ TM KW ZLT KA عZAB DIA JAEE GA"
46.21: ZRA AINHIN عAD KE BHAEI (HWDؑ) KA QSH SNAؤ JBKH AUS NE AHQAF MIN APNI QWM KW KhBRDAR KIA THA AWR AISE KhBRDAR KRNE WALE AUS SE PHLE BHI GZR ChKE THE AWR AS KE BعD BHI AaTE RHE KH "ALLH KE SWA KSI KI BNDGI NH KRW، MJHE TMHARE HQ MIN AIK BRE HWLNAK DN KE عZAB KA ANDIShH HE"
46.22: ANHWN NE KHA "KIA TW AIS LIE AaIA HE KH HMIN BHKA KR HMARE MعBWDWN SE BRGShTH KR DE? AChHA TW LE Aa APNA WH عZAB JS SE TW HMIN DRATA HE AGR WAQعI TW SChA HE"
46.23: AUS NE KHA KH "AIS KA عLM TW ALLH KW HE، MIN SRF WH PIGhAM TMHIN PHNChA RHA HWN JSE DE KR MJHE BHIJA GIA HE MGR MIN DIKH RHA HWN KH TM LWG JHALT BRT RHE HW"
46.24: PHR JB ANHWN NE AUS عZAB KW APNI WADIWN KI TRF AaTE DIKHA TW KHNE LGE "IH BADL HE JW HM KW SIRAB KR DE GA" "NHIN، BLKH IH WHI ChIZ HE JS KE LIE TM JLDI MChA RHE THE IH HWA KA TWFAN HE JS MIN DRDNAK عZAB ChLA Aa RHA HE
46.25: APNE RB KE HKM SE HR ChIZ KW TBAH KR DALE GA" AaKhRKAR AUN KA HAL IH HWA KH AUN KE RHNE KI JGHWN KE SWA WHAN KChH NZR NH AaTA THA AIS TRH HM MJRMWN KW BDLH DIA KRTE HIN
46.26: AUN KW HM NE WH KChH DIA THA JW TM LWGWN KW NHIN DIA HE AUN KW HM NE KAN، AaNKHIN AWR DL، SB KChH DE RKHE THE، MGR NH WH KAN AUN KE KSI KAM AaEE، NH AaNKHIN، NH DL، KIWNKH WH ALLH KI AaIAT KA ANKAR KRTE THE، AWR AUSI ChIZ KE PHIR MIN WH Aa GEE JS KA WH MZAQ ARATE THE
46.27: TMHARE GRD W PISh KE عLAQWN MIN BHT SI BSTIWN KW HM HLAK KR ChKE HIN HM NE APNI AaIAT BHIJ KR BAR BAR TRH TRH SE AUN KW SMJHAIA، ShAID KH WH BAZ Aa JAEIN
46.28: PHR KIWN NH AUN HSTIWN NE AUN KI MDD KI JNHIN ALLH KW ChHWR KR ANHWN NE TQRB ALI ALLH KA ZRIعH SMJHTE HWEE MعBWD BNA LIA THA? BLKH WH TW AN SE KHWEE GEE، AWR IH THA AUN KE JHWT AWR AUN BNAWTI عQIDWN KA ANJAM JW ANHWN NE GHR RKHE THE
46.29: (AWR WH WAQعH BHI QABL ZKR HE) JB HM JNWN KE AIK GRWH KW TMHARI TRF LE AaEE THE TAKH QRAaN SNIN JB WH AUS JGH PHNChE (JHAN TM QRAaN PRH RHE THE) TW ANHWN NE AaPS MIN KHA KhAMWSh HW JAؤ PHR JB WH PRHA JA ChKA TW WH KhBRDAR KRNE WALE BN KR APNI QWM KI TRF PLTE
46.30: ANHWN NE JA KR KHA، "AE HMARI QWM KE LWGW، HM NE AIK KTAB SNI HE JW MWSIAؑ KE BعD NAZL KI GEI HE، TSDIQ KRNE WALI HE APNE SE PHLE AaEI HWEI KTABWN KI، RHNMAEI KRTI HE HQ AWR RAH RAST KI TRF
46.31: AE HMARI QWM KE LWGW، ALLH KI TRF BLANE WALE KI DعWT QBWL KR LW AWR AS PR AIMAN LE Aaؤ، ALLH TMHARE GNAHWN SE DRGZR FRMAEE GA AWR TMHIN عZAB ALIM SE BChA DE GA"
46.32: AWR JW KWEI ALLH KE DAعI KI BAT NH MANE WH NH ZMIN MIN KhWD KWEI BL BWTA RKHTA HE KH ALLH KW ZCh KR DE، AWR NH AS KE KWEI AISE HAMI W SRPRST HIN KH ALLH SE AS KW BChA LIN AISE LWG KHLI GMRAHI MIN PR E HWEE HIN
46.33: AWR KIA AIN LWGWN KW IH SJHAEI NHIN DITA KH JS KhDA NE IH ZMIN AWR AaSMAN PIDA KIE HIN AWR AN KW BNATE HWEE JW NH THKA، WH ZRWR AS PR QADR HE KH MURDWN KW JLA ATHAEE? KIWN NHIN، IQINAAn WH HR ChIZ KI QDRT RKHTA HE
46.34: JS RWZ IH KAFR AaG KE SAMNE LAEE JAEIN GE، AUS WQT AIN SE PWChHA JAEE GA "KIA IH HQ NHIN HE?" IH KHIN GE "HAN، HMARE RB KI QSM (IH WAQعI HQ HE)" ALLH FRMAEE GA، "AChHA TW AB عZAB KA MZA ChKHW APNE AUS ANKAR KI PADASh MIN JW TM KRTE RHE THE"
46.35: PS AE NBIؐ، SBR KRW JS TRH AWLWALعZM RSWLWN NE SBR KIA HE، AWR AN KE MعAMLH MIN JLDI NH KRW JS RWZ IH LWG AUS ChIZ KW DIKH LIN GE JS KA AINHIN KhWF DLAIA JA RHA HE TW AINHIN IWN MعLWM HW GA KH JISE DNIA MIN DN KI AIK GHRI BHR SE ZIADH NHIN RHE THE BAT PHNChA DI GEI، AB KIA NAFRMAN LWGWN KE SWA AWR KWEI HLAK HW GA?

47.1: JN LWGWN NE KFR KIA AWR ALLH KE RASTE SE RWKA، ALLH NE AN KE AعMAL KW RAEIGAN KR DIA
47.2: AWR JW LWG AIMAN LAEE AWR JNHWN NE NIK عML KIE AWR AUS ChIZ KW MAN LIA JW MHMDؐ PR NAZL HWEI HE AWR HE WH SRASR HQ AUN KE RB KI TRF SE ALLH NE AN KI BRAEIAN AUN SE DWR KR DIN AWR AN KA HAL DRST KR DIA
47.3: IH AS LIE KH KFR KRNE WALWN NE BATL KI PIRWI KI AWR AIMAN LANE WALWN NE AUS HQ KI PIRWI KI JW AN KE RB KI TRF SE AaIA HE AIS TRH ALLH LWGWN KW AUN KI THIK THIK HISIT BTAEE DITA HE
47.4: PS JB AIN KAFRWN SE TMHARI MD BHIR HW TW PHLA KAM GRDNIN MARNA HE، IHAN TK KH JB TM AN KW AChHI TRH KChL DW TB QIDIWN KW MZBWT BANDHW، AS KE BعD (TMHIN AKhTIAR HE) AHSAN KRW IA FDIE KA MعAMLH KR LW، TA AaNKH LRAEI APNE HTHIAR DAL DE IH HE TMHARE KRNE KA KAM ALLH ChAHTA TW KhWD HI AUN SE NMT LITA، MGR (IH TRIQH AUS NE AS LIE AKhTIAR KIA HE) TAKH TM LWGWN KW AIK DWSRE KE ZRIعH SE AaZMAEE AWR JW LWG ALLH KI RAH MIN MARE JAEIN GE ALLH AN KE AعMAL KW HRGZ ZAEع NH KRE GA
47.5: WH AN KI RHNMAEI FRMAEE GA، AN KA HAL DRST KR DE GA
47.6: AWR AN KW AS JNT MIN DAKhL KRE GA JS SE WH AN KW WAQF KRA ChKA HE
47.7: AE LWGW JW AIMAN LAEE HW، AGR TM ALLH KI MDD KRW GE TW WH TMHARI MDD KRE GA AWR TMHARE QDM MZBWT JMA DE GA
47.8: RHE WH LWG JNHWN NE KFR KIA HE، TW AUN KE LIE HLAKT HE AWR ALLH NE AN KE AعMAL KW BHTKA DIA HE
47.9: KIWNKH ANHWN NE AUS ChIZ KW NAPSND KIA JSE ALLH NE NAZL KIA HE، LHAZA ALLH NE AUN KE AعMAL ZAEع KR DIE
47.10: KIA WH ZMIN MIN ChLE PHRE NH THE KH AUN LWGWN KA ANJAM DIKHTE JW AN SE PHLE GZR ChKE HIN? ALLH NE AUN KA SB KChH AUN PR ALT DIA، AWR AISE NTAEJ AIN KAFRWN KE LIE MQDR HIN
47.11: IH AS LIE KH AIMAN LANE WALWN KA HAMI W NASR ALLH HE AWR KAFRWN KA HAMI W NASR KWEI NHIN
47.12: AIMAN LANE WALWN AWR NIK عML KRNE WALWN KW ALLH AUN JNTWN MIN DAKhL KRE GA JN KE NIChE NHRIN BHTI HIN، AWR KFR KRNE WALE BS DNIA KI ChND RWZH ZNDGI KE MZE LWT RHE HIN، JANWRWN KI TRH KHA PI RHE HIN، AWR AUN KA AaKhRI THKANA JHNM HE
47.13: AE NBIؐ، KTNI HI BSTIAN AISI GZR ChKI HIN JW TMHARI AUS BSTI SE BHT ZIADH ZWR AaWR THIN JS NE TMHIN NKAL DIA HE AUNHIN HM NE AIS TRH HLAK KR DIA KH KWEI AN KA BChANE WALA NH THA
47.14: BHLA KHIN AISA HW SKTA HE KH JW APNE RB KI TRF SE AIK SAF W SRIH HDAIT PR HW، WH AUN LWGWN KI TRH HW JAEE JN KE LIE AUN KA BRA عML KhWShNMA BNA DIA GIA HE AWR WH APNI KhWAHShAT KE PIRW BN GEE HIN?
47.15: PRHIZ GARWN KE LIE JS JNT KA WعDH KIA GIA HE AS KI ShAN TW IH HE KH AS MIN NHRIN BHH RHI HWN GI NTHRE HWEE PANI KI، NHRIN BHH RHI HWN GI AISE DWDH KI JS KE MZE MIN ZRA FRQ NH AaIA HW GA، NHRIN BHH RHI HWN GI AISI ShRAB KI JW PINE WALWN KE LIE LZIZ HWGI، NHRIN BHH RHI HWN GI SAF ShFAF ShHD KI AUS MIN AUN KE LIE HR TRH KE PHL HWN GE AWR AUN KE RB KI TRF SE BKhShSh (KIA WH ShKhS JS KE HSH MIN IH JNT AaNE WALI HE) AUN LWGWN KI TRH HW SKTA HE JW JHNM MIN HMIShH RHIN GE AWR JNHIN AISA GRM PANI PLAIA JAEE GA JW AN KI AaNTIN TK KAT DE GA?
47.16: AIN MIN SE KChH LWG AISE HIN JW KAN LGA KR TMHARI BAT SNTE HIN AWR PHR JB TMHARE PAS SE NKLTE HIN TW AUN LWGWN SE JNHIN عLM KI NعMT BKhShI GEI HE PWChHTE HIN KH ABHI ABHI AINHWN NE KIA KHA THA? IH WH LWG HIN JN KE DLWN PR ALLH NE THPH LGA DIA HE AWR IH APNI KhWAHShAT KE PIRW BNE HWEE HIN
47.17: RHE WH LWG JNHWN NE HDAIT PAEI HE، ALLH AUN KW AWR ZIADH HDAIT DITA HE AWR ANHIN AUN KE HSE KA TQWIA عTA FRMATA HE
47.18: AB KIA IH LWG BS QIAMT HI KE MNTZR HIN KH WH AChANK AIN PR Aa JAEE? AUS KI عLAMAT TW Aa ChKI HIN JB WH KhWD Aa JAEE GI TW AIN KE LIE NSIHT QBWL KRNE KA KWNSA MWQع BAQI RH JAEE GA?
47.19: PS AE NBIؐ، KhWB JAN LW KH ALLH KE SWA KWEI عBADT KA MSTHQ NHIN HE، AWR MعAFI MANGW APNE QSWR KE LIE BHI AWR MWMN MRDWN AWR عWRTWN KE LIE BHI ALLH TMHARI SRGRMIWN KW BHI JANTA HE AWR TMHARE THKANE SE BHI WAQF HE
47.20: JW LWG AIMAN LAEE HIN WH KHH RHE THE KH KWEI SWRT KIWN NHIN NAZL KI JATI (JS MIN JNG KA HKM DIA JAEE) MGR JB AIK MHKM SWRT NAZL KR DI GEI JS MIN JNG KA ZKR THA TW TM NE DIKHA KH JN KE DLWN MIN BIMARI THI WH TMHARI TRF AS TRH DIKH RHE HIN JISE KSI PR MWT ChHA GEI HW AFSWS AUN KE HAL PR
47.21: (AUN KI ZBAN PR HE) ATAعT KA AQRAR AWR AChHI AChHI BATIN MGR JB QTعI HKM DE DIA GIA AUS WQT WH ALLH SE APNE عHD MIN SChE NKLTE TW ANHI KE LEE AChHA THA
47.22: AB KIA TM LWGWN SE AIS KE SWA KChH AWR TWQع KI JA SKTI HE KH AGR TM ALTE MNH PHR GEE TW ZMIN MIN PHR FSAD BRPA KRW GE AWR AaPS MIN AIK DWSRE KE GLE KATW GE?
47.23: IH LWG HIN JN PR ALLH NE LعNT KI AWR AN KW ANDHA AWR BHRA BNA DIA
47.24: KIA AN LWGWN NE QRAaN PR GhWR NHIN KIA، IA DLWN PR AUN KE QFL ChRHE HWEE HIN?
47.25: HQIQT IH HE KH JW LWG HDAIT WAZH HW JANE KE BعD AUS SE PHR GEE AUN KE LIE ShITAN NE AIS RWSh KW SHL BNA DIA HE AWR JHWTI TWQعAT KA SLSLH AUN KE LIE DRAZ KR RKHA HE
47.26: AISI LIE ANHWN NE ALLH KE NAZL KRDH DIN KW NAPSND KRNE WALWN SE KHH DIA KH BعZ MعAMLAT MIN HM TMHARI MANIN GE ALLH AUN KI IH KhFIH BATIN KhWB JANTA HE
47.27: PHR AS WQT KIA HAL HWGA JB FRShTE AN KI RWHIN QBZ KRIN GE AWR AIN KE MNH AWR PITHWN PR MARTE HWEE ANHIN LE JAEIN GE?
47.28: IH ASI LIE TW HWGA KH ANHWN NE AUS TRIQE KI PIRWI KI JW ALLH KW NARAZ KRNE WALA HE AWR AUS KI RZA KA RASTH AKhTIAR KRNA PSND NH KIA AISI BNA PR AUS NE AN KE SB AعMAL ZAEع KR DIE
47.29: KIA WH LWG JN KE DLWN MIN BIMARI HE IH SMJHE BITHE HIN KH ALLH AN KE DLWN KE KHWT ZAHR NHIN KRE GA?
47.30: HM ChAHIN TW ANHIN TM KW AaNKHWN SE DKHA DIN AWR AUN KE ChHRWN SE TM AN KW PHChAN LW MGR AN KE ANDAZ KLAM SE TW TM AN KW JAN HI LW GE ALLH TM SB KE AعMAL SE KhWB WAQF HE
47.31: HM ZRWR TM LWGWN KW AaZMAESh MIN DALIN GE TAKH TMHARE HALAT KI JANCh KRIN AWR DIKH LIN KH TM MIN MJAHD AWR SABT QDM KWN HIN
47.32: JN LWGWN NE KFR KIA AWR ALLH KI RAH SE RWKA AWR RSWL SE JHGRA KIA JBKH AN PR RAH RAST WAZH HW ChKI THI، DR HQIQT WH ALLH KA KWEI NQSAN BHI NHIN KR SKTE، BLKH ALLH HI AN KA SB KIA KRAIA GhART KR DE GA
47.33: AE LWGW JW AIMAN LAEE HW، TM ALLH KI ATAعT KRW AWR RSWL KI ATAعT KRW AWR APNE AعMAL KW BRBAD NH KR LW
47.34: KFR KRNE WALWN AWR RAH KhDA SE RWKNE WALWN AWR MRTE DM TK KFR PR JME RHNE WALWN KW TW ALLH HRGZ MعAF NH KRE GA
47.35: PS TM BWDE NH BNW AWR SLH KI DRKhWAST NH KRW TM HI GhALB RHNE WALE HW ALLH TMHARE SATH HE AWR TMHARE AعMAL KW WH HRGZ ZAEع NH KRE GA
47.36: IH DNIA KI ZNDGI TW AIK KHIL AWR TMAShA HE AGR TM AIMAN RKHW AWR TQWIA KI RWSh PR ChLTE RHW TW ALLH TMHARE AJR TM KW DE GA AWR WH TMHARE MAL TM SE NH MANGE GA
47.37: AGR KHIN WH TMHARE MAL TM SE MANG LE AWR SB KE SB TM SE TLB KR LE TW TM BKhL KRW GE AWR WH TMHARE KHWT ABHAR LAEE GA
47.38: DIKHW، TM LWGWN KW DعWT DI JA RHI HE KH ALLH KI RAH MIN MAL KhRCh KRW AIS PR TM MIN SE KChH LWG HIN JW BKhL KR RHE HIN، HALANKH JW BKhL KRTA HE WH DR HQIQT APNE AaP HI SE BKhL KR RHA HE ALLH TW GhNI HE، TM HI AS KE MHTAJ HW AGR TM MNH MWRW GE TW ALLH TMHARI JGH KSI AWR QWM KW LE AaEE GA AWR WH TM JISE NH HWN GE

48.1: AE NBIؐ، HM NE TM KW KHLI FTH عTA KR DI
48.2: TAKH ALLH TMHARI AGLI PChHLI HR KWTAHI SE DRGZR FRMAEE AWR TM PR APNI NعMT KI TKMIL KR DE AWR TMHIN SIDHA RASTH DKHAEE
48.3: AWR TM KW ZBRDST NSRT BKhShE
48.4: WHI HE JS NE MWMNWN KE DLWN MIN SKINT NAZL FRMAEI TAKH APNE AIMAN KE SATH WH AIK AIMAN AWR BRHA LIN ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN KE SB LShKR ALLH KE QBZH QDRT MIN HIN AWR WH عLIM W HKIM HE
48.5: (AUS NE IH KAM AIS LIE KIA HE) TAKH MWMN MRDWN AWR عWRTWN KW HMIShH RHNE KE LIE AISI JNTWN MIN DAKhL FRMAEE JN KE NIChE NHRIN BHH RHI HWN GI AWR AUN KI BRAEIAN AUN SE DWR KR DE ALLH KE NZDIK IH BRI KAMIABI HE
48.6: AWR AUN MNAFQ MRDWN AWR عWRTWN AWR MShRK MRDWN AWR عWRTWN KW SZA DE JW ALLH KE MTعLQ BRE GMAN RKHTE HIN BRAEI KE PHIR MIN WH KhWD HI Aa GEE، ALLH KA GhZB AN PR HWA AWR AS NE AN PR LعNT KI AWR AN KE LIE JHNM MHIA KR DI JW BHT HI BRA THKANA HE
48.7: ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN KE LShKR ALLH HI KE QBZH QDRT MIN HIN AWR WH ZBRDST AWR HKIM HE
48.8: AE NBIؐ، HM NE TM KW ShHADT DINE WALA، BShART DINE WALA AWR KhBRDAR KR DINE WALA BNA KR BHIJA HE
48.9: TAKH AE LWGW، TM ALLH AWR AS KE RSWL PR AIMAN LAؤ AWR AUS KA SATH DW، AS KI TعZIM W TWQIR KRW AWR SBH W ShAM AS KI TSBIH KRTE RHW
48.10: AE NBIؐ، JW LWG TM SE BIعT KR RHE THE WH DRASL ALLH SE BIعT KR RHE THE AN KE HATH PR ALLH KA HATH THA AB JW AS عHD KW TWRE GA AUS KI عHD ShKNI KA WBAL AS KI APNI HI ZAT PR HWGA، AWR JW AUS عHD KW WFA KRE GA JW AS NE ALLH SE KIA HE، ALLH عNQRIB AS KW BRA AJR عTA FRMAEE GA
48.11: AE NBIؐ، BDWI عRBWN MIN SE JW LWG PIChHE ChHWR DIE GEE THE AB WH Aa KR ZRWR TM SE KHIN GE KH "HMIN APNE AMWAL AWR BAL BChWN KI FKR NE MShGhWL KR RKHA THA، AaP HMARE LIE MGhFRT KI DعA FRMAEIN" IH LWG APNI ZBANWN SE WH BATIN KHTE HIN JW AN KE DLWN MIN NHIN HWTIN AN SE KHNA "AChHA، IHI BAT HE TW KWN TMHARE MعAMLH MIN ALLH KE FISLE KW RWK DINE KA KChH BHI AKhTIAR RKHTA HE AGR WH TMHIN KWEI NQSAN PHNChANA ChAHE IA NFع BKhShNA ChAHE? TMHARE AعMAL SE TW ALLH HI BAKhBR HE
48.12: (MGR ASL BAT WH NHIN HE JW TM KHH RHE HW) BLKH TM NE IWN SMJHA KH RSWL AWR MWMNIN APNE GHR WALWN MIN HRGZ PLT KR NH Aa SKIN GE AWR IH KhIAL TMHARE DLWN KW BHT BHLA LGA AWR TM NE BHT BRE GMAN KIE AWR TM SKhT BD BATN LWG HW"
48.13: ALLH AWR AS KE RSWL PR JW LWG AIMAN NH RKHTE HWN AISE KAFRWN KE LIE HM NE BHRKTI HWEI AaG MHIA KR RKHI HE
48.14: AaSMANWN AWR ZMIN KI BADShAHI KA MALK ALLH HI HE JSE ChAHE MعAF KRE AWR JSE ChAHE SZA DE، AWR WH GhFWR W RHIM HE
48.15: JB TM MAL GhNIMT HASL KRNE KE LIE JANE LGW GE TW IH PIChHE ChHWRE JANE WALE LWG TM SE ZRWR KHIN GE KH HMIN BHI APNE SATH ChLNE DW IH ChAHTE HIN KH ALLH KE FRMAN KW BDL DIN AIN SE SAF KHH DINA KH "TM HRGZ HMARE SATH NHIN ChL SKTE، ALLH PHLE HI IH FRMA ChKA HE" IH KHIN GE KH "NHIN، BLKH TM LWG HM SE HSD KR RHE HW" (HALANKH BAT HSD KI NHIN HE) BLKH IH LWG SHIH BAT KW KM HI SMJHTE HIN
48.16: AIN PIChHE ChHWRE JANE WALE BDWI عRBWN SE KHNA KH "عNQRIB TMHIN AISE LWGWN SE LRNE KE LIE BLAIA JAEE GA JW BRE ZWR AaWR HIN TM KW AN SE JNG KRNI HWGI IA WH MTIع HW JAEIN GE AUS WQT AGR TM NE HKM JHAD KI ATAعT KI TW ALLH TMHIN AChHA AJR DE GA، AWR AGR TM PHR AUSI TRH MNH MWR GEE JS TRH PHLE MWR ChKE HW TW ALLH TM KW DRDNAK SZA DE GA
48.17: AGR ANDHA AWR LNGRA AWR MRIZ JHAD KE LIE NH AaEE TW KWEI HRJ NHIN JW KWEI ALLH AWR AS KE RSWL KI ATAعT KRE GA ALLH ASE AUN JNTWN MIN DAKhL KRE GA JN KE NIChE NHRIN BHH RHI HWN GI، AWR JW MNH PHIRE GA ASE WH DRDNAK عZAB DE GA"
48.18: ALLH MWMNWN SE KhWSh HW GIA JB WH DRKhT KE NIChE TM SE BIعT KR RHE THE AN KE DLWN KA HAL AUS KW MعLWM THA، AS LIE AS NE AN PR SKINT NAZL FRMAEI، AN KW ANعAM MIN QRIBI FTH BKhShI
48.19: AWR BHT SA MAL GhNIMT ANHIN عTA KR DIA JSE WH (عNQRIB) HASL KRIN GE ALLH ZBRDST AWR HKIM HE
48.20: ALLH TM SE BKSRT AMWAL GhNIMT KA WعDH KRTA HE JNHIN TM HASL KRW GE FWRI TWR PR TW IH FTH AS NE TMHIN عTA KR DI AWR LWGWN KE HATH TMHARE KhLAF ATHNE SE RWK DIE، TAKH IH MWMNWN KE LIE AIK NShANI BN JAEE AWR ALLH SIDHE RASTE KI TRF TMHIN HDAIT BKhShE
48.21: AIS KE عLAWH DWSRE AWR GhNIMTWN KA BHI WH TM SE WعDH KRTA HE JN PR TM ABHI TK QADR NHIN HWEE HW AWR ALLH NE AN KW GHIR RKHA HE، ALLH HR ChIZ PR QADR HE
48.22: IH KAFR LWG AGR AIS WQT TM SE LR GEE HWTE TW IQINAAn PITH PHIR JATE AWR KWEI HAMI W MDDGAR NH PATE
48.23: IH ALLH KI SNT HE JW PHLE SE ChLI Aa RHI HE AWR TM ALLH KI SNT MIN KWEI TBDILI NH PAؤ GE
48.24: WHI HE JS NE MKH KI WADI MIN AUN KE HATH TM SE AWR TMHARE HATH AUN SE RWK DIE، HALANKH WH AUN PR TMHIN GhLBH عTA KR ChKA THA AWR JW KChH TM KR RHE THE ALLH ASE DIKH RHA THA
48.25: WHI LWG TW HIN JNHWN NE KFR KIA AWR TM KW MSJD HRAM SE RWKA AWR HDI KE AWNTWN KW AUN KI QRBANI KI JGH NH PHNChNE DIA AGR (MKH MIN) AISE MWMN MRD W عWRT MWJWD NH HWTE JNHIN TM NHIN JANTE، AWR IH KhTRH NH HWTA KH NADANSTGI MIN TM ANHIN PAMAL KR DW GE AWR AS SE TM PR HRF AaEE GA (TW JNG NH RWKI JATI RWKI WH AS LIE GEI) TAKH ALLH APNI RHMT MIN JS KW ChAHE DAKhL KR LE WH MWMN ALG HW GEE HWTE TW (AHL MKH MIN SE) JW KAFR THE AN KW HM ZRWR SKhT SZA DITE
48.26: (IHI WJH HE KH) JB AN KAFRWN NE APNE DLWN MIN JAHLANH HMIT BTHA LI TW ALLH NE APNE RSWL AWR MWMNWN PR SKINT NAZL FRMAEI AWR MWMNWN KW TQWIA KI BAT KA PABND RKHA KH WHI AUS KE ZIADH HQ DAR AWR AUS KE AHL THE ALLH HR ChIZ KA عLM RKHTA HE
48.27: FI ALWAQع ALLH NE APNE RSWL KW SChA KhWAB DKHA IA THA JW THIK THIK HQ KE MTABQ THA ANShAءALLH TM ZRWR MSJD HRAM MIN PWRE AMN KE SATH DAKhL HW GE، APNE SR MNDWAؤ GE AWR BAL TRShWAؤ GE، AWR TMHIN KWEI KhWF NH HW GA WH AUS BAT KW JANTA THA JSE TM NH JANTE THE AS LIE WH KhWAB PWRA HWNE SE PHLE AUS NE IH QRIBI FTH TM KW عTA FRMA DI
48.28: WH ALLH HI HE JS NE APNE RSWL KW HDAIT AWR DIN HQ KE SATH BHIJA HE TAKH AUS KW PWRI JNS DIN PR GhALB KR DE AWR AIS HQIQT PR ALLH KI GWAHI KAFI HE
48.29: MHMDؐ ALLH KE RSWL HIN، AWR JW LWG AN KE SATH HIN WH KFAR PR SKhT AWR AaPS MIN RHIM HIN TM JB DIKHW GE AUNHIN RKWع W SJWD، AWR ALLH KE FZL AWR AS KI KhWShNWDI KI TLB MIN MShGhWL PAؤ GE SJWD KE ASRAT AN KE ChHRWN PR MWJWD HIN JN SE WH ALG PHChANE JATE HIN IH HE AN KI SFT TWRAۃ MIN AWR ANJIL MIN AUN KI MSAL IWN DI GEI HE KH GWIA AIK KHITI HE JS NE PHLE KWNPL NKALI، PHR AS KW TQWIT DI، PHR WH GDRAEI، PHR APNE TNE PR KHRI HW GEI KAShT KRNE WALWN KW WH KhWSh KRTI HE TAKH KFAR AN KE PHLNE PHWLNE PR JLIN AIS GRWH KE LWG JW AIMAN LAEE HIN AWR JNHWN NE NIK عML KIE HIN ALLH NE AN SE MGhFRT AWR BRE AJR KA WعDH FRMAIA HE

49.1: AE LWGW JW AIMAN LAEE HW، ALLH AWR AS KE RSWL KE AaGE PISh QDMI NH KRW AWR ALLH SE DRW، ALLH SB KChH SNNE AWR JANNE WALA HE
49.2: AE LWGW JW AIMAN LAEE HW، APNI AaWAZ NBIؐ KI AaWAZ SE BLND NH KRW، AWR NH NBIؐ KE SATH AWNChI AaWAZ SE BAT KIA KRW JS TRH TM AaPS MIN AIK DWSRE SE KRTE HW، KHIN AISA NH HW KH TMHARA KIA KRAIA SB GhART HW JAEE AWR TMHIN KhBR BHI NH HW
49.3: JW LWG RSWL KhDA KE HZWR BAT KRTE HWEE APNI AaWAZ PST RKHTE HIN WH DR HQIQT WHI LWG HIN JN KE DLWN KW ALLH NE TQWIA KE LIE JANCh LIA HE، AUN KE LIE MGhFRT HE AWR AJR عZIM
49.4: AE NBIؐ، JW LWG TMHIN HJRWN KE BAHR SE PKARTE HIN AN MIN SE AKSR BE عQL HIN
49.5: AGR WH TMHARE BRAaMD HWNE TK SBR KRTE TW ANHI KE LIE BHTR THA، ALLH DRGZR KRNE WALA AWR RHIM HE
49.6: AE LWGW JW AIMAN LAEE HW، AGR KWEI FASQ TMHARE PAS KWEI KhBR LE KR AaEE TW THQIQ KR LIA KRW، KHIN AISA NH HW KH TM KSI GRWH KW NADANSTH NQSAN PHNChA BITHW AWR PHR APNE KIE PR PShIMAN HW

59.7: JW KChH BHI ALLH AIN BSTIWN KE LWGWN SE APNE RSWL KI TRF PLTA DE WH ALLH AWR RSWL AWR RShTH DARWN AWR ITAMIA AWR MSAKIN AWR MSAFRWN KE LIE HE TAKH WH TMHARE MALDARWN HI KE DRMIAN GRDSh NH KRTA RHE JW KChH RSWLؐ TMHIN DE WH LE LW AWR JS ChIZ SE WH TM KW RWK DE AS SE RK JAؤ ALLH SE DRW، ALLH SKhT SZA DINE WALA HE
59.8: (NIZ WH MAL) AUN GhRIB MHAJRIN KE LIE HE JW APNE GHRWN AWR JAEDADWN SE NKAL BAHR KIE GEE HIN IH LWG ALLH KA FZL AWR AS KI KhWShNWDI ChAHTE HIN AWR ALLH AWR AUS KE RSWLؐ KI HMAIT PR KMR BSTH RHTE HIN IHI RASTBAZ LWG HIN
59.9: (AWR WH AUN LWGWN KE LIE BHI HE) JW AIN MHAJRIN KI AaMD SE PHLE HI AIMAN LA KR DARALHJRT MIN MQIM THE IH AUN LWGWN SE MHBT KRTE HIN JW HJRT KR KE AIN KE PAS AaEE HIN AWR JW KChH BHI AUN KW DIDIA JAEE AUS KI KWEI HAJT TK IH APNE DLWN MIN MHSWS NHIN KRTE AWR APNI ZAT PR DWSRWN KW TRJIH DITE HIN KhWAH APNI JGH KhWD MHTAJ HWN HQIQT IH HE KH JW LWG APNE DL KI TNGI SE BChA LIE GEE WHI FLAH PANE WALE HIN
59.10: (AWR WH AUN LWGWN KE LIE BHI HE) JW AIN AGLWN KE BعD AaEE HIN، JW KHTE HIN KH "AE HMARE RB، HMIN AWR HMARE AUN SB BHAEIWN KW BKhSh DE JW HM SE PHLE AIMAN LAEE HIN AWR HMARE DLWN MIN AHL AIMAN KE LIE KWEI BGhZ NH RKH، AE HMARE RB، TW BRA MHRBAN AWR RHIM HE"
59.11: TM NE DIKHA NHIN AUN LWGWN KW JNHWN NE MNAFQT KI RWSh AKhTIAR KI HE? IH APNE KAFR AHL KTAB BHAEIWN SE KHTE HIN "AGR TMHIN NKALA GIA TW HM TMHARE SATH NKLIN GE، AWR TMHARE MعAMLH MIN HM KSI KI BAT HRGZ NH MANIN GE، AWR AGR TM SE JNG KI GEI TW HM TMHARI MDD KRIN GE" MGR ALLH GWAH HE KH IH LWG QTعI JHWTE HIN
59.12: AGR WH NKALE GEE TW IH AN KE SATH HRGZ NH NKLIN GE، AWR AGR AUN SE JNG KI GEI TW IH AUN KI HRGZ MDD NH KRIN GE، AWR AGR IH AN KI MDD KRIN BHI TW PITH PHIR JAEIN GE AWR PHR KHIN SE KWEI MDD NH PAEIN GE
59.13: AIN KE DLWN MIN ALLH SE BRH KR TMHARA KhWF HE، AS LIE KH IH AISE LWG HIN JW SMJH BWJH NHIN RKHTE
59.14: IH KBHI AKTHE HW KR (KHLE MIDAN MIN) TMHARA MQABLH NH KRIN GE، LRIN GE BHI TW QLعH BND BSTIWN MIN BITH KR IA DIWARWN KE PIChHE ChHP KR IH AaPS KI MKhALFT MIN BRE SKhT HIN TM AINHIN AKTHA SMJHTE HW MGR AN KE DL AIK DWSRE SE PHTE HWEE HIN AIN KA IH HAL AIS LIE HE KH IH BE عQL LWG HIN
59.15: IH AUNHI LWGWN KE MANND HIN JW AIN SE THWRI HI MDT PHLE APNE KIE KA MZA ChKH ChKE HIN AWR AIN KE LIE DRDNAK عZAB HE
59.16: AIN KI MSAL ShITAN KI SI HE KH PHLE WH ANSAN SE KHTA HE KH KFR KR، AWR JB ANSAN KFR KR BITHTA HE TW WH KHTA HE KH MIN TJH SE BRI ALZMH HWN، MJHE TW ALLH RB ALعALMIN SE DR LGTA HE
59.17: PHR DWNWN KA ANJAM IH HWNA HE KH HMIShH KE LIE JHNM MIN JAEIN، AWR ZALMWN KI IHI JZA HE
59.18: AE LWGW JW AIMAN LAEE HW، ALLH SE DRW، AWR HR ShKhS IH DIKHE KH AUS NE KL KE LIE KIA SAMAN KIA HE ALLH SE DRTE RHW، ALLH IQINAAn TMHARE AUN SB AعMAL SE BAKhBR HE JW TM KRTE HW
59.19: AUN LWGWN KI TRH NH HW JAؤ JW ALLH KW BHWL GEE TW ALLH NE AUNHIN KhWD APNA NFS BHLA DIA، IHI LWG FASQ HIN
59.20: DWZKh MIN JANE WALE AWR JNT MIN JANE WALE KBHI IKSAN NHIN HW SKTE JNT MIN JANE WALE HI ASL MIN KAMIAB HIN
59.21: AGR HM NE IH QRAaN KSI PHAR PR BHI ATAR DIA HWTA TW TM DIKHTE KH WH ALLH KE KhWF SE DBA JA RHA HE AWR PHTA PRTA HE IH MSALIN HM LWGWN KE SAMNE AS LIE BIAN KRTE HIN KH WH (APNI HALT PR) GhWR KRIN
59.22: WH ALLH HI HE JS KE SWA KWEI MعBWD NHIN، GhAEB AWR ZAHR HR ChIZ KA JANNE WALA، WHI RHMAN AWR RHIM HE
59.23: WH ALLH HI HE JS KE SWA KWEI MعBWD NHIN WH BADShAH HE NHAIT MQDS، SRASR SLAMTI، AMN DINE WALA، NGHBAN، SB PR GhALB، APNA HKM BZWR NAFZ KRNE WALA، AWR BRA HI HW KR RHNE WALA PAK HE ALLH AUS ShRK SE JW LWG KR RHE HIN
59.24: WH ALLH HI HE JW TKhLIQ KA MNSWBH BNANE WALA AWR AS KW NAFZ KRNE WALA AWR AS KE MTABQ SWRT GRI KRNE WALA HE AS KE LIE BHTRIN NAM HIN HR ChIZ JW AaSMANWN AWR ZMIN MIN HE AUS KI TSBIH KR RHI HE، AWR WH ZBRDST AWR HKIM HE

60.1: AE LWGW JW AIMAN LAEE HW، AGR TM MIRI RAH MIN JHAD KRNE KE LIE AWR MIRI RZA JWEI KI KhATR (WTN ChHWR KR GHRWN SE) NKLE HW TW MIRE AWR APNE DShMNWN KW DWST NH BNAؤ TM AUN KE SATH DWSTI KI TRH DALTE HW، HALANKH JW HQ TMHARE PAS AaIA HE AUS KW MANNE SE WH ANKAR KR ChKE HIN AWR AUN KI RWSh IH HE KH RSWL KW AWR KhWD TM KW SRF AIS QSWR PR JLA WTN KRTE HIN KH TM APNE RB، ALLH PR AIMAN LAEE HW TM ChHPA KR AUN KW DWSTANH PIGhAM BHIJTE HW، HALANKH JW KChH TM ChHPA KR KRTE HW AWR JW عLANIH KRTE HW، HR ChIZ KW MIN KhWB JANTA HWN JW ShKhS BHI TM MIN SE AISA KRE WH IQINAAn RAH RAST SE BHTK GIA
60.2: AUN KA RWIH TW IH HE KH AGR TM PR QABW PA JAEIN TW TMHARE SATH DShMNI KRIN AWR HATH AWR ZBAN SE TMHIN AaZAR DIN WH TW IH ChAHTE HIN KH TM KSI TRH KAFR HW JAؤ
60.3: QIAMT KE DN NH TMHARI RShTH DARIAN KSI KAM AaEIN GI NH TMHARI AWLAD AUS RWZ ALLH TMHARE DRMIAN JDAEI DAL DE GA، AWR W HI TMHARE AعMAL KA DIKHNE WALA HE
60.4: TM LWGWN KE LIE ABRAHIMؑ AWR AUS KE SATHIWN MIN AIK AChHA NMWNH HE KH AUNHWN NE APNI QWM SE SAF KHH DIA "HM TM SE AWR TMHARE AIN MعBWDWN SE JN KW TM KhDA KW ChHWR KR PWJTE HW QTعI BIZAR HIN، HM NE TM SE KFR KIA AWR HMARE AWR TMHARE DRMIAN HMIShH KE LIE عDAWT HW GEI AWR BIR PR GIA JB TK TM ALLH WAHD PR AIMAN NH LAؤ" MGR ABRAHIMؑ KA APNE BAP SE IH KHNA (AIS SE MSTSNIA HE) KH "MIN AaP KE LIE MGhFRT KI DRKhWAST ZRWR KRWN GA، AWR ALLH SE AaP KE LIE KChH HASL KR LINA MIRE BS MIN NHIN HE" (AWR ABRAHIMؑ W ASHAB ABRAHIMؑ KI DعA IH THI KH) "AE HMARE RB، TIRE HI AWPR HM NE BHRWSA KIA AWR TIRI HI TRF HM NE RJWع KR LIA AWR TIRE HI HZWR HMIN PLTNA HE
60.5: AE HMARE RB، HMIN KAFRWN KE LIE FTNH NH BNA DE AWR AE HMARE RB، HMARE QSWRWN SE DRGZR FRMA، BE ShK TW HI ZBRDST AWR DANA HE"
60.6: AINHI LWGWN KE TRZ عML MIN TMHARE LIE AWR HR AUS ShKhS KE LIE AChHA NMWNH HE JW ALLH AWR RWZ AaKhR KA AMIDWAR HW AIS SE KWEI MNHRF HW TW ALLH BE NIAZ AWR APNI ZAT MIN AaP MHMWD HE
60.7: BعID NHIN KH ALLH KBHI TMHARE AWR AUN LWGWN KE DRMIAN MHBT DAL DE JN SE AaJ TM NE DShMNI MWL LI HE ALLH BRI QDRT RKHTA HE AWR WH GhFWR W RHIM HE
60.8: ALLH TMIN AS BAT SE NHIN RWKTA KH TM AN LWGWN KE SATH NIKI AWR ANSAF KA BRTAؤ KRW JNHWN NE DIN KE MعAMLH MIN TM SE JNG NHIN KI HE AWR TMHIN TMHARE GHRWN SE NHIN NKALA HE ALLH ANSAF KRNE WALWN KW PSND KRTA HE
60.9: WH TMHIN JS BAT SE RWKTA HE WH TW IH HE KH TM AUN LWGWN SE DWSTI KRW JNHWN NE TM SE DIN KE MعAMLH MIN JNG KI HE AWR TMHIN TMHARE GHRWN SE NKALA HE AWR TMHARE AKhRAJ MIN AIK DWSRE KI MDD KI HE AUN SE JW LWG DWSTI KRIN WHI ZALM HIN
60.10: AE LWGW JW AIMAN LAEE HW، JB MWMN عWRTIN HJRT KR KE TMHARE PAS AaEIN TW (AN KE MWMN HWNE KI) JANCh PRTAL KR LW، AWR AN KE AIMAN KI HQIQT ALLH HI BHTR JANTA HE PHR JB TMHIN MعLWM HW JAEE KH WH MWMN HIN TW ANHIN KFAR KI TRF WAPS NH KRW NH WH KFAR KE LIE HLAL HIN AWR NH KFAR AN KE LIE HLAL AN KE KAFR ShWHRWN NE JW MHR AUN KW DIE THE WH ANHIN PHIR DW AWR AN SE NKAH KR LINE MIN TM PR KWEI GNAH NHIN JBKH TM AUN KE MHR AUN KW ADA KR DW AWR TM KhWD BHI KAFR عWRTWN KW APNE NKAH MIN NH RWKE RHW JW MHR TM NE APNI KAFR BIWIWN KW DIE THE WH TM WAPS MANG LW AWR JW MHR KAFRWN NE APNI MSLMAN BIWIWN KW DIE THE ANHIN WH WAPS MANG LIN IH ALLH KA HKM HE، WH TMHARE DRMIAN FISLH KRTA HE AWR ALLH عLIM W HKIM HE
60.11: AWR AGR TMHARI KAFR BIWIWN KE MHRWN MIN SE KChH TMHIN KFAR SE WAPS NH MLE AWR PHR TMHARI NWBT AaEE TW JN LWGWN KI BIWIAN ADHR RH GEI HIN AUN KW ATNI RQM ADA KR DW JW AUN KE DIE HWEE MHRWN KE BRABR HW AWR AUS KhDA SE DR TE RHW JS PR TM AIMAN LAEE HW
60.12: AE NBIؐ، JB TMHARE PAS MWMN عWRTIN BIعT KRNE KE LIE AaEIN AWR AS BAT KA عHD KRIN KH WH ALLH KE SATH KSI ChIZ KW ShRIK NH KRIN GI، ChWRI NH KRIN GI، ZNA NH KRIN GI، APNI AWLAD KW QTL NH KRIN GI، APNE HATH PAؤN KE AaGE KWEI BHTAN GHR KR NH LAEIN GI، AWR KSI AMR MعRWF MIN TMHARI NAFRMANI NH KRIN GI، TW AN SE BIعT LE LW AWR AUN KE HQ MIN ALLH SE DعAEE MGhFRT KRW، IQINAAn ALLH DRGZR FRMANE WALA AWR RHM KRNE WALA HE
60.13: AE LWGW JW AIMAN LAEE HW، AUN LWGWN KW DWST NH BNAؤ JN PR ALLH NE GhZB FRMAIA HE، JW AaKhRT SE ASI TRH MAIWS HIN JS TRH QBRWN MIN PRE HWEE KAFR MAIWS HIN

61.1: ALLH KI TSBIH KI HE HR AUS ChIZ NE JW AaSMANWN AWR ZMIN MIN HE، AWR WH GhALB AWR HKIM HE
61.2: AE LWGW JW AIMAN LAEE HW، TM KIWN WH BAT KHTE HW JW KRTE NHIN HW?
61.3: ALLH KE NZDIK IH SKhT NAPSNDIDH HRKT HE KH TM KHW WH BAT JW KRTE NHIN
61.4: ALLH KW TW PSND WH LWG HIN JW AS KI RAH MIN AS TRH SF BSTH HW KR LRTE HIN GWIA KH WH AIK SISH PLAEI HWEI DIWAR HIN
61.5: AWR IAD KRW MWSIAؑ KI WH BAT JW AS NE APNI QWM SE KHI THI "AE MIRI QWM KE LWGW، TM KIWN MJHE AZIT DITE HW HALANKH TM KhWB JANTE HW KH MIN TMHARI TRF ALLH KA BHIJA HWA RSWL HWN?" PHR JB ANHWN NE TIRH AKhTIAR KI TW ALLH NE AN KE DL TIRHE KR DIE، ALLH FASQWN KW HDAIT NHIN DITA
61.6: AWR IAD KRW عISIAؑ ABN MRIMؑ KI WH BAT JW AS NE KHI THI KH "AE BNI ASRAEIL، MIN TMHARI TRF ALLH KA BHIJA HWA RSWL HWN، TSDIQ KRNE WALA HWN AUS TWRAۃ KI JW MJH SE PHLE AaEI HWEI MWJWD HE، AWR BShART DINE WALA HWN AIK RSWL KI JW MIRE BعD AaEE GA JS KA NAM AHMD HWGA MGR JB WH AN KE PAS KHLI KHLI NShANIAN LE KR AaIA TW ANHWN NE KHA IH TW SRIH DHWKA HE
61.7: AB BHLA AUS ShKhS SE BRA ZALM AWR KWN HWGA JW ALLH PR JHWTE BHTAN BANDHE HALANKH ASE ASLAM (ALLH KE AaGE SR ATAعT JHKA DINE) KI DعWT DI JA RHI HW? AISE ZALMWN KW ALLH HDAIT NHIN DIA KRTA
61.8: IH LWG APNE MNH KI PHWNKWN SE ALLH KE NWR KW BJHANA ChAHTE HIN، AWR ALLH KA FISLH IH HE KH WH APNE NWR KW PWA PHILA KR RHE GA KhWAH KAFRWN KW IH KTNA HI NAGWAR HW
61.9: WHI TW HE JS NE APNE RSWL KW HDAIT AWR DIN HQ KE SATH BHIJA HE TAKH ASE PWRE KE PWRE DIN PR GhALB KR DE KhWAH MShRKIN KW IH KTNA HI NAGWAR HW
61.10: AE LWGW JW AIMAN LAEE HW، MIN BTAؤN TM KW WH TJART JW TMHIN عZAB ALIM SE BChA DE?
61.11: AIMAN LAؤ ALLH AWR AS KE RSWL PR، AWR JHAD KRW ALLH KI RAH MIN APNE MALWN SE AWR APNI JANWN SE IHI TMHARE LIE BHTR HE AGR TM JANW
61.12: ALLH TMHARE GNAH MعAF KR DE GA، AWR TM KW AISE BAGhWN MIN DAKhL KRE GA JN KE NIChE NHRIN BHTI HWN GI، AWR ABDI QIAM KI JNTWN MIN BHTRIN GHR TMHIN عTA FRMAEE GA IH HE BRI KAMIABI
61.13: AWR WH DWSRI ChIZ JW TM ChAHTE HW WH BHI TMHIN DE GA، ALLH KI TRF SE NSRT AWR QRIB HI MIN HASL HW JANE WALI FTH AE NBIؐ، AHL AIMAN KW AIS KI BShART DE DW
61.14: AE LWGW JW AIMAN LAEE HW، ALLH KE MDDGAR BNW، JS TRH عISIA ABN MRIMؑ NE HWARIWN KW KhTAB KR KE KHA THA: "KWN HE ALLH KI TRF (BLANE) MIN MIRA MDDGAR?" AWR HWARIWN NE JWAB DIA THA: "HM HIN ALLH KE MDDGAR" AUS WQT BNI ASRAEIL KA AIK GRWH AIMAN LAIA AWR DWSRE GRWH NE ANKAR KIA PHR HM NE AIMAN LANE WALWN KI AUN KE DShMNWN KE MQABLE MIN TAEID KI AWR WHI GhALB HW KR RHE

62.1: ALLH KI TSBIH KR RHI HE HR WH ChIZ JW AaSMANWN MIN HE AWR HR WH ChIZ JW ZMIN MIN HE BADShAH HE، QDWS HE، ZBRDST AWR HKIM HE
62.2: WHI HE JS NE AMIWN KE ANDR AIK RSWL KhWD AUNHI MIN SE ATHAIA، JW AUNHIN AUS KI AaIAT SNATA HE، AUN KI ZNDGI SNWARTA HE، AWR AUN KW KTAB AWR HKMT KI TعLIM DITA HE HALANKH AIS SE PHLE WH KHLI GMRAHI MIN PRE HWEE THE
62.3: AWR (AS RSWL KI BعST) AUN DWSRE LWGWN KE LIE BHI HE JW ABHI AUN SE NHIN MLE HIN
62.4: ALLH ZBRDST AWR HKIM HE IH AS KA FZL HE، JSE ChAHTA HE DITA HE، AWR WH BRA FZL FRMANE WALA HE
62.5: JN LWGWN KW TWRAۃ KA HAML BNAIA GIA THA MGR ANHWN NE AS KA BAR NH ATHA IA، AUN KI MSAL AUS GDHE KI SI HE JS PR KTABIN LDI HWEI HWN AIS SE BHI ZIADH BRI MSAL HE AUN LWGWN KI JNHWN NE ALLH KI AaIAT KW JHTLA DIA HE AISE ZALMWN KW ALLH HDAIT NHIN DIA KRTA
62.6: AIN SE KHW، "AE LWGW JW IHWDI BN GEE HW، AGR TMHIN IH GHMND HE KH BAQI SB LWGWN KW ChHWR KR BS TM HI ALLH KE ChHITE HW TW MWT KI TMNA KRW AGR TM APNE AIS ZعM MIN SChE HW"
62.7: LIKN IH HRGZ AS KI TMNA NH KRIN GE APNE KRTWTWN KI WJH SE JW IH KR ChKE HIN، AWR ALLH AIN ZALMWN KW KhWB JANTA HE
62.8: AIN SE KHW، "JS MWT SE TM BHAGTE HW WH TW TMHIN Aa KR RHE GI PHR TM AS KE SAMNE PISh KIE JAؤ GE JW PWShIDH W ZAHR KA JANNE WALA HE، AWR WH TMHIN BTA DE GA KH TM KIA KChH KRTE RHE HW
62.9: AE LWGW JW AIMAN LAEE HW، JB PKARA JAEE NMAZ KE LIE JMعH KE DN TW ALLH KE ZKR KI TRF DWRW AWR KhRID W FRWKhT ChHWR DW، IH TMHARE LIE ZIADH BHTR HE AGR TM JANW
62.10: PHR JB NMAZ PWRI HW JAEE TW ZMIN MIN PHIL JAؤ AWR ALLH KA FZL TLASh KRW AWR ALLH KW KSRT SE IAD KRTE RHW، ShAID KH TMHIN FLAH NSIB HW JAEE
62.11: AWR JB ANHWN NE TJART AWR KHIL TMAShA HWTE DIKHA TW AS KI TRF LPK GEE AWR TMHIN KHRA ChHWR DIA AN SE KHW، JW KChH ALLH KE PAS HE WH KHIL TMAShE AWR TJART SE BHTR HE AWR ALLH SB SE BHTR RZQ DINE WALA HE

63.1: AE NBIؐ، JB IH MNAFQ TMHARE PAS AaTE HIN TW KHTE HIN "HM GWAHI DITE HIN KH Aa P IQINAAn ALLH KE RSWL HIN" HAN، ALLH JANTA HE KH TM ZRWR AUS KE RSWL HW، MGR ALLH GWAHI DITA HE KH IH MNAFQ QTعI JHWTE HIN
63.2: ANHWN NE APNI QSMWN KW DHAL BNA RKHA HE AWR AIS TRH IH ALLH KE RASTE SE KhWD RKTE AWR DNIA KW RWKTE HIN KISI BRI HRKTIN HIN JW IH LWG KR RHE HIN
63.3: IH SB KChH AS WJH SE HE KH AN LWGWN NE AIMAN LA KR PHR KFR KIA AS LIE AN KE DLWN PR MHR LGA DI GEI، AB IH KChH NHIN SMJHTE
63.4: AINHIN DIKHW TW AIN KE JSE TMHIN BRE ShANDAR NZR AaEIN BWLIN TW TM AN KI BATIN SNTE RH JAؤ MGR ASL MIN IH GWIA LKRI KE KNDE HIN JW DIWAR KE SATH ChN KR RKH DIE GEE HWN HR ZWR KI AaWAZ KW IH APNE KhLAF SMJHTE HIN IH PKE DShMN HIN، AN SE BCh KR RHW، ALLH KI MAR AN PR، IH KDHR ALTE PHRAEE JA RHE HIN
63.5: AWR JB AIN SE KHA JATA HE KH Aaؤ TAKH ALLH KA RSWL TMHARE LIE MGhFRT KI DعA KRE، TW SR JHTKTE HIN AWR TM DIKHTE HW KH WH BRE GHMND KE SATH AaNE SE RKTE HIN
63.6: AE NBIؐ، TM ChAHE AN KE LIE MGhFRT KI DعA KRW IA NH KRW، AN KE LIE IKSAN HE، ALLH HRGZ ANHIN MعAF NH KRE GA، ALLH FASQ LWGWN KW HRGZ HDAIT NHIN DITA
63.7: IH WHI LWG HIN JW KHTE HIN KH RSWL KE SATHIWN PR KhRCh KRNA BND KR DW TAKH IH MNTShR HW JAEIN HALANKH ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN KE KhZANWN KA MALK ALLH HI HE، MGR IH MNAFQ SMJHTE NHIN HIN
63.8: IH KHTE HIN KH HM MDINE WAPS PHNCh JAEIN TW JW عZT WALA HE WH ZLIL KW WHAN SE NKAL BAHR KRE GA HALANKH عZT TW ALLH AWR AS KE RSWLؐ AWR MWMNIN KE LIE HE، MGR IH MNAFQ JANTE NHIN HIN
63.9: AE LWGW JW AIMAN LAEE HW، TMHARE MAL AWR TMHARI AWLADIN TM KW ALLH KI IAD SE GhAFL NH KR DIN JW LWG AISA KRIN WHI KhSARE MIN RHNE WALE HIN
63.10: JW RZQ HM NE TMHIN DIA HE AS MIN SE KhRCh KRW QBL AS KE KH TM MIN SE KSI KI MWT KA WQT Aa JAEE AWR AUS WQT WH KHE KH "AE MIRE RB، KIWN NH TW NE MJHE THWRI SI MHLT AWR DE DI KH MIN SDQH DITA AWR SALH LWGWN MIN ShAML HW JATA"
63.11: HALANKH JB KSI KI MHLT عML PWRI HWNE KA WQT Aa JATA HE TW ALLH AUS KW HRGZ MZID MHLT NHIN DITA، AWR JW KChH TM KRTE HW، ALLH AS SE BAKhBR HE

64.1: ALLH KI TSBIH KR RHI HE HR WH ChIZ JW AaSMANWN MIN HE AWR HR WH ChIZ JW ZMIN MIN HE ASI KI BADShAHI HE AWR ASI KE LIE TعRIF HE AWR WH HR ChIZ PR QADR HE
64.2: WHI HE JS NE TM KW PIDA KIA، PHR TM MIN SE KWEI KAFR HE AWR KWEI MWMN، AWR ALLH WH SB KChH DIKH RHA HE JW TM KRTE HW
64.3: AS NE ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN KW BRHQ PIDA KIA HE، AWR TMHARI SWRT BNAEI AWR BRI عMDH BNAEI HE، AWR ASI KI TRF AaKhRKAR TMHIN PLTNA HE
64.4: ZMIN AWR AaSMANWN KI HR ChIZ KA ASE عLM HE JW KChH TM ChHPATE HW AWR JW KChH TM ZAHR KRTE HW SB AS KW MعLWM HE، AWR WH DLWN KA HAL TK JANTA HE
64.5: KIA TMHIN AUN LWGWN KI KWEI KhBR NHIN PHNChI JNHWN NE AIS SE PHLE KFR KIA AWR PHR APNI ShAMT AعMAL KA MZH ChKH LIA? AWR AaGE AUN KE LIE AIK DRDNAK عZAB HE
64.6: AIS ANJAM KE MSTHQ WH AS LIE HWEE KH AUN KE PAS AUN KE RSWL KHLI KHLI DLILIN AWR NShANIAN LE KR AaTE RHE، MGR AUNHWN NE KHA "KIA ANSAN HMIN HDAIT DIN GE?" AS TRH ANHWN NE MANNE SE ANKAR KR DIA AWR MNH PHIR LIA، TB ALLH BHI AN SE BE PRWA HW GIA AWR ALLH TW HE HI BE NIAZ AWR APNI ZAT MIN AaP MHMWD
64.7: MNKRIN NE BRE DعWE SE KHA HE KH WH MRNE KE BعD HRGZ DWBARH NH ATHAEE JAEIN GE AN SE KHW "NHIN، MIRE RB KI QSM TM ZRWR ATHAEE JAؤ GE، PHR ZRWR TMHIN BTAIA JAEE GA KH TM NE (DNIA MIN) KIA KChH KIA HE، AWR AISA KRNA ALLH KE LIE BHT AaSAN HE"
64.8: PS AIMAN LAؤ ALLH PR، AWR AUS KE RSWL PR، AWR AUS RWShNI PR JW HM NE NAZL KI HE JW KChH TM KRTE HW ALLH AS SE BAKhBR HE
64.9: (AIS KA PTA TMHIN AS RWZ ChL JAEE GA) JB AJTMAع KE DN WH TM SB KW AKTHA KRE GA WH DN HWGA AIK DWSRE KE MQABLE MIN LWGWN KI HAR JIT KA JW ALLH PR AIMAN LAIA HE AWR NIK عML KRTA HE، ALLH AS KE GNAH JHAR DE GA AWR ASE AISI JNTWN MIN DAKhL KRE GA JN KE NIChE NHRIN BHTI HWN GI IH LWG HMIShH HMIShH AN MIN RHIN GE IH BRI KAMIABI HE
64.10: AWR JN LWGWN NE KFR KIA HE AWR HMARI AaIAT KW JHTLAIA HE WH DWZKh KE BAShNDE HWN GE JS MIN WH HMIShH RHIN GE AWR WH BDTRIN THKANA HE
64.11: KWEI MSIBT KBHI NHIN AaTI MGR ALLH KE AZN HI SE AaTI HE JW ShKhS ALLH PR AIMAN RKHTA HW ALLH AS KE DL KW HDAIT BKhShTA HE، AWR ALLH KW HR ChIZ KA عLM HE
64.12: ALLH KI ATAعT KRW AWR RSWL KI TAعT KRW LIKN AGR TM ATAعT SE MNH MWRTE HW TW HMARE RSWL PR SAF SAF HQ PHNChA DINE KE SWA KWEI ZMH DARI NHIN HE
64.13: ALLH WH HE JS KE SWA KWEI KhDA NHIN، LHAZA AIMAN LANE WALWN KW ALLH HI PR BHRWSA RKHNA ChAHIE
